summary: So many ’Mallows to collect!

scraped_reviews.content: It's a good game and the in-app purchasing is a little high in my idea but overall not bad. However, the reason for such a low score is because the app constantly crashes. Sometimes up to five times before I can even play the game for 10-15 minutes only for it to crash again. Also I have had stickers go missing which from other reviews seems to be not so unheard of. I feel that this app could use some work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear you’ve been experiencing some crash issues. We're constantly working on bug fixes so check back again soon!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, I like the game. BUT... I've beat every level and Mallow Mode is horrible - PLEASE GET RID OF IT. It had me play the same level 4 times in a row, even after beating it each time. I'd rather restart at Level 1. The number and length of ads is excessive, and seems to be getting worse. The game keeps crashing, so I lose progress towards rewards and don't receive Golden Claw Squishmallows earned. I won a prize on the leader board, and never received it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for the feedback. We will take it into account when developing the game further. In the case of lost event rewards, please contact support and they will restore them to your account.

scraped_reviews.content: Was a lovely game when I started, now it's so so. I'm tired of playing the same level days in a row and tired of being cheated out of rewards. The daily list says use a bomb I do and it doesn't get counted. the list says use a water cannon, I do, I don't get rewarded. seriously thinking of deleting. squishmallows are cute but the game seems like a rip off. No helps without paying. also how about a way to trade or sell the mallows you don't want. that would be so cool!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're very sorry this is happening to you. If you haven't already, please submit a customer support ticket about the bugs.

scraped_reviews.content: this game is pretty much everything i wanted and expected out of it. an issue that bothers me a lot, however, is how slow the animations are. when you make matches and more pieces fall it's annoying slow. i also dont like that when the level ends you can't skip all the extra pieces being matched. please speed up the game and make things skippable. thank you!

I love this game and love collecting the squishmallows, but I absolutely hate mallow mode! I have been stuck on this super hard level for a week now, and it seems impossible to get past unless I spend a ridiculous amount of money for one level of a free game that doesn't count for anything. I also have all of the purchasable squishmallows, so I really wish more squishmallows and levels would be added so I can finally play the game again and be invested to collect.

Yet another edit. I THOUGHT the golden claw was fixed. I was excited to see my key FINALLY earned the Squishmallow I'd been trying for since it hadn't been working. Game crashed and ALL of my progress was lost. Gone. Still no fix for the ticket I sent in either, even though I found and reported the issue. C'mon guys! I want to buy the bigger packs but refuse until everything works as it should.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The issue affecting the golden claw was an unexpected bug, and should be fixed now if you update the game. Our apologies for the inconvenience. If you contact support, they can reimburse you for the lost tickets.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: minus 1⭐ So, I won second place of one of the recent propeller event but the Galaxy collection ended earlier today and I have yet to receive the prizes which included 1,000 tokens for the claw machine of which I badly wanted to get more Allys. I would absolutely love it if you all could release more of the axolotl squishmallows in the game, they are my favorite! I need more levels again! it would be great to have access to already passed levels instead of the 'Mallow Mode.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! If you contact support and tell them your user ID and which rewards you are missing, they will restore them to your account.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game. Going to give 5 star regardless just for this fact. I've become quite fond of the game. Unfortunately I do have a complaint. I don't think when you start a round that if a mandatory ad pops up and crashes the app (Thanks Temu App ad.) that you should lose a life and all the items you were planning to use in said round. it is unfair to punish the player for something not in their control. More so when you don't get to even peek at said level.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! This is not an intended feature. We are currently looking into disruptive ads and working on a solution.

scraped_reviews.content: This game quickly became one of my favourite matching type games. It's adorable and easy to lose track of time. I am incredibly frustrated, though, because all too often the game will glitch and make me fail a level even when all objectives are completed. I finally got a screen recording of it happening, too. It's even more frustrating when you have a win streak going and then it glitches and I lose my streak bonuses. I hope this stuff gets fixed so its not as disheartening to try and play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're very sorry you've encountered this issue! We are constantly working on bug fixes so check back in a little while!

scraped_reviews.content: It's honestly a cute enough match 3 game, basically the same as the rest. My biggest gripe is the level setup. Wayyyy too many levels have obstacles that can only be removed via boost/power up and an extremely limited playing field to make those power ups. They also have daily quests for coins or tickets, but those also require the premium boosts that you don't get many of. Between the high microtransactions and unnecessarily difficult levels, it may not be best for kids.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We will take it into account. We have done our best to create a level of difficulty that feels challenging but not unfair. That being said, we are still tweaking it so check back in a little while!

scraped_reviews.content: Very fun game, and lots of adorable Squishmallows to collect. What happened to my stickers though???? I've had multiple stickers disappear from my inventory, the most recent being the green science bottle. It shows that I own it when I click the magnifying glass on someone else's post in the player feed, but it's nowhere to be found when I create a post.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We've tried our best to make the game challenging but not unfair. We are also constantly balancing it so you may see the difficulty fluctuate.

scraped_reviews.content: I really want to love this game more, but it is super difficult. I have been stuck on level 29 for days. It started to get hard around level 13. It is just difficult to solve with the limited number of moves you get. Suggestion: don't have the little bombs, planes, fans etc count as moves. Also, maybe instead of moves have a timer. I just don't understand how to solve a this level with only a few moves. I love the squishmellow theme and the claw machines etc. the difficulty needs to change.

So the game is another Candy Crush clone. I won't fault it for that. However, I will fault it for being VERY predatory with it's microtransactions. It forces you to open the season passes, open the microtransactions menus, even when you just want to play the game. Can't recommend for kids unless payment options are under lock and key because the game railroads looking into what you can spend money on when you open the game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're very sorry you feel this way. We're constantly balancing both difficulty and monetization in the game, so check back in a little while.

scraped_reviews.content: The perfect game! I love that you get to "collect" Squishmallow's as you play. It makes you feel like you're actually getting a "prize". I stopped playing Candy Crush because there never felt like there was a reward to it. This is different because you're actually trying to collect them all. I downloaded this game this month and I've already played 33 hours altogether. Definitely recommend if you want a break for social media and a fun game instead.

This is a super cute, fun game. It was great until it started forcing ads on me. I don't mind ads in general because game developers need to eat, too. My issue is that I usually get a Snapchat ad. That Snapchat ad is impossible to close without closing the game. When the game closes, I lose all of Cam's boosts, which take several levels to get. I've uninstalled other games because of that cursed Snapchat ad and it looks like this one is next.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're currently investigating disruptive ads. It is not our intention that ads should disrupt your gameplay.

scraped_reviews.content: It's fun at first until it gets extremely difficult. You will be stuck on the same level for ages because the way it got set up was awful. This game also likes to have a maddening amount of short events that last less than two weeks. Not even mentioning the microtransactions for said events which are extremely short. TLDR; this game is the standard match 3 game, including the microtransactions, painfully short events, and frustrating gameplay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are always in the process of balancing our difficulty. Some levels might seem very difficult, but we've tried to offer a suitable amount of challenge for players of all skill levels.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the game because it's fun collecting all the squishmallows. I don't understand the event. The time on the event said zero when I was in 4th place, but when I went on this morning, I was in 12th. If the time is zero, then the event should be over, but it is not, so it makes it very confusing. I also don't like how the pass changes weekly and costs 6.99 every time. That is too expensive just for something virtual.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. We are constantly updating the game and balancing its difficulty.

scraped_reviews.content: The cute Squishmallow frenzy now includes a match game. It's easy to get lost in the game, and spend a lot of time playing it. There are different areas of the game, where you can win new Squishmallows out of a claw machine, and create images with your Squishmallows, as well as see and like scenes created by other players. There are daily challenges and events that last longer. While there are things that cost money, you can easily play and advance levels without spending anything.

the more I play this, the less I like it. the squishmallows are super cute, but I'm not sure why match games think 900 coins to add only 5 extra moves is a good idea. it makes it extremely difficult and frustrating, especially when I only need 1 more move to complete a level and don't want to spend real money. the game itself tends to heat up my phone, too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry that your experience wasn't enjoyable. We are constantly working on new updates and bugfixes for the game, so maybe it will be more fun for you in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: Fun until you get too high up in levels. I'm at 261 and it's no longer fun. Way too hard just to be hard. No fun to be had anymore. It's either spend money for more turns and HOPE you beat it or get extremely lucky. Really close to uninstalling because that fun is gone. Just mindless hard difficulty for no good reason but trying to get you to spend money. I even spent like 10, but not anymore than that. Oh well I guess. I'll just find another game that does pretty much the same.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. We are constantly updating the game and balancing its difficulty.

scraped_reviews.content: I'd gotten to well over 1000 levels but then I got really stuck on a level. I even spent a little money on stuff to try and help me beat it and I still couldn't win it. I tried literally for days. I had spent money on this game, but if I have to drop $50 just to win a level, I might as well save that money on the game and go to the store and buy a real squishmallow with it :) also couldn't play it offline.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're very sorry this has been your experience. We are always balancing the difficulty of the game, so check back in a little while.

scraped_reviews.content: It starts off great, but once you get to the higher levels it becomes near impossible to complete levels, ultimately becoming a cash grab. There's no ads, so I guess this is how they make money. It's not fun once you get there, run out of lives quickly, then wait hours or pay until you can try again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We've tried to balance the game's difficulty so that levels offer a challenge and also feel rewarding. We're also constantly balancing it based on feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Cute game but unfortunately after a few levels they get virtually impossible to pass without using coins or paying real money, you can't even watch an ad for extra moves so it seems to be a cute money making scam, I'll probably end up deleting it I'm afraid. EDIT : fed up of impossible levels that are created to make you spend money, account deleted and now I'm going to uninstall this scam game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're constantly working on updates to different aspects of the game, including monetization. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Fun at first but now I'm stuck on lvl 1159 for days! There's absolutely NO WAY that level can be beaten, there's very little moves and almost impossible to get any extras to help you. I'm deleting this game now because it's simply frustrating. Shame because it was fun to play at first and the squishmallows are cute. But that level is just ridiculous. I've used all boosters and extra moves but can't clear the level. I doubt anyone can.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We've tried our best to make the game challenging but not unfair. We are also constantly balancing it so you may see the difficulty fluctuate.

scraped_reviews.content: Very frustrating regarding giving awards. After an event ends when you compete against other players, it sometimes takes days before it offers you the chance to claim your items. Sometimes, you hit claim, but it doesn't actually give the items. This is very discouraging. I might uninstall
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! If you contact support and tell them your user ID and which rewards you are missing, they will restore them to your account.

scraped_reviews.content: not great. it's plenty fun and I love collecting squishmallows, but I have plenty of gripes about the ads: 1. they implement unskippable ad breaks after level 100 (you can pay to remove them!); 2. they give you optional ads for bonuses, but they show you the ad and the bonus won't load; and 3. many of the ads they show are HIGHLY inappropriate for an app they know children use - showing ads for apps that contain sexual content (with said content IN THE AD!!). you can't report ads either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The kinds of ads shown are not up to the us, but the ad distribution network. If you come across an inappropriate ad, please report it.

scraped_reviews.content: It's an incredibly addictive game and very cute. Unfortunately I have spent real life money to progress in a game and it glitched, this has happened to me more than three times now hence the negative review. I was not given any of the rewards nor able to progress, having to start again without any of Cam's Boosts. Quite annoyed and wanting a refund for the times I have paid to progress and it glitched. Not impressed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! If you contact support, they can help you with restoring purchases. We are very sorry that this issue is affecting you.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: Thank you for the prompt reply and fix for the game!! Changed from 4 to 5 stars! / I love this game a lot! Been playing it every day since I got it... however, lately it is frozen on a bonus level. I can access the level but am unable to play or exit once in the level.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This issue has been fixed in the latest version. Please update the game and relaunch the app. We're sorry for the trouble it caused. Happy to hear that you are enjoying the game!

scraped_reviews.content: This is an absolute joke of a game. Takes forever to pass levels, way too hard. so you run out of the five life's they give you, then they offer you a video for one hour of unlimited plays but then after watching the video you get nothing!! Would be 0/5 from me if I could give it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are sorry you didn't enjoy the game. We've tried to balance the game's difficulty so that levels offer a challenge and also feel rewarding. We're also constantly balancing it based on feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Hundreds of levels in and it's nearly impossible to pass the hard and super hard levels without having to spend money. The game is cute overall, but if you're not paying to win, you're going to be stuck on annoying levels for a long time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We've tried to balance the game's difficulty so that levels offer a challenge and also feel rewarding. You can pass all the levels in the game without spending money. We're also constantly balancing it based on feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is ridiculously fun, and I'm nearly at Level 1200 and I'm not stuck yet, like what usually happens with these kind of games. My only complaint is that the price for the VIP Pass for each season is really high when the season only lasts a week. Either make the seasons longer or the pass cheaper. Regardless, this game is great AND it has my favorite, Santino the Platypus, who was my first Squishmallow IRL.

don't get me wrong, this game is very fun and entertaining, but I would genuinely not suggest this game for children. it is fun and adorable, and i understand that a game with very few ads needs to make money somehow, but it is predatory in the way it goes after your wallet. for example, a daily challenge is to use a limited expencive power up, but even if you use it, it sometimes doesn't count, you will run out and fail to claim all tasks and lose the reward unless you spend real money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We've tried to balance the game's difficulty in a way where levels feel challenging but rewarding. We're sorry if this has made them feel too difficult sometimes.

scraped_reviews.content: Had the app since roughly around launch. Ive complete the game nearly 4 times over, but somehow I'm still addicted to playing?! The weekly events with every other day being a different goal, does keep you interacting beyond game completion. The only downside is that the event prizes sometimes take over a week to register so currently, the Halloween event prizes are very behind.

10min playing and the game drained 10% of battery. Besides, it has been freezing for 2 days, really slow, and sometimes I need to restart a level, losing my boosters. Besides, the mandatory ads are annoying. It was really great and addicting before, but I'm about to uninstall
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're currently investigating battery drain issues that affect some players more than others. We apologize for the inconvenience.

scraped_reviews.content: this is not a difficult game. I've passed every level and my win streak was 270. once you pass 10 levels you get so many power ups it's almost hard to fail a level without having 20 moves remaining. I do wish there were more levels! I've been on mallow mode for over a week 😭 sometimes I get the same level 3 times in a row!

the gameplay starts pretty good, however, it's clear a lot of the levels rely on the power-ups to complete. The game also doesn't explain the rewards well and the size-up mechanic seems really predatory especially for a game made for children. There's multiple different currencies and in-game purchases that make the game go from just fun to forcing you to see the option to buy every time you fail a level.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry you're not satisfied with the gameplay. We consider all feedback when working on updates for the game and hope that you might find it more fun in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been playing this game for several days and I am on level 137 at the point in time of this review being typed. Overall, I enjoy this game as it's a match 3 puzzle style and there are collectibles to achieve in-game. However, I have two feedback that I hope the developers would consider improving on: 1) The amount of coins required to add on 5 more moves is too expensive. 2) Please implement a way for players to exchange for the squishcoins using squishbucks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: the game is super fun and engaging but I can't play the game without it running super slow and laggy and then just ending up crashing out of nowhere. I'm on the app for maybe a minute or even less and then it just crashes. I'd really like it if the developers could fix the bug that way I could enjoy the game better
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're constantly working on bug fixes, so this issue should be fixed soon.

scraped_reviews.userName: I “Seven” don't know what im doing
scraped_reviews.content: Got stuck on level 59, Ive come to learn that if you don't have any power ups you're pretty much screwed cause some of these levels are impossible unless you get good line ups of blocks. I really, really want to like this game more but the levels are deeply frustrating and are no longer fun. :(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are constantly balancing the difficulty of the game so check back in a little while.

scraped_reviews.content: give an option to give one heart for watching one ad, so at least that keeps people going than having to wait half an hour for just one heart. at times the game feels super rigged, or either it's super impossible to finish, I've tried one level that I used up literally all my powerups and the level still can't be finished, the game literally rigged to not give you a rainbow no matter what. I've tried at least 30 times on that level and I tried to make a rainbow on purpose and it never worked.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry if the game feels difficult. We've tried to provide a level of difficulty that provides some challenges.

scraped_reviews.content: the game isnt terrible but when I have to spend 4 days trying to win a level I lose Interest. I'm not spending a fortune on a game to win a level. fix the levels so you can actually pass them without spending money and maybe id consider playing it again. until then its a waste of space on my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are constantly balancing the difficulty of the game so check back in a little while.

scraped_reviews.content: i love this game since me and my wife collect squishes but the crashing mid puzzle and me losing rewards and streaks makes it hard to want to keep playing when there are competitions where every puzzle matters, also having every ad take me to the app store is ridiculous considering almost every ad crashes the game. if this isn't fixed soon I will stop playing and advocate to tell people to stop playing as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're very sorry about the issues with ads. We're looking into it, crashes while watching an ad or being forced to go the app store from an ad is not supposed to happen.

scraped_reviews.content: The game is undoubtedly satisfying and pretty, largely luck based but fun to play every so often. However. The way it aggressively pushes micro transactions in a clearly kid focused, product promotional game is completely gross. The game uses every trick in the free to play book, in addition to offering 5 extra moves at the end of a failed run, as part of a FIVE POUND BUNDLE. ONE POUND PER EXTRA TURN The characters are also obtained through claw machine pulls, i.e loot boxes.

Game experiences freezes and bugs constantly. Very often, you don't receive what you've won from tournaments and claw machines, especially The Golden Claw which waste hard earned tickets. Support has done nothing to restore items either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The issue affecting the golden claw was an unexpected bug, and should be fixed now if you update the game. Our apologies for the inconvenience. If you contact support, they can reimburse you for the lost tickets.

scraped_reviews.content: The more you force us to watch ads, the more we will adamantly NOT WANT TO. I close the app every time the forced ad comes up every 2 levels. I'm NOT going to spend money on an app I keep closing after only 2 minutes of playing. The fact that this game seems very child-friendly makes the forced ads and forced spending of money to get rid of the ads even WORSE. How disgusting it is to make a kid spend money they don't even have. When will corporations learn that forcing ads is COUNTERPRODUCTIVE
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are sorry that you do not like the game but we thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: They have levels that CAN NOT be won. I spent 2 weeks on the same level unable to beat it. Made it so far just to be blocked by a level with no way to beat it without spending your real money. I don't recommend this game for anyone. It is glitch and rigged
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! If a level feels too hard, combining boosts could be the answer to winning it. We are also constantly monitoring the difficulty and we'll take your feedback into account.

scraped_reviews.content: its a cute game, though once you get to level 300 its impossible to beat. Except if you spend real money to get more items to help you. Also the where you make post with your squishmallows and stickers, the sticker option needs work on since its a pain to move or size them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We've tried our best to make the game challenging but not unfair. We are also constantly balancing it so you may see the difficulty fluctuate. We are also thinking of ways to make the sticker/feed experience better.

scraped_reviews.content: Like the game, but don't like levels occasionally hanging, getting to the point where my phone was kind of freezing. Wondering if there's a memory leak somewhere. Just played one level and when it tries to load and it freezes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're very sorry you had issues with the game. We are constantly working on bug fixes, so please check back in a little while if you want to retry the game.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a fun game but I don't get rewards for placing high in the limited events and now the current one isn't working at all. Not giving me progress. Game doesn't work well and why am I putting effort into trying to do the events and they don't even update or give rewards. Disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! There was a recent bug that broke one yellow event. We are very sorry about this, it should now be fixed. If you contact support, they can help you restore any missing rewards.

scraped_reviews.content: i love this game and love this brand but ive been stuck on level 300 for days and cannot complete it. its impossible with the number of moves and the only way to get past it is with the perfect set up. its enjoyable but some of the levels are just unbelievably difficult
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! If a level seems too difficult, try combining boosts within the level to get an advantage!

title: Twitch: Live Streaming
description:
Welcome to the Purple App, where thousands of communities come together for our favorite streamers, for the games we love, for the lulz, for each other, for whatever. Download Twitch and join millions enjoying live games, music, sports, esports, podcasts, cooking shows, IRL streams, and whatever else crosses our community’s wonderfully absurd minds. We’ll see you in chat.

Here’s a convenient list of other awesome things about Twitch:

Everyone is “about” community. We actually are one: Whatever you nerd out about, you can find your people on Twitch. 
Give support, get support: Find new streamers and subscribe to your favorites. Plus,  unlock exclusive perks for your support. 
Start your own channel: The Twitch app is one of the easiest ways to start streaming. Just create an account, go live directly from the app, and bring people together around whatever you’re passionate about. 
You never know what you’ll find: Popular games are always live, but so are music festivals, rocket launches, street tours of Tokyo, and goat yoga. Yes, really. 
Dark mode: Y’all love this one. Black and purple have never looked this good together.

Twitch's Terms of Service are available at https://www.twitch.tv/p/legal/terms-of-service/
For feedback and assistance, please visit our Support Center: https://help.twitch.tv
 
Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see http://priv-policy.imrworldwide.com/priv/mobile/us/en/optout.html for more information
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Purple App, where thousands of communities come together for our favorite streamers, for the games we love, for the lulz, for each other, for whatever. Download Twitch and join millions enjoying live games, music, sports, esports, podcasts, cooking shows, IRL streams, and whatever else crosses our community’s wonderfully absurd minds. We’ll see you in chat.

Here’s a convenient list of other awesome things about Twitch:

Everyone is “about” community. We actually are one: Whatever you nerd out about, you can find your people on Twitch.
Give support, get support: Find new streamers and subscribe to your favorites. Plus, unlock exclusive perks for your support.
Start your own channel: The Twitch app is one of the easiest ways to start streaming. Just create an account, go live directly from the app, and bring people together around whatever you’re passionate about.
You never know what you’ll find: Popular games are always live, but so are music festivals, rocket launches, street tours of Tokyo, and goat yoga. Yes, really.
Dark mode: Y’all love this one. Black and purple have never looked this good together.

Twitch's Terms of Service are available at https://www.twitch.tv/p/legal/terms-of-service/
For feedback and assistance, please visit our Support Center: https://help.twitch.tv

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see http://priv-policy.imrworldwide.com/priv/mobile/us/en/optout.html for more information
summary: Stream, Watch, Chat. Live.

scraped_reviews.content: The mobile app is isolating itself from the rest of twitch. they have increased subscription rates, and tried to 'balance it out' by removing the ability to upgrade subscriptions. I tried doing it on my computer, but was told that I cannot upgrade mobile subscriptions anywhere else, but I have spent almost an hour looking for ways to do as much on the app to no avail. I have to cancel my subscription then resubscribe on my computer in a month to actually do a high tier subscription.

This app sucks for phone. You can't search a person and go directly to their profile, you have to click on their vid or their live stream. Not only that, but you can't just click their name and block them, you have to click their name in chat (assuming they even chat) and then you can block them. Unless I have to report them first. Aside from all of that, this app is generally hard to understand. It feels too rushed and money centered.

Bad customer support! I got a new phone number and forgot to change it on the app before switching. For some reason, my two-step authentication app, which was authy, expired. Now I'm stuck not being able to log in on new devices, and there's no live customer support chat to help solve the issue. Emails keep telling me the same thing that it's a problem with Authy! I'm an affiliate, too, that just got a new streaming setup, so I'm a little upset!

This appears to currently be the only semi-functional app left for Android devices... It's useful for at least listening to streams, as well as a secondary device for chat if you are watching on another streaming device, but the tiny screen doesn't make it ideal for watching streams (unless that's your only option, but I wouldn't recommend it if not on wifi; watching streams can run through a lot of mobile data). I still stick to PC for most Twitch use whenever possible...

An infuriating user experience from top to bottom. Pages often refresh, causing you to do actions you didn't intend (such as accidentally deleting clips/videos you didn't mean to delete). The homepage scroll is the most poorly implemented video scroll ever. Streams stutter and lag, and the app has a hard time loading videos in general. Genuinely just watch from desktop

The last update made twitch drop completely inaccessible. Another update has been released and nothing changed. Updates keep coming but the app is still broken. ridiculous. Another update and still can't access anything. I'll run out of space to type before it's fixed. Update: previous issues were finally fixed but now I'm not earning any progress toward twitch drops, so it doesn't really matter.

The app feels great and looks pretty good, but after the recent update some of the pages don't work anymore. For 1 the drops page isn't easy to access and when you do use it you can't see the drops info or quickly go to a stream who has it active. And 2 the clips and shorts seem to be a little forced on you as if this is tictok, I'd rather it not be forced on me.

Fix the mobile streaming widget bubble. The mobile streaming widget barely works: when in landscape orientation it doesn't show the chat, or the camera, and hasn't for over a year at least. Now when I try to open the widget in either orientation with it not to the far left, it gets cut off by the right side of the screen. Also now when I try to close it in portrait orientation it blocks it from reaching the X at the bottom of the screen so I can't close it. Can you fix any of that at all?

The app is just overall clunky. It forces you to watch someone's live when you open it which is terribly annoying because then it will get stuck playing in the background while I struggle to find the streamer that I want. then when I do find them it's then playing the sound from both streams. Then it struggles to load the stream that I wanted though it had no problems loading the random live. There's no easy way to find the streamer that I want and it doesn't save what I've watched already.

I don't want a landscape stream lazily stretched and blurred to a full portrait, especially when it's someone i don't care about because you can't get suggestions right. The following button has moved to the upper left, which is the least convenient place for the only mode i care about. Let following be my default. It also sometimes causes a bug where the suggested stream audio plays at the same time as the stream i actually want. But no, give us mod tools that suck instead.

Starting like a week ago, the whole app takes a lot of time to load or straight up, never decide to load. It's not my wifi because every other app/game works completely fine. Also, the chat on streams is working completely fine. Sometimes, the stream that im watching pauses, and I can't unpauses. Having ads every 5-10 minutes was already annoying , but now the whole app is unusuable. Don't have an ad blocker. Tried clearing the cache. Tried deleting and installing, but nothing works.

This can be good and it can be not so good. I guess it depends on the weather. I rely on it for live chat during my own livestreams on the platform, and sometimes it just bombs hard. Sometimes it works well though, and I'm always grateful for those times, but the random disconnects, crashes, and absolutely baffling mobile subscription rules keep me from giving it any higher than an average rating.

Went from perfect to terrible, specifically with watching vods. Collections never have the vods in them no matter what. The app has been updated several times, and vods still aren't appearing in collections. Someone I follow has 36 vods in a collection, and when I open it, it says there's none. Please fix it. If I miss a stream, I can literally never watch it again due to this issue.

Recent updates to the application have begun to follow a popular pattern where the application, if left to have permission to your notifications shade, will start to spam you in regards to multiple things you never signed up for notification on. As such, I've had to permanently disable this applications access to notifications because it chose to abuse that trust, and now I no longer get notifications when streamers go live, which is all I originally wanted notifications for.

Dec 9, 2024: Gave it another try after seeing reviews some things were improved. It's better. It didn't open blasting things in my face. The Following tab is very large and visible now. PIP works alright, and landscape mode can have chat to the side (you need tap some icon to see the full frame next to chat). Still would rather I had an option for it to open to the last tab I was viewing (Following). Still not interested in this new discovery tab *most* of the time. It's much less bad!

every time i want to watch a streamer i like, i can't because of the time zone difference (that's okay). so then i plan on watching the vod because they're available, but i can't. Why? because of how annoyingly bad the video playback is. i can't go a full five minutes without buffering occurring for like a minute. even when i reverse or fast forward. there's always buffering. i pause and unpause, and there's buffering there, too. How have you guys not fixed this yet???

The app somehow becomes worse in 2024. It used to be pretty good and functional. Now, whenever I want to go to a particular time in a VOD, somehow it's janky. Like sometimes it won't register my input. Not to mention, sometimes when watching a VOD, it would just buffer endlessly. It's most likely not my phone because the app used to run very well on a lower end phone I used to own.

Twitch is a very nice app to watch streamers and live content but the only downside is sometimes they'll update the mobile version and it gets confusing. I also find that every now and then my streams lag behind and I'm unsure why but I have to restart the app to fix it, but overall it's a good app to use!

Very poor Chromecast support. Doesn't cast at the highest resolution by default. It also constantly forgets it's casting, so if you reopen the app to pause, it just starts playing in the app, despite it should know it's casting to another device. In general, it doesn't remember your position when watching VODs. Annoying trying to find your position again in a four hour video with no fine grain controls.

Can't verify account as it doesn't send the code to your phone number for unknown reasons. Seems to be a heavily reccuring issue that many people had brought up in various platforms and even contacted twitch to ask them to resolve this issue for at least more than half a year. Surprise surprise they have not address this issue, no word Abt it.

Oct 21 2024: Watching streams on my phone is LITERALLY unwatchable. The stream skips and pauses and loses connection. Bad. 8/28/2024: I really hate this latest mobile app update. I get switched to lives from ones I'm watching (and not by design). I'll get doubled up on audio from the streams I'm watching and other lives. I'm struggling to collect steam points. The mobile update has really made using the app worse.

The app gets worse with every update. Chat fails to load half the time, the new feed has terrible stream suggestions that have nothing to do with my interests, and the "viewers (high to low)" filter doesn't even work in a category. I shudder to think what else they might break next update. Oh well, at least the overlay chat on a stream is nice.

The new app layout is horrible and has a mind of its own. I'll be watching a stream, and it randomly switches to another stream without touching anything. I hope the latest update fixes it. (August 26 2024) August 31 '24: Now, I will randomly hear 2 streams at once, and then eventually, it will switch to another stream. Go back to the way it was. This isnt yt shorts or tiktok.

Unusable, covered in ads. App itself runs terribly, constant desync issues and the UI/UX is one of the worst I've ever used on any app. Then the ads... by far the worst, most invasive and pervasive ads you will ever see on any platform and it's not even close. For every minute of a stream you watch, expect about 10 minutes of ads. It's almost comical how beyond awful this company and app are. There are more ads than content worth watching, as someone that used to like twitch- it is a lost cause

The UI is unintuitive and difficult to navigate. There are always audio glitches where the stream plays over itself, causing delays and echoes. It's a 50/50 chance whether the stream you're listening to keeps playing after closing the lock screen. I'm really not impressed with the app, considering the amount of money Twitch/Amazon has.

I like how the app used to be. Clips had sound. I could find channels easily. How it's set up where it shows previews. and you can't just go to the channels you follow. All things about the new set up is just bad and inconvenient. It's even more difficult to close out the app. It shouldn't be so hard to restart the app

Opening screen is terrible. Sometimes I get switched to new streams without input when the first stream is still going. Knocked down to 3. I just got 6 ads before a stream which I sat through. After the ads, the stream was frozen so I had to back out and reload at which point I got served 6 more ads. This type of thing isn't uncommon.

The UI is absolutely horrible after the update. I want the old one back. They went from having decent UI to making it look like they just copied tiktok. Which is horrible because usually you have your streamers that you watch. Now you have to scroll past all the ones you don't want to see. Or click the following list. Where you don't see the preview of what's currently happening on their stream. They need to fire the UI guy/team and find someone that's actually good.

App gets stuck after the forced ad plays. I've tried everything from clearing cache to clearing all data, but have to watch the same ad be played again and again only to get stuck when the selected stream is supposed to play. Embarrassing how a brand as big as twitch can't quality control the most basic of things.

The new UI is absolutely horrendous. Whoever designed it is out of touch. Oh you wanna continue watching a video you recently closed? Can't do that. You have to find the channel first and find it there, and hopefully it remembers in which part you left off. I would say more but there's a character limit in reviews. Please, revert back to the old design. Don't fix what's not broken!!!

Finally updated the app after having been pestered about it for a while, expecting fixes to some bugs, the most annoying of which being Twitch replaying ads you've just seen after pausing and unpausing a stream to refresh it. Instead, I was greeted with an ugly, inconvenient TikTok-eqsue UI, with no notable bug fixes or improvements. Silly me for thinking updates are for improving apps instead of making them worse.

After the new UI update, this app has become harder to use. It seems they're going for a TikTok like experience, but it is not working. The new Live tab the app opens up on is not only unnecessary but also very inconvenient. I always immediately swipe out of it. Clips are now also much harder to interact with as they now don't show chat replay. My biggest problem is with endless scrolling. It gets stuck in an endless loop almost every time, showing the same streams/clips repeatedly

Continuous crashes and freezing, I can't even use the category search feature because it causes the app to crash. If you already have a streamer you want to watch its fine and works well, but if you're looking for something new or don't know what to watch just figure it out on desktop first otherwise you're screwed.

Android is missing the majority of the drops due to authentication and is not able to click on the drops in the app. Been an ongoing issue. If it's just me, please fix for Fold 6. Thanks. Also, I'm not a fan of ads taking up the whole screen and not being able to see the streamer, usually you could see a little box so you're not missing out but not on here. Most settings are hidden away in the profile cogwheel which is probably why nothing ever gets updated on mobile.

Recently it has had issues streaming games in landscape mode. In the stream and VOD it is strangely letterboxed and the bottom portion of the game is cut off. It used to be great. Since it now requires selecting orientation before streaming I assume games that constantly switch can no longer be streamed either. Often crashes when viewing other's streams as well, especially during ad breaks. Edit: Revising to 1☆. Streaming no longer works at all after today's update.

Terrible App. twitches video player is literally 100 years behind every other video platform it's actually insane. Constant lag and buffering on perfect connection is just unacceptable and not being able to rewind on the app is just pathetic. YouTube will forever be on top. don't forget to mention the constant ads. sometimes the ad break is literally 10 minutes of just ads like are y'all dumb thinking that was a good idea? I hate you twitch.

It crashes all the time. It crashes when you skip time, when you turn the screen off, and when you try to chat. No sleep timer either. [2024 Update:] The app got even worse. Crashes even more now. The time skips repeatedly. The sound cuts out. Two streams start playing simultaneously. This is literally one of the worst apps I have ever used. [2025 Update:] I can't believe it. CHAT WILL NOT EVEN FUNCTION. YOU CAN'T EVEN CHAT. WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE. Update: Chat is still not working.

okay. I love the app. it would be perfect if not for two aspects. You know the first one, there are too many ads. but the other one I think I need to talk about a bit more. I feel like there should be a setting you put on streams to tell you the age range. It should be a requirement. I am tired of asking if it is okay for someone my age to be watching. It will make it user friendly. Or an alternative option if you don't want to make a new setting is to require streamers to put it in the title.

Twitch/Amazon/Bezos have more than enough money, there's no reason this app should be so bad. The ads are way too frequent/intrusive. Glitchy, terrible UI/UX. It feels like every time I try to tap on anything my screen moves around and I end up clicking on something else (usually a twitch story because for some reason that section likes to pop in and out of existence even though I'd be surprised if anyone has ever *actually* wanted to use or engage with it because this isn't TikTok).

I have no right to stream. the security system is always flooding me with phone number verifications. many people out there dont even have a phone number or have permission to use someone else's. and that's the kind of problem im in. and my Google account got hacked and there's no way to recover it with email cause I tried and entered my username for reset and it didn't work. even when I press "forgot" to move onto the steps because I was confused, it didn't send the email to change my password
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, did your problem get resolved? If not, please let us know at https://link.twitch.tv/TwitchSupport.

scraped_reviews.content: great app if you can afford to pay the absolutely ridiculous prices they ask for. unfortunately, if you can't afford to waste money you're gonna be watching 5 back-to-back 15 second ads every 10 minutes. it's unbearable. for streams that are doing drops, that number only goes up too. if they lowered the price to $10/month i would buy it, but the amount of ads running feels disrespectful anyway

The banner ads are fine. But having several unskippable ads during a live stream is not good. Makes more sense to put the full screen ads on a previously recorded stream and banner ads on the live stream. Made it difficult to enjoy the stream and quickly lost interest.

Homepage blows, streams lag all the time. Will force your max quality to 360p. You cant mute streams and listen to something else, the app is actually useless, Just use your browser. Edit after a few years, app still blows. Uninstalled, they decided i need notifications for justin beiber... yeah no... I'd rather use the website page instead..

the past few updates, the Twitch app just continues to go downhill, drops are essentially inaccessible as you cannot view details of the drops you're trying to claim, you still earn the drops but unless you go on the Web you can't view details, and the connection to streams lags. the past few months, there have been a few bugs with the app that have either not been addressed or they've been ignored.

Mobile needs work. I'm subbed at tier 2 to a streamer and the channel points bubble pops for only 14 points which is less than half of what it normally pops for a non sub and I've tried everything. Also a lack of options like gigantic emotes and on screen celebrations, I'm honestly not sure why that can't be implemented. Basically limiting the experience.

can't comment, vods don't work, constant buffering, can't verify both email and phone number, notifs of channels I don't ever heard of; if you think Twitch hasn't irreparably befall an anvil to their app in ANY facet, you'd be proven wrong in a few minutes. It's laughable how utterly terrible this app has become. It wasn't like this a few years back...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, did your problem get resolved? If not, please let us know at https://link.twitch.tv/TwitchSupport.

scraped_reviews.content: currently unusable on both beta program and stable release, nothing loads besides the UI, all images, streams and vods do not load, ive tried every single thing i could and havent been responded to for a good minute on my ticket, fix your stability on a14 and other android devices i keep seeing people have issues on. That's all im saying.

Mobile app is working with minor glitches. I like the improvements to chat treads and mobile mod controls. VODs do this weird thing when played in the background. It will get stuck on a certain part of the vod. Then, each time I turn my phone screen on and then off, it will track back to that spot in the tracking. Now, I can't access the settings at all....everything on the overlay works except the settings button. *VOD BUG FIXED I THINK* 5*

Can't see chat when my phone is held sideways while I stream. it used to work but since the update it doesn't work anymore. please fix this issue for anyone else dealing with this too. the screen is blank when I open the chat box while my phone is sideways. everything else is there but chat.

They took away to control stream quality while casting, and now it cycles down to low quality a few seconds after I start the stream (then when I lock/unlock my phone with the app up, it cycles back up, then down). The app worked fine before, when I could force the quality to 1080p, so Twitch/Amazon is doing something to lower the quality just to annoy Google Cast users

title: MyFitnessPal: Calorie Counter
description:
Achieve your nutrition, calorie, macro, and fitness goals with MyFitnessPal. MyFitnessPal is a comprehensive food and fitness tracker, with everything you need to reach your goals. Macros, calories, food, and workouts – track it all in one place.

Change your habits with fitness and food. Download our health and nutrition app and start your free Premium trial today. With MyFitnessPal, you have access to exclusive food inspiration, an intermittent fasting tracker, fitness logging tools, expert guidance, and the calorie tracker. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 nutrition and food tracking app in the U.S and has been featured in the New York Times, Forbes, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.


MyFitnessPal is more than a calorie tracker & food journal. Monitor your health and fitness progress within the app.

MYFITNESSPAL FEATURES

Food Tracker – Track Calories & Macros
■ Food tracking made easy. Quickly log your meals throughout your day from over 20.5 million foods (including restaurant dishes) from one of the largest food databases available
■ Macro tracker lets you see carbs, fat, & protein breakdown—no need for a separate app! Set goals for macros, protein, sodium, fiber, and more
■ Make sure you’re staying hydrated with our water tracker

Fitness – Track Workouts, Weight, and Progress
■ Activity Tracker – Add workouts and steps with the integrated fitness tracker
■ See Your Fitness Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze the details of your diet & macros
■ Stay Inspired – Keep your diet and fitness routine exciting with workouts and food inspiration
■ Exercise and Count Calories – See how your workouts, fitness, and diet affect daily calorie goals
■ Track With Wear OS – A calorie counter, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch. Add complications to the home screen for faster logging, and the tile for tracking different nutrients at a glance.

Workouts & Meal Plans, Tailored to You
■ Customize your health & fitness goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition, & fitness
■ Personalized dashboards – Fitness, health, and diet stats are all in one place to easily see and track your progress

■ Add Your Own Meals/Food Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging and keep tabs on your diet
■ Follow the new easy meal planner to simplify tracking and help hit your goals
■ Connect 40+ Apps & Devices – From smartwatches, fitness trackers, and other health and fitness apps, track your intake and activity through your watch with WearOS
■ Get Connected– Find friends and motivation in our active MyFitnessPal forums

Premium
■ Reach your goals with barcode scan, meal scan, and voice logging
■ Customize macros and set custom goals
■ Enjoy ad-free food logging with insights and comparisons built into premium 
■ Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – Keep track of your low-carb or keto diet, view net carbs in your food

Premium Plus - Expanded Features to Help Hit Your Goals
■ All of the Premium features, like barcode scanning now available with meal planning
■ Personalized meal plans, integrated grocery delivery, and smart meal tracking tools
■ Your one-stop shop for meal planning, grocery shopping, food logging, and nutrition insights to help you reach your goals
■ 1000s of healthy recipes to help you reach your goals

MyFitnessPal is the leading health and nutrition app that helps you learn about your food habits, monitor your diet and conquer your health goals.

Download Today and Start Your Free Premium Trial

View our terms & conditions and privacy policy: 
https://www.myfitnesspal.com/terms-of-service
https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-policy

summary: Monitor and track your macros, nutrition, macro tracking, and meal planning

scraped_reviews.content: Basic and counterintuitive with its layout, but otherwise it's pretty good for what it's worth, I've lost nearly 100 lbs! But the app's been getting more unstable these past few months. It's very laggy, the search bar shuffles around text as I type, I can't search for my own foods/meals anymore, and I keep getting spontaneously get signed out. Yesterday I got signed out while using the app, and it reset some of my settings. It's getting frustrating and I'm considering switching apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our apologies for any problems you are having. For additional support please visit: https://myfitnesspal.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new or send an email to support@myfitnesspal.com.

scraped_reviews.content: While I have been using the app since 2013, the latest update has ruined the functionality of the app. Previously, I could type a brand name into the search and pull up recent items. Now I have to type in a keyword from the item description. Bring back the ability to search by brand! It also deleted all my recent foods and I now have to re-enter them. An update should make the app better, not break previous functionality!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologies for this experience. We are aware of this issue and hope to have it fixed soon! Thank you for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be a great app, but the most recent update is a major step back. Meals you save and then use on another day used to put the exact foods, so you could easily customize amounts. Now the meal gets added as a single item Search algorithm got a huge downgrade. You used to be able to search by maker and no longer can. Searching Starbucks in my recents doesn't bring up my Starbucks drinks, I now need to type the specific drink
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It sounds like you may be encountering a new bug. To help our team further investigate this, we kindly ask that you write into us directly at support@myfitnesspal.com. We greatly appreciate any further context you can provide!

scraped_reviews.content: What Am I paying for, if every time I do a search for something I ate within the last day doesn't show up? This is annoying and time consuming. There really isn't much of an advantage to paying for a premium membership if I have to go through all the extra work to find the foods that I'm commonly eating anyway. Perhaps it's an algorithm change to get people to pay for the premium plus. Regardless, I likely will not be renewing my membership.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our apologies for any problems you are having. We have several fixes coming to address this bug and a few others affecting the Recent and Frequent lists in versions 25.37.0 and future versions of the app.

title: Petal Maps – GPS & Navigation
description:
Petal Maps is a unique map that lets you explore the world around you in new ways. Available in over 160 countries and regions, it provides real-time traffic conditions, lane-level guidance, nearby services, various map layers, traffic events, place favorites, and loads more.

Real-time traffic data for faster and safer travel
· Recommends the quickest, shortest, and least congested route based on a combination of real-time traffic conditions and your personal preferences. You can even add multiple stops to your routes.
· Explore your route options and familiarize yourself with the way in advance.
· Provides accurate lane-level guidance for more precise navigation, helping you find your way through a wide variety of complex scenarios with ease.
· Allows you to report police locations, road closures, accidents, and more. You'll be able to see things reported by other users too.
· Supports navigating via HUAWEI WATCH 3, GT2, and GT3 series watches, with multiple modes of travel available – including walking, cycling, and public transportation.
· Lets you download offline maps so you can keep navigating even without an Internet connection.

Information for tons of local businesses
· Discover great local businesses through recommendations. You can even use voice search to find places to eat, drink, and hang out.
· Conveniently search for gas stations, parking lots, and loads more – allowing you to travel worry-free.
· Organize your favorite places by dividing them into separate lists with their own icons.
· Keep your devices in sync with each other by syncing your data to the cloud with HUAWEI Mobile Cloud or Dropbox.

Maintain the map together
· Help others decide where to go by rating and reviewing places on the map.
· Add new places and report or edit incorrect information.

You can send us questions and suggestions in the following ways. Your feedback will be dealt with as soon as possible.
Provide feedback in the app via Me > Help > Feedback.
Other channels:
Facebook-https://www.facebook.com/petalmapsglobal
Twitter-https://twitter.com/petalmaps
Instagram-https://www.instagram.com/petalmaps/

*Some features are only available in certain countries/regions

summary: Explore the world with Voice guided navigation, transit, cycle, walk & hike！

scraped_reviews.content: The newest update for Petal Navigation is a big step forward. While there are a few annoying aspects to the voice- it calls "drive" dia and driveway in a somewhat random fashion but that doesn't prevent one from finding their way and the voice is clear and friendly. It beaks down its measurements so you get .70, .75, and .80 instead of .70 and .80. Not a big difference but I like that better. It becomes the first navigation system to vocalize red light information. That's very helpful!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, welcome to contact us via Facebook group-Petal Maps Family or click "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" and submit the details, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: A really nice app, but not a Google Maps killer, yet. I really loved the app, but in order for me to actually be able to make use of it, it needs to work with Android Auto. 95% of my usage with any map navigation occurs in the car, on my nice big center console screen with Android Auto. When Petal Maps can do that too, I may be a convert.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you very much for your recognition of Petal Maps, Android Auto is already in our plan, but the specific implementation time is undecided, you can contact us through the Facebook-Petal Maps Family group at any time, we are willing to continue to improve our product based on your feedback, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: Looks good and interesting to try, especially free nav app with with HUD mode But things that prevent me to try further: - no option to customize the appearance, the text in maps and menu too small. You can read clearly when you hold the phone/tablet, but once you put the phone/tablet on the dashboard it just look too small. - no option to shows poi along the route.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps. We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking the time to send us your feedback! If you have any other questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day 😊

scraped_reviews.content: Much better than I expected. I'm considering switching to it from now on. Edit: I think a way to improve it would be to have an option to keep the speedlimit sign on the screen all the time. Also, an option to remove the visual promt when approaching a roundabout or taking a slip road. Often I find that more confusing than helpful. And have a british male and female navigation voice, along with the american ones. Other than that, looks pretty good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review! If you have any suggestions on how we could improve and enhance your user experience, please don't hesitate to share them with us.

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent GPS navigation app, clear navigation, and visually pleasing. I just had to uninstall it due to the voices, the female is in American English, and it's not nice when you are driving in the UK and you are listening to an American voice giving you instructions. In the other hand in Spanish, you can choose a great selection of Spanish voices from Spanish speaking countries. I will try this app again in six months time, to see if this has changed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for rating us. Please share your ideas on how we can make the app better at mapteam@huawei.com. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Really really wanted to like this app, and absolutely happy to admit if I have done something wrong, but it's just really bad. Zooming out just shows a block for what's rendered in. The map is slow, the route never loads. The voice makes me jump every time and is horrible to listen too. I can't see any detail on the road when I click navigate and just shows a line with little to no road markings. Unless I'm doing something wrong, is completely unusable.

I do like the app and the features, in particular the AR-powered walking mode. The biggest bug-bear I have is the English guidance voice. There are 22 different country versions of Spanish, various country versions of French, Portuguese, German & Dutch. Why oh why are we stuck with a single version of the most spoken language in the world - an American voice pronouncing instructions and places as if we're all living in the mid-West, and not in UK, Australia, South Africa, New Zealand or Canada!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at mapteam@huawei.com.

scraped_reviews.content: When it comes to mapping and guidance, it's ok. But I also enjoy listening to music or audiobooks when driving. And more often than seldom, the heads up "ding" will "duck" the volume of my audio and not release it afterwards. This is very annoying. So annoying that I'm not using this app. And the highest level of prompting is so talkative that it's distracting. The traffic bar: Doesn’t work. No space left to explain.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to mapteam@huawei.com. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used Garmin sat-navs for the past 20 years. The algorithm on Petal is very similar in the routes suggested. I like the offline option and the speed that any re calculations are made. My ranking is reduced to 4 stars for two reasons - which I hope will be attended to. 1. The walking mode in offline use is not currently supported, and there are a large number of walkways that do not exist on the map. 2. The English voice and terminology is American. Australian or BBC English would be better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: Petal Maps is my favourite go-to navigation app on my phone and tab, because of its sleek user interface that's easy to navigate. It offers me fast and reliable directions, making it a great choice for those who are always on the go. Whether I'm driving, walking, or cycling, Petal Maps has me covered. It's also highly customizable, allowing me to personalize my experience and make it my own. Petal Maps is a top-notch navigation app that's definitely worth checking out!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, welcome to contact us via Facebook group-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: The look is nice. Although obviously, the maps don't work with Android Auto, neither native Ford infotainment. It will be difficult to use as such in the car. I guess there will be gradual progress with the accuracy, functionalities. Though when choosing the alternative product to Google, it shall be already well cooked. Otherwise the experience just fade away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Jarek. Your suggestions are very valuable. We will continue to optimize the product and take the functions you mentioned into consideration. We look forward to your continuous experience.

scraped_reviews.content: By far the best alternative to Google Maps I have used. It's very clear on providing instructions for the most part. However, I've been having issues on certain roads where the navigator tells you to "turn right" when it's actually meaning you should continue on the road by keeping right. It's also pronounced cities wrong sometimes. The illustration at intersections to help you move into the correct lane would be useful if they showed a more zoomed out pane or forward view
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your rating for Petal Maps. We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. If you have any other questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day 😊

scraped_reviews.content: Love it but... no speed cameras! Interface is the best! Simple and useful. But not presenting speed cameras is, for me, a huge drawback. I was available to use it all time but, without this, I cannot; therefore, I cannot give 5 stars. Another thing a little bit annoying is that (in Playstore) presents functionalities that aren't available for Android, like (for example) lane guidance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, welcome to contact us via Facebook group-Petal Maps Family or click "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" and submit the details, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: I cannot believe I did not find this map earlier! It has up-to-date maps, clear navigation (the voices need a bit of work) even without voice guidance, as the route to be taken stands out really well and the map moves perfectly to the appropriate view on start and at places where options to take other routes are available, or need to be taken and all the while avoiding traffic! You can transfer your favourites from other maps too; dropped pins show as longitude-latitude. Cannot fit all here!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, it is a great app. Great knowledge of routes ahead and great voice instructions. The only issue I had was the would constantly lose signal and try to reconnect. Also, sometimes it gives wrong directions and may find it difficult to get you back on track. There's also a lot of room for improvement for the user experience. The interface is not user-friendly at all and it can be quite a mission to set up a from and to address.

On my Samsung A55 it is working badly. Installed two days ago and not sure is it due to phone or application, but it is bad functioning. And I deleted app. What I criticize are: 1. no voice announcements at all (only once I heard one), which is crucial miss. 2. there is no number of exit on traffic circles, and no voice info. 3. bad (pure) maps: no signs for gas stations, restorans, shopping etc. There are more but no place to write. Anyhow you must to look at screen all the time during driving.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for rating Petal Maps! We kindly invite you to update the map by downloading the latest version from the Huawei App Gallery. For further assistance, feel free to reach out by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or via our Facebook group - Petal Maps Family. Have a wonderful day! 😊

scraped_reviews.content: The best of Waze and Sygic in one app: online or offline maps, progress bar, hazard reporting, automatic dark map in tunnels, information about petrol stations and rest areas ahead, and much more. Plus nice, simplistic design. Cons: extremely talkative (no need to tell me about every highway exit I drive by), inaccurate and fluctuating speed indication, hazard locations way off as the location is from the moment of sending and not pressing the 'Report' button.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
Your problem needs more detailed examination. Please report it to our technical support team at mapteam@huawei.com. We are always looking to help our users.

scraped_reviews.content: This is useless, I get a "Starting Navigation" voice with the destination and an initial turn instruction, then no further voice prompts for the rest of the journey. You can't keep looking at the phone to read the directions at the top of the screen, that's just dangerous. All Volume, Navigation Prompts are set to the loudest level, and still only get the initial message. Ah well, it was nice to try something different, but back to Google Maps for me.

The petal maps is really nice. I like the system of this app, that's why I give a 5 star of it. It is highly recommended to install. However, I still experience some bugs like when I choose my route the maps is logging like it moves on its own in 49 - 50 km/h. That's why when it's happening I re-open again the map to fixed the problem. And the lane guidance I think what you called it, sometimes it does not work when I'm turning, it does not appear. However, it works perfectly fine and I like it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are really sorry for the trouble and we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. We will look into this further!

scraped_reviews.content: The interface is so good, loved it. But all said and done when the main function of navigation map is to guide us to our destination the best way possible either lesser toll/trafic light, the shortest and so on, Petal Maps failed really bad at this due to the fact their map is not up to date. Was using it for a week and 3 days I encountered outdated map. 30 minutes drive became 2 hours. The maximum were 4 wrong un-updated map navigation instructions, make us waste so much time and energy. SKIP!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are really sorry for the trouble and we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention.
