scraped_reviews.content: I used it again several years after uninstall this app, still few issues i have encountered. Automatically Reroute is still slow af (compare to google or waze), which is a big disappointment. The route options (which you could choose best overall, shortest distance, fastest distance and etc.) Should be allowed in one screen when we started to navigate, so that we can compare. I couldn't find the share link/location button like we can do in Google or Waze. User friendly still these 2 apps better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Sebastian, we’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned.Please contact us via Facebook-Petal Maps Family or click "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" and submit the details.We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it, we hope to get your 5-star review,thank you and wish you a nice day:)

scraped_reviews.content: Very promising features but routing still needs to be better. It has many features such as speed limit, lane guidance, but the routing is occasionally wrong, examples, guide me to go through private apartment or routing to make a U-turn further away when can just turn right from a minor road into a main road. I don't think I would use as the main navigation app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for rating us! We would appreciate it if you could share your starting and destination location for us to conduct further investigation. Your feedback helps us enhance our product. Contact us via "Me" > "Feedback" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family. Have a great day!😊

scraped_reviews.content: I do like the whole UI compared to Google Map, but the accuracy is losing. It can't bring me home, but point to another location which is 5mins drive away... The route are sometimes messed up, example instead of going straight,it ask me to make a turn, and U-turn back to the same road, rerouting is also very slow as well... Still have much space to improve...

Petal maps has caused us problems. It lists our address with a different number and does not list our number at all, as if no such number exists. This results in not receiving packages when the delivery persons use Petal Maps. I have searched for a way to suggest or ask for a correction of the error like Google maps does, but it seems there is non.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are really sorry for the trouble and we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. Please click "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" and submit the details or contact us via Facebook-Petal Maps Family. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it. Thanks and have a nice day:)

scraped_reviews.content: When it works it is absolutely brilliant and gives really detailed information. However the sat nav will randomly skip instructions and instead just make a staticky sort of noise, and if you lose signal it will cancel your route, even though it already had it loaded. So actually a terrible app because it breaks more often than it works and lets you down when you need it most!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to Facebook-Petal Maps Family. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: Only had a short time, but seems pretty solid. The only thing that I can't find is a way to bring up the step-by-step written directions while I'm driving which is critical when the app changes the route. Also, doesn't always use the street names on the street signs. When on a freeway and you're approaching an interchange, it will show a distance to the freeway but we'll after the interchange it will still say something like 0.6 miles to the freeway you're on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we take the problem you mentioned very seriously, please click ""Me"" > ""Help and Customer Service"" and submit the details or contact us via mapteam@huawei.com, hope we can help you solve this problem and get your 5 stars rating, thanks, and have a nice day. :) "

scraped_reviews.content: It's exceptional overall, does have some issues (like not being able to select which road is closed, many small roads not added in the map yet, low quality voices, not being able to select the speed in the driving preview, etc.) but it's features like lane guidance is still way more convenient compared to Waze, which does have lane guidance, but doesn't show which lane you are in. I really wish an app like this has a way bigger user base because it has so much potential.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, please feel free to contact us via Facebook-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: non optimized display. the app display is extra large and no way to set it to the phones font and display size can't even start navigation as the prompt boxes are not even within screen bounds. the update is not proper. can't sync with watch even
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your rating of Petal Maps. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. To assist you better, please reach out to us via Facebook - Petal Maps Family and message the admin. Thank you, and have a wonderful day! 😊

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great navigation app that I really enjoy using. One of my favorite features is that it shows you which lane to get into before turns and exits. This is so helpful in unfamiliar areas. However, there is room for improvement when it comes to roundabouts. Often the app doesn't specify the correct lane until you are right at the roundabout entrance. I wish it would prompt a little earlier so you have more time to safely get into the prop
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, welcome to contact us via Facebook group-Petal Maps Family or click "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" and submit the details, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: one of my favourite sat nav apps having tried several recently. Unfortunately at the moment I feel it is let down by the 'pop up' which comes up at certain junctions. At first I thought this was helpful but soon found it wasn't clear enough (being too zoomed in at points to be able to see where it was going) and also covered the map which would be more helpful to me. This wouldn't bother me if there was actually a way of turning it off, but there isn't which seems like an oversight to me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback, we'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it. If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Help and suggestion" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: Slow UI, slow map rendering, giant animated banners that can't be removed, and it can't even find a street address. I enter street and building, and it offers me locations half the country away that have not even a syllable in common with what I entered.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to rate our app. We value your feedback and would appreciate it if you could share your search keyword. Your feedback is crucial in helping us to improve our product and serve you better in the future. Please feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family. Wishing you a great day 😊

scraped_reviews.content: after you import the favorite places which are exported ny google or google map, the items are all named ny the date when you import them, the real names (roads, restaurants, museums, schools, etc) can not be shown. It is really a pity. Hope it will be optimized soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Merci pour votre évaluation de Petal Maps. Afin de mieux vous aider, nous vous demandons aimablement des informations supplémentaires. Vous pouvez cliquer sur "Moi" > "Aide et service clientèle" pour soumettre les détails ou nous contacter via Facebook - Petal Maps Family. Merci et passez une excellente journée !😊

scraped_reviews.content: Best Nav by far! Chooses the quickest route instead of the 'tourist route' eliminating most heavily congested areas. The voice gives us a good giggle too with the pronunciation of towns and roads. There is so much detail, telling you which lane to be in and even warning road narrows ahead etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know at mapteam@huawei.com!
Have a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: It's ok. Gave some interesting routes when taxiing. 3 stars because of the ridiculous pop up that appears when approaching a major junction which gets in the way of everything else. Couldn't find an option to deactivate so I've moved on to 'Here we go'.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. To better assist you, we kindly request for additional information. You may click 'Me' > 'Help and Customer Service' to submit the details or contact us via Facebook-Petal Maps Family. We'll pass it along to our development team. Thank you and have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: Had to update the app. The update downloaded into the phone but wouldn't install. Just sat there saying 100% downloaded. Edit. It finally installed several minutes later. Why the delay? All other apps install as soon as they're finished downloading. As for the app, I might give it more stars after using it a bit more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know on Facebook(search Petal Maps Family)! We hope to get your five-star rating.:)

scraped_reviews.content: I was excited to see this App and thought it could be a good alternative to Google Maps but, unfortunately, it's hopelessly outdated. When one tries to navigate to any location in a gated community - of which there are numerous across Gauteng and the rest of the Country, this App, to its credit - always attempts to show you the shortest route but, the problem is, it's always a boomed route! And so, unfortunately, one's left with little choice but to stick with 'the devil you know'.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry that we didn't meet your expectations. Please let us know what we can do to improve. Drop us an email at mapteam@huawei.com and we will definitely try to resolve the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, Good app. Nice substitute for Google Maps. but still needs improvement. From my experience Pro: 1. Complete information on the route. Gives information what exit in the high way you should turn. 2. Information if tunnels ahead and possible lost signal and give advance info if ever signal is lost 3. Vehicle speed and speed limit. Cons: 1. Giving wrong route 2. Can't understand the navigation voice. Suggestions: 1. Option to disable road names in mentioning 2. Traffic light speed trap

Too many notifications!! When notifications set to 'on' I get non-stop alerts to upcoming traffic 3mi away.. 2mi away.. 1mi away.. 1/2mi away... Toll booth 2mi away.. 1mi away.. 1/2mi away.. Approaching toll booth.. I do NOT need this level of detail, I ONLY need to know when to turn! Customizable alerts doesn't do anything to help, and only having the 'alerts' set it makes a ring sound instead of saying everything, but it's as constant and still annoying. And off is just off. Unusable!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand how annoying that must be. We're working on a solution. We hope you'll re-consider the rating once we fix the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: better than Waze, sometimes a little busy. A Couple of trips have been wildly inaccurate with ETA, but it seems to correct itself. I like the look and the features. I would like it if I use a different music player then my chosen default, it appeared in the app app I could control it without leaving Petal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks a ton for your support and for sharing your thoughts with us! Have any more questions or ideas about Petal Maps? Feel free to reach out by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or dropping a message in our Facebook group-Petal Maps Family. Have an awesome day! 😊

scraped_reviews.content: Petal maps has a nice simple intuitive presentation and a lot of potential but cannot yet be considered an alternative to Google maps. I have stored my home location but it keeps showing me locations in other countries. The developers should allow us the ability to add street names and places to the maps. This will help improve the database.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, ShoggyPlay. After the recent update, our application has been able to accept information editing. We look forward to your continuous experience :)

scraped_reviews.content: The good: Side bar visual overview of route is unique & helpful. The bad: Not reliable for routes not often travelled as I got redirected off high way which I ignored & found no issues on highway. Directed me on 25 min longer route to work though shorter route is available. I corrected the information for work address & over a week later still incorrect, same for several addresses. Only American accent available for English, no African languages or accents available.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The route planning issue you mentioned needs further investigation, can you share the details on Facebook-Petal Maps Family? It's better to provide detailed information, such as the latitude and longitude of the start and end points, I will help you on Facebook asap,hope to getting your 5-star review after helping you solve this problem,thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: The best map ever! Everything is extremely accurate, including intersections, speed cameras, and navigation, and the best part for me is that a widget shows up when I have to turn; it helps me a lot to understand which lane I have to turn into. The user interface is simple to use and comprehend, and there are numerous useful options to use as well!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your love and support for Petal Maps! If you have any questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, welcome to contact us via the Facebook group-Petal Maps Family or click "Me" > "Help and Customer Service" and submit the details, Have a nice day :)

scraped_reviews.content: Switched to Petal from Google Maps after Google borked their navigation, and was surprised at how fully featured this navigation system is. Only downsides are the UK voices, all sound incredibly poor quality, to the point I can barely understand them (lots of hissing noises). And prompts are too late, for example, it will say "turn left in 700 yds", but by the time it's finished talking you're 300 yds away, which can be confusing for multiple junctions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to mapteam@huawei.com. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: Best described as work in progress. Adequate for road vehicle navigation (but no vehicle display integration), but wholly inadequate for trail running or hiking as footpaths are missing. Nowwhere near enough detail or contrast to be of value on a watch screen. Currently very disappointing, but hopefully will improve in time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your rating for Petal Maps. We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. If you have any other questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or Facebook-Petal Maps Family, have a nice day 😊

scraped_reviews.content: My main navigation app, but, I don't like updating apps outside the play store. Next, informing me to keep going straight on bypass roads is annoying. Let the whole rout be visible all the time when click on it, let us choose our screen. Riding mode is great, why only in portrait??? Oh, you can not see towns name most of the time which is a great deal. For example when planing routes, you can't see places you are going through. Great design, some great stuff, just small stuff needs improvement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your rating of Petal Maps! Please turn off the "go straight reminders," Please go to Navigation Settings > Custom Mode. We understand your frustration, and your feedback has been shared with our product team for improvements. Feel free to contact us via "Me" > "Feedback" or Facebook - Petal Maps Family. Have a great day! 😊

scraped_reviews.content: Overall I like, but got few issues. The zoomed in map when approaching a junction, etc is out by about 20ft, I'm past the junction before the map catches up so if there are several close turnings not very helpful. Would be good if there was a setting to turn it on/off. When approaching a roundabout it would be good visually to say the number for which exit to take as at times I have the volume down
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

scraped_reviews.content: Very great map, I enjoy the fact that it shows the bar on the side that gives you an overview of the route your on. It helps estimate the traffic conditions, which can help with changing streets if necessary to avoid traffic in LA, since it's always unknown when or where you're going to be stuck in traffic. Would enjoy if you could import a gpx route! Don't know if you can.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know at Facebook-Petal Maps Family! Have a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: I tried using Petal maps for three trips, and on all three occasions I was brought to the wrong location. On the fourth trip, while Petal maps was attempting to recalculate its route, I was told to turn down a one way road that would have led me into oncoming traffic. Not only is this app inaccurate, it is downright unsafe. Rather stick with Waze.

first impression: the map look like from old car game 15 year ago. among the thing I like compare to Google map is: 1. you can see the road lane clearly, so the possibility to miss the lane is low ( will be useful if you're driving in Kuala Lumpur/ Subang/ Klang/ Pulau Pinang, Malaysia) (I do miss lane so many time when I using Google map). 2. It show detail how many traffic light is and price for toll. p/s: (still I might use Google map cause I comfortable already).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your support and for rating us! We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. If you have any other questions or suggestions about Petal Maps, feel free to contact us by clicking "Me" > "Feedback" or via Facebook - Petal Maps South East Asia. Have a great day! 😊

scraped_reviews.content: Auto installed, don't want it, can't delete it. This, and other "petal" apps automatically installed themselves as part of a system update. I don't want them, I didn't ask for them and I wasn't asked about them (or it was hidden in the pages and pages of t's & c's). Very annoyed and frustrated that I can't now uninstall them, and they show up wanting to be updated. Might be time for a new phone, and it won't be a huawai.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at mapteam@huawei.com? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

title: Power Rangers: Legacy Wars
description:
Rita Repulsa, the space witch, has infected the Morphin Grid, creating virtual monsters and Ranger clones programmed to fight on her behalf. Fight back with your own curated team of legendary Power Rangers and villains from the multiverse! Unlock new Rangers, upgrade your best warriors and create the best team to defeat Rita, and save the Morphin Grid.

----------------FEATURES------------------------

BATTLE PLAYERS IN REAL-TIME
Strategize, dodge and fight against real players in real-time multiplayer PvP action and unlock different arenas from iconic locations across the Power Rangers multiverse, including Lord Zedds’ Throne Room, Terror Spacecraft, Dino Lab and more. Test your skills against live players worldwide and move up on the leaderboard.

STUNNING CONSOLE QUALITY GRAPHICS
Experience your favorite Power Rangers and their iconic moves like never before in full-blown 3D with gorgeous visuals and animations. This fighting game looks stunning from the detailed characters to the incredible environments.

COLLECT NEW & ICONIC POWER RANGERS
Unlock new Rangers and collect 80+ warriors ranging from the new movie Power Rangers to classic Rangers across the Power Rangers multiverse. You can also collect villains, including Goldar, Lord Zedd, Psycho Rangers and more.

MEGAZORDS
Battle and brawl with giant Megazords, including Dino Megazord, Mega Goldar, Predazord, Thunder Megazord and more. Customize your Megazord with Mega Attacks. Equip over 12 Mega Abilities to help destroy your opponent. Take your Megazords and join in on the Megazord Alliance Wars where you will battle against other Alliances to lead your Alliance to glory.  

CUSTOMIZABLE TEAMS
Choose your favorite warriors and create the best team to fight for you. Upgrade your favorite warriors to join your squad. With your ultimate team, you can challenge top players in combat from around the world. 

GROW STRONGER
Upgrade your best warriors with Zeo Shards earned through battles, missions and more to increase your winning streaks and battle stats. Become the most powerful team in the world.

TEAM UP WITH YOUR FRIENDS
Build alliances to share, chat and trade tactics, strategy and combos! Watch replays to learn from other members and follow your favorite players. Request and trade shards with other players in your alliance. Take part in Alliance Missions where you can work together to earn Zord Shards, Energy and more.

RAIDS
Battle in the new PvE Raids feature against AI Heroes, Villains, and even Megazords. Join in either the Solo Phase or Alliance Phase where you can earn epic rewards. 

EARN EPIC REWARDS
Fight and battle in PvP and PvE to earn Morph boxes, coins and other rewards. Complete missions and events for exclusive rewards to upgrade your team of warriors and dominate your opponents.

CAPCOM STREET FIGHTERS CROSS-OVER
Fighters from the most popular fighting game of all time enter the Morphin Grid. Collect your favorite Street Fighter characters including Ryu, Chun-Li, Guile, Cammy, M. Bison and Akuma. 

************************************************************************
“20 Best Mobile Games” - Appolicious

“Top 10 Best Android Games” - Tech Vs Entz

“11 Best Android Games That You Shouldn’t Miss” - Guilding Tech

Nominated for “Best Mobile Game” - Best Mobile App Awards

************************************************************************
Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/PowerRangersLegacyWars
Like us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PRLegacyWars
Visit us on Instagram: https://Instagram.com/PowerRangersLegacyWars
www.playlegacywars.com

By downloading this game, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy Agreement.

https://nway.com/terms-of-service/
https://nway.com/privacy-policy/

summary: Experience the Power and become part of the Legacy. It’s Morphin Time!

scraped_reviews.content: a lil too unfair, the game is very pay to win and some characters are way too unbalanced, the game is fun sometimes, but unless you buy premium characters, just don't even bother trying to progress stages. the character selection is great, too bad you have to pay for most of them, and the worst thing in my opinion, is that fact that you are punished for losing, having points taken away and being able to regress stages. it would have potential if the people making it cared a little bit more.

AWESOME GAME, but for some reason there's a bug that prevents me from doing battles, I'd press the "battle" button, and it would say "couldn't connect to server, please check your connection", and I'd press again "an error occurred" and it would take me back to the loading screen, and it would think I was in a battle but I wasn't (it would say "waiting for battle to end" but I never entered a battle.

Love the game but the only thing that I disagree with is how to earn rewards. Also, 2 more slots for morph boxes would be incredible going into the future for mobile gaming. It's just not enough ways to grind for more heroes/villains, crystals, coins and tokens. Been playing since about 2018 and ain't much changed. I love it still, bye for now.

"Skill issue" or not, I am so sick of constantly getting dog walked. I try so hard to level up properly, plan teams, etc. But, I just can't win anything and it's absolutely ridiculous. I just wanna play a solid PR fighter with a diverse roster and have a good time. Unless you sink a ton of dollars into this, you're not gonna have a good time.

My review was deleted for some reason, so I'll post it again. The game is pay to win, simple as that. Characters take longer to release for everyone then they used to, just so ppl will spend money on them. Edit: replacing a few words to report a bug. Cant claim daily login because of the summer login. It bugs the login i assume and it thinks its either claimed or locked.

Tried again after about a year or so, and, it still gets boring due to the gameplay experience. Just make it into a regular fighting game already, like the console version. This game already looks amazing and people's feeling of nostalgia running through it. Have fluid controls and allow for regular combat mechanics, and this game would truly be rated #1 on the mobile market. ...you know what, after a few more days of playing, this game isn't for me. Uninstalled.

Awesome game, yet NWay needs to work on all the constant glitches every once in a while. While in the midst of gameplay, the fights may have sudden glitches. Certain times when you press on an action, the game would glitch then all of a sudden let the other opposing player attack. This has on numerous accounts happened. Other than glitches the game's really great, just waiting for other iconic characters to come into play. I can't wait to see what happens next, best game ever!!!

At best, this game is okay. At worse, it's irritating. This is probably the best Power Rangers game since the Sega Genesis game. Unfortunately, it isn't as fun as it could be. The fact that you slowly level your characters up doesn't seem to really matter. You can have a level 6 common, but when you go up against a level 2 legendary, you most likely already lost before the fight even starts. Those type of matches usually leave you at a disadvantage. It also doesn't seem to matter who throws a punch since it mostly seems to be about luck. Sometimes you'll attack, and even though it hit the opponent, it somehow will still miss and then you get attacked like crazy. Maybe that's just me, but it really does just seem like a game about luck instead of skill. Honestly, a Power Rangers fighting game for a home console is something I continue to wait for, but all I got is a mobile "freemium" game. Again, it's an okay one, but it does become a mediocre game quickly.

It's fun, but with most missions, there is a time limit. For example, right now, I have 3 hours to complete so many megazord fights, but the actual megazord fight won't open for another 6 hours. It's ridiculous to try and complete any missions. Fix that issue and I'd love to give it 5 stars. It so crashes midway through fights and I automatically lose, no compensation.

Unless you like throwing your money out the window to pay for literally every character, don't download this game. They say it's free to play, but there is no way you can compete in the higher leagues with the older characters without shucking out some serious cash. Also, every character released in the past couple of months or so has been Epic and Legendary rarities, so getting them (even if you don't mind spending a few bucks) is almost impossible. You'd have to spend at least $80 to get it.

I'd give it a higher rating, but ever since the most recent update, only about half of the things actually work, and when they work it's only about half the time. It's currently legitimately impossible to open my boxes from my fights I won, and if I don't touch something within 0.00003 seconds of the game loading up, I have to completely restart the app... And here I thought updates were supposed to fix things, not break 'em even more.

Very glitchy after a while. Does not connect to server. Some of the upgrades disappear on your characters. You'll upgrade the level and later in the day it'll reverse but also take the points needed so you're really not making progress. Another one is you'll be mid play and the app will restart for no reason. This is different from the one where your signal is weak and you automatically lose the game. Every time they update this game it just glitches more and more. Very frustrating game.

I want to give this game a five star review badly, but I can't. The mechanics and "rock paper scissors" combat is unique and awesome. Very smooth running, but my issue is this. I've played for several months and I'm at a point where I am five or so tiers deep in pvp and still getting the SAME leaders and assists characters over and over. I swear I have over a thousand yellow ranger assists. Yet in every single tier there are certain characters I still haven't even unlocked yet. Your pay to play certain characters rate and your boxes character drop rates have caused me to delete this game twice now. The gameplay keeps bringing me back. In summary, this is a VERY playable game, but will die if the restrictions on characters don't lighten up. I suggest increased drop rate of rarer characters from victory boxes.

With connections repaired, I can say with honesty that- despite this game being PvP-focused -it is one of the most unique experiences in any mobile store. It breaks down fighting games as a whole into the most basic fundamentals that can be accomplished with simple controls. Of course, you'll have to be careful as you get into higher ranks, but with so many characters to choose from you can still make your stand within The Grid. My fav? The fact that Street Fighters are permanent additions.

This game is amazing. First, the graphics are outstanding for a game on a phone. And as a fan of strategic gameplay, the way you wait for moves is pretty unique, and fun. And also, I'm surprised they put Street Fighter characters into the game. Pretty cool, but here is why I gave it 4 stars. After every round you get a thing that looks like a loot box. I'm not that high rank yet, but they are some that might take longer. But you get overflowed with upgrades. Great game though.

If you like fighting games then maybe you should stay away from this. The graphics are amazing, but these card based fighting games seem to be more luck than actual skill. You'll find yourself being frustrated over not having the right attack or defense available to you at any particular time while your opponent seems to always have the appropriate counter. Megazord battles tend to be even more frustrating as you'll find yourself stunned more often than not unable to do anything as you opponent has his way with you. I wish this was a console game with more traditional fighting mechanics as I'd probably enjoy it a lot more. Even spending money to become more powerful seems to just put you into a whole new level of frustration.

I really wanted to like this game. I like the power rangers and really enjoy Nway's console fighting game. But the game is set up to not only be p2w but almost outright pay to play. The gameplay itself is basic, but fun. However, you don't get far at all before there's almost no incentive to play. It's far too easy to max out your 4 slots with free boxes. The rate at which you gain currency is awful after the first day or two. The ideal way to play is locked behind a $20 monthly sub. No thanks

This is a typical, "first time's free," freemium game that hooks users with quick level-ups, but makes them impossible later on without purchases. How this is still legal is beyond me, as it is scientifically proven that these games get you high on dopamine that releases when you progress, then make you pay for your fix once you're hooked, like shady drug dealers. I wouldn't be surprised if there's an algorithm in place that pits you against more built-up players and gives you bad cards to make you lose when you haven't bought anything in awhile. I crush through leagues after a purchase. Then, after a few days without any, I go on massive losing streaks down through leagues I previously dominated. It also feels like the buttons are non-responsive in these times. Even if that last paragraph is all in my head, the fact remains that they make it next to impossible to level up after a while. I regret to say that I spent money on any meaningful progress. No more of that. I gave two stars because the concept of a PR fighting game is awesome, as is the artwork in the game. Once these shady freemium games are outlawed much like their crack-selling kin, hopefully we'll get a less slimy version of this.

great game , I've been playing it since day one. I've seen it ungergo many changes throughout the years which in my opinion made the game better overall. People complain about paying to get legendaries but it's a lot more affordable and accessible than it was. end of the day without an income stream developers will eventually abandon a game so I don't mind buying the battle pass and character unlocks from time to time to keep it going as it's the best fighting game on Android period

I've been playing this game since launch over time Nway has gotten lazy and doesn't try anymore. update: I stopped playing for a while and decided to come back. It's worse. Don't recommend, not new player friendly, literally have to pay in order to win and level anybody up. seriously, don't spend time or money. every new character is overpowered, and nothing is done to make it balanced at all, and no consistency, except wasting money. best Ranger game on the market and the worst, how about that!

The best part of the game is seeing all the rangers and unlocking them. It would take a while but you can slowly unlock each ranger without spending money. The only thing I hate is the fact that they are locked behind tier levels. So winning is key obviously. The gameplay is simple and fine. I just really wish it wasn't a fighting game. I really wish it was like the super sentai mobile released in Japan.

Quite honestly, there needs to be a better control system put in place. Or at least more play-testing done with the current controls. This rock, paper, scissors nonsense is an inconvenience at best and infuriating at worst. The graphics and design are great, but the gameplay is ludicrous. Honestly, the rock, paper, scissors would make more sense if it were only for special moves, but there are no "basic moves." No standard punches or kicks. And nothing that can be used between cooldowns. Fighting games should have strategy, but they should also be fastpaced. Frankly, I find this game dreadful. I keep trying to play more in the hopes that it gets better as time goes on, but it's almost as if there's a wall preventing me from enjoying much. It's a good thing the app is free because there's not much to the game besides PVP and Megazord fights. And the Megazord fights are nowhere near as good as the main gameplay. Let that sink in.

This game has a great deal of potential, but it's biggest weaknesses is that it appears to give vary little consideration of moderation in the ways of being able to defend, or attack. For example, your opponent can choose and attack that costs 2 points, like with chun-li, and it can damage your for a third of your health, and continue in a combo to immobilize you, creating both an unfair, and very lack luster game play environment. It can be fix, but until then, it will not go very far.

This game is super fun, at first. Once you reach 1800, you start losing straight out. It becomes a game of "Which Animation is Quicker", because the faster one to complete usually gets through. And, some rangers have mechanics, like Beast Morpher Red, where there's a yellow bar to do a special move, but unless you own that ranger, you'd never know what it does. Pay-to-win mobile garbage that makes such a good premise into such a powerful disappointment.

The game was fun at first I also unlocked some characters. But one thing that bothers/annoys me SOO much is the stamina or whatever. Like if I were out of stamina I would just have to stay in the corner and wait for my enemy just to attack me. And the attacks cost so much stamina (except for the shield). And it's also sometimes laggy WHEN MY WIFI CONNECTION IS GOOD. Also whenever I'm fighting my enemy always attacks me, like do they lose stamina or something?? This game is 👎. Absolutely awful.

The only real two pros of this game vs its console counterpart (Battle for the grid) is the roster and its easy access. They're nearly one hundred characters in the game and all you need is an update mobile device to play it. The cons are, terrible tap control system, a dumpster fire pay to win system that is a rip off, unbalanced matches and terrible online servers. The game can be fun, but the bad out ways the good. Don't waste your money. Overall skip this. After 2 yrs, Its game over for me.

Great game. I love getting to use some of my favorite rangers and villians to fight other players. Only REAL nit-pick I have is that there's no story mode. What was the point of these different storylines being cinematic only? Or give us a gaultlet style option that we fight to the end of and earn chests, crystals, and shards. Just a thought but would make it a bit easier for non-paying players to progress almost as quickly as paying players.

Love the game itself, but the support team is the worst support I've ever had the displeasure of dealing with. Been going back and forth with them on an issue and their reply is "it shows us it's working properly on our end", but when I tell them it's not on my end and ask what to do to fix it, they just revert back to "it's all good server side" and have not offered me one single possible solution. This has been going on, back and forth, in circles, for 4 days now and still no resolution.

The game is amazing on it's own, but this game could be SOOOO much better. Do weekly and daily challenges that give you gems, so that people can have a better chance of getting new character. Add a try button to every character. I would like to see what good the character before buying it. Expand the way characters fight. They feel too empty. Please take this into consideration.

The only fun thing this game has added in it's second year is raids. mainly because you're playing against the computer and not someone with a fat wallet. this game was awesome when first released. It has evolved into pay to play/win. If you want a new character be prepared to dish out $10+ dollars. that still won't help against the people with overpowered characters. I hope with nWay and their battle for the grid game, it goes the route of EA and Battlefront 2 where they can lose their license.

At first I believed this game to be absolutely amazing but after a few days of playing it, I was disappointed. I don't understand how you can do a move and another players move disrupts it yet their move still goes through. I don't like how one move is faster than another, they should both either hit and the same time and cancel one another out and enflict damage upon both players, not a one sided ordeal.

I decided to give this game another try after removing it two years ago and it still has all the same problems that made me delete it in the first place. It's still laggy, some characters are still broken, and now it's almost entirely pay-to-win. Literally the only positive is the inclusion of megazord battles. I was a day one player and there was once a time where I was excited to play it, but now I'm never touching this again.

Incredible game experience, it's fantastic no doubt about it. 2 problems that I found inside the game was that collecting power coins and power energy are a bit hard and not enough which are useful for upgrading characters. The other one is the energy bar, the time it takes to filled up is somewhat long specially when using characters with 4-6 cost of energy. I hope there could be a change on those sections to enjoy the game better.

I love the franchise but it is very hard to love this game. Constantly reconnecting during matches and even if I think the connection is good, I counter the opponent only for the animation to stop and show red ping and then I get bodied to oblivion. I can accept the fact that it's pay to win but at this point I can't even play properly anymore. After the megazord event update my connection during matches are a hit or a miss and Ive dropped down hundreds of trophies. No point in playing.

This game is a micro transaction hellscape. It's fun to play as the power rangers but if you spend any amount of time playing this game you Adventureland reach a point where you're gonna lose. A lot. The only way to get a good number of resorces is by spending money. The one thing the power rangers have alway had is fans who will happily spend money.I love the game but only for a short while at a time as it eventually gets tiring seeing and hearing 'you lose' over and over again.

This game looks great and the idea of a Power Rangers fighter that spans the entire franchise of teams is awesome. Unfortunately the actual game play is frustrating and confusing. You have to pick cards to make your combatant do moves and you have to have a certain energy level to do certain things. I know being a mobile game has its limits but I've played other fighters that are far better in gameplay. This is just incredibly disappointing.

The game was ok from the beginning but after you have leveled up a little bit it seems you have gotten slower and the computer gets quicker than you and the computer backs you against the wall so you can't move to even defend yourself from there attacks. You can't even upgrade your abilities till you reach league 3 that's gotta be fixed. I won't play this game again until all the issues are resolved.

This game sucks. Like if you lose internet for a tad bit then the opponent gets the upper hand. I've been having strong warriors whom gets beaten by a level 2 or 3 when I'm a level 9. That doesn't make sense to me. It also always crashes in the beginning of any match and when it comes back it says "Waiting for previous match to end in 59 seconds." I'd contacted the support and they said "We can't override the system to help you when matches crash." This new update still crashes.

I've played this game since BETA, and it's new and hip for most PR fans including myself, it had some glitches needs to be smoothed out, and for the most part I've enjoyed the game. With its unique Rock, Paper, Scissors mechanics and you can play your favorite Characters and use their unique Abilities to get the most of your playtime experience and have fun. Since the days gone by and I've played this game for 6 years, but despite the Nostalgia its nothing more than a buggy cheap cash grab.

The graphics are good, the nostalgia aspect is amazing but this game is just terrible. The controls are complete garbage, you can move back and forward and choose between 2 random character attacks and a random ally attack, while holding to the energy cost of each attack. I've been playing at least a month and lose 10 matches for every 1 win. Ridiculously unfriendly to new players. Literally the worse fighting game I've ever played on mobile. So disappointing.

the game is pay to win... which is fine. I've actually made several purchases but even looking at their premium subscription, the price just doesn't justify what you get. this game severely needs real pve adventuring. but that's just not what this game is as I discovered too late. I was hoping it was something my kids could enjoy but certainly not the case the way the business model operates. I've played it for a couple months but it's just missing too much for the money they want.

If you don't have a ton of money to spare, don't bother with this game. I decided to try it again after not playing it for a couple years, mainly because of lag issues and the game being unbalanced. And guess what? ITS EVEN MORE UNBALANCED THAN BEFORE! They have introduced new fighters that are so OVERPOWERED that it isn't funny. But you can only get them by dropping tons of money. This is a game for pay2win players. If you are a casual player, stay away as you WILL lose 7 out of 10 matches.

In addition to the pay-to-win factors, unbalanced fighters, and general scamminess of the game, it often lags like crazy, which leads to the bunch of connection issues, even if my connection is strong. EDIT: The lag is still an issue, with a major delay between inputs. I've lost a bunch of matches due to the delay, so fix the lagging issue as soon as possible.

The fight base system could be a little better. It becomes one side when your opponent is able to counter and land all there hits before you can even launch an attack, I strongly believe this should be a tap base game were you can fight and save your stronger attacks when needed. Makes no sense to have to wait to recharge your power attacks. Game is good but has room for improvements.

Been playing since launch and for the first few months it was a very fun game. Concept was cool and the gameplay very engaging. However, it started becoming impossible to unlock new characters without it costing your week's paycheck. Sure you can unlock them for maybe $100 but it's no where near PVP strength. (Its 99% of the game) It became clear that Nway has no passion and are just in it for money. Master Tommy is an "homage" but is jst them cash grabbing and taking adv of a literal suicide.

This game stinks. If your expecting a fighting game, think again. Your entire game plan is based on how lucky you get with your cards. All you do is dash, and pick a card. There are so many problems, such as blocking an attack doesn't give you a punish, because they can block your attack right after and the worst UI and connection I've seen in any game. Fighting games are competitive, and this game takes that genre and makes it luck based. You can't even jump in this game, like come on. Terrible

honestly just a bad experience. gameplay is just rock paper scissors, with the twist being that a lot of moves are too fast to react to making it nearly impossible to know what to do. Drop rates are rigged to the point where getting a new epic or legendary character feels outright impossible and when you do get a new one, there is a pretty good chance that you get an old character which ends up wasting your time. if you wanna put your brain on autopilot this is the game, if not don't even try.

Pro-tip for the developer: learn to stabilize your own game's servers BEFORE releasing new content. This has been an on-going problem and it needs to be fixed ASAP. EDIT: Changed from Two-Star to One-Star simply because of the devolper's in-game response when I've address the still constant problem. It basically summed to be "get better internet lol", despite the fact I've had the same problem on multiple different wi-fi connetions. The problem's not me, it's them. FIX YOUR GODDAMN SERVERS NOW!

I love this game, been playing it since it came out. I would give 5 stars, but after the latest update, I haven't been able to open the game anywhere. It gets stuck on the checking version loading and then I always get an error saying unable to install patch info file (8). I have more than enough room in my phone, and I have wifi, but it just won't load no matter what I try. I would really appreciate help so I can fix this and continue playing

Was 5* but there's an issue with ranking rewards claim pop up not closing and making it unable for one to play. Issue has been there for 3-4 days and still not fixed. I'm sure I'm not the only one impacted - an issue like this should be top priority! All in all, fun game also for f2p if u have the patience to collect and level up over time. Sure top leagues difficult to reach as f2p but still fun and you beat players who are much stronger as well -> skill matters.

title: Wise: International Transfers
description:
16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 145+countries and 45+ currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, for every money transfer
• Over 65% of transfers are instant, arriving in under 20 seconds (transaction speed claimed depends on individual circumstances and may not be available for all transactions)
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The Multi-Currency Card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160 countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the mid-market exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world. Wise is a Money Service Business (“MSB”“) registered with FinCen, not an FDIC-insured bank. It is authorized to operate as a MSB in most states. In other states, the MSB program is sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank, to which we’re a service provider. The Wise Multi-Currency Card Program is issued by Wise’s sponsor Bank(s)*, member(s) FDIC. pursuant to licensing by Visa® U.S.A. Inc. The Wise Multi-Currency Card is available to eligible consumers and commercial entities. Not available in all countries. Fees vary based on type of transaction. T&C apply. Find more info at https://wise.com/us/

*Lead Bank and Community Federal Savings Bank.

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)
