Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)
summary: Send, receive, spend worldwide

scraped_reviews.content: fairly easy to use, good way to send money to other people, and the rates aren't bad. sometimes I'm frustrated with how many times the app will tell me my transfer might take a few days because my money hasn't posted to the Wise account. so I had to link 2 of my accounts and switch back and forth on which one to use to transfer the money the fastest.

Even though it's my go-to method of transferring money, Canadian accounts are terrible with this app. Not only do they get disconnected from wise (reenter bank login info) every 2 weeks or so, but the reconnect methods are inconsistent. It'll take 10-60 minutes to reconnect. Plaid is not great and the secondary methods of reconnecting are just as horrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Colin. Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. Hearing from our customers helps us do better in the future. We'd be more than happy to pass this feedback along to our dedicated team. Making it easy to move money across borders is our goal, and we want to make sure we're doing everything in our power to make that possible. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: It worked great until there was a problem. It was fast, smooth, cheap. Then I switched bank accounts, and my new bank blocked the transfer, even though wise sent the funds. Leaving me owing wise $500. That was on my bank, not wise, but then I tried to pay wise the $500. Unfortunately there is not enough space in these reviews to go into detail, but nobody I could reach by phone could do anything at all. It wasn't until a month after my balance was sent to collections that they told me it was.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We're sorry to hear about your situation. In order for us to help, we’ll need some more details on what happened. Please get in touch at https://wi.se/contactus or on X, Facebook, or Instagram, so we can check your case and let you know how to resolve it. We're always happy to help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: For the most part pretty standard banking app. It works pretty well. Do not use if you plan to receive a paycheck/similar to an account here though. Support is also terrible. They do not have any way to save sender information so every time you receive a payment, it gets blocked and you need to input the same information before it gets released. I asked support and they just threw random articles at me and told me they need sender information for regulations, which isn't the issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, Bayley! We can assure you that we only request info in situations where it would be needed to complete the transfer. While some requests can come up more than once, it doesn't mean that every incoming payment would be blocked (as this would happen case-by-case). However, if you need help be sure to get in touch: https://wi.se/help - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Full of bait and switch. Says one price, changes later on. Says one speed (<10 mins), changes to 6 DAYS once I'm ready to confirm. Says my bank doesn't have the funds for the transfer, but it does. So many inconsistencies and such a time waster these days. Used to be reliable and cheap, but apparently not anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Depending on how you sent the money and in which currency, and payment method it can take a bit longer and the prices may change, but we aim to get your money moving as soon as possible. If you need help with a specific transfer, you can always reach us at http://wi.se/help, or via social media on Facebook or Instagram. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Support for the app is very minimal. This year, I ordered a physical card. For some reason, online says the card is active and I can start using the card on my phone right away. So I clicked on it and it some how also indicated that I received the physical card, which I never. I reordered the card. But it never came. I freeze the card and tried to get help on the order. It took me a long time to find the support link online, not on the phone app. And they refused to refund the card fee.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We typically use local post services to deliver your card, unless you choose expedited delivery. If it hasn't arrived, please feel free to check our guide "What if my Wise card hasn't arrived?" in our Help Center: https://wi.se/help. Regarding the refund or any other questions, please reach out using our Help Center or via social media. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: The app is easy to use and follow. What isn't so great is the customer service experience. If you try to get a hold of anyone via the Chat or phone call, they easily take 5+ minutes to respond to anything you are writing to them. If you get someone on a phone call, you are instantly put on hold. I've been on hold for 10 minutes without even getting much help from the customer rep. Then as soon as they converse with me for not even a minute, I'm on hold again. It's a strenuous experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Georgie. We believe our customers deserve the best, so we’re sorry to hear that you didn’t get the support you should have. We’re big on feedback, and anything you have to share is important to us. Please don’t hesitate to get in touch at https://wi.se/help or via social media. We’d like to do what we can to make this right. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: This app is anything but easy. You can't even recieve money without putting 20 dollars into it yourself. And once you do there's no way to get it back. It took 10 tries just to get the verification to work, only to have to wait 5 days for my account to verify. Then, it canceled the money transfer I waited all that time for. Absolute waste of my time and money. Very disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We always want to make using our services as easy as possible for our customers. To start receiving money you have to verify yourself and make your first top up transfer, however this money is later yours to use. Reach out at: https://wi.se/help, or on social media if you have any questions. We're here to help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: edit: for some reason they limit the exchange rate and alerts to your location's currency, which makes no sense. had to remove a star for this weird choice. It's fast and the fees are much better than bank transfer (even within the same bank). It has saved me thousands of HK dollars at this point, easy. They even show you competitor prices but I've found the list to be wrong, and I've tried many alternatives - Wise still ends up being the cheapest.

I initiated a transfer and received an in-app error that the transfer had failed. So, I tried again and received the same error message. Later, I saw that both transfers had actually gone through - sending the amount twice - and even though I only had enough cash in my Wise account to cover one of them, Wise without my consent withdraw additional funds from my linked bank account. I contacted support and so far they have not resolved the issue. Be warned! Will update if resolution occurs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. We’re sorry to hear that you’re having some issues. We always want to make sure that we fix any issues you’re experiencing as quickly and effectively as possible. Our team will make sure to provide updates on this as soon as possible. In case you need further assistance please get in touch at http://wi.se/help - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: As of recently, it's become totally unusable. I've provided every single ID possible, selfies, selfies with IDs. Can't go through. I've used (Transfer) Wise before on the past extensively, but it's absolute garbage now. -- Update: Oh, I have. I'm not taking about once or twice. I've done it multiple times. I've talked with chat, 4 different people. Emails. Id's, passport, drivers license. Very clear and still shots with a tripod.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We understand this might be frustrating, and we always try to offer a seamless experience when it comes to verification. If a document is rejected, we typically email you to explain the reason and the next steps. We'd also be happy to take a closer look and help. Please contact us at https://wi.se/help when you can. Thanks. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Nothing about this app works. They loose money. Hold payments. Constantly demanding documents and facial recognition. Support isn't able to address any problems. Transactions disappear. Closed my account with no explanation. Then opened it again, no explanation. Issued a debt card, then canceled it before I could even use it. Then there is rhe data breach... Constant issues!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Mark. Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. As a customer, you’re our top priority, and we want every experience you have with Wise to be 5-star, so we're sorry to hear this hasn't been the case. Please let us know how we can improve in the future at http://wi.se/help or on social media. We’d love to make things right. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Wise used to work wonderfully and I rated it accordingly. Now it seldom works as advertised. Sometimes it works and other times it takes days! You cannot rely on it. Currently I have three transactions in progess. Wise has taken the money from my bank account but no delivered it. Has been over two days. Even a small transfer into my own account hasn't happened. No additional information or update has been provided. And good luck getting help, customer service is impossible to find. Not good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. Fast transfers are what we’re here for. But delays do happen for different reasons, due to weekend/holidays, or because we needed to carry extra checks. We'd be happy to take a closer look, just get in touch at http://wi.se/help or on Facebook or Instagram. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: the app does not recognize the recipient's address even though I've been using it for 3 years. technical support has not been able to resolve the problem. they have not sent update emails as they promised. other recipients in other countries are still working properly. this recipient transfer has been a complete failure and Tech Support also has been a complete failure.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We’re sorry to hear that you’re experiencing issues while using the app. Please always make sure that you’re using the latest version of it. Uninstalling and reinstalling the app can also help. If the issue persists, please get in touch at https://wi.se/help or on X, Facebook or Instagram, so we can check. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Normally Wise is a great app. As someone living abroad, the transfer times are quick and easy and I never have to be stressed about paying any bills but recently have had loads of issues with my transfers coming on time. At one point, even going overdue on when my rent was due. I wish Wise was quicker sometimes. Its a shame because most of the time it works great but with it making me miss payments on things, it's hard to trust it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We know how stressful transfer delays can be, especially when it affects bills or rent. Transfer times can vary depending on the payment route, currency, and partner banks involved, but we’re always working to make them faster and more consistent. Please reach out here: https://wi.se/help so we can help prevent it from happening again. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Sending money is difficult. Trying different options to get the fastest delivery option got my delivery method locked. When trying to reach an agent by phone there's a long wait time and only been successful at even getting a call back one time. Speaking to an agent through chat and they tell you they can't help because it's up to the specialized agent when they'll be able to fix your account. p.s. I am "not eligible" to close my account. B.s.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, Jorowen! Usually the fastest option is to pay using your bank card or with currencies held on your Wise account. However, if this option is unavailable, then please wait for an update from the specialized team. Otherwise, an account can only be closed if there isn't anything pending on it (Such as transfers, checks, or remaining money). - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Wise has lower fees than banks and works good sometimes, but when there's an issue customer service is not very helpful.I was consistently told that the problem was on my end and that I should uninstall, reinstall, use different device/browser. Even after I did all of these things and demonstrated that the problem existed independent of my device/browser, etc. I was continuously told to do the same thing over and over again until finally it was escalated and the issue was magically resolved.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. We believe our customers deserve the best, so we’re sorry to hear that our support fell short of your expectations. We’re big on feedback, and anything you have to share is important to us. We’d love it if you could get back in touch at https://wi.se/help or via social media so that we can make this right for you. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: You would be wise to stay away from wise! They word things that mislead you, when opening an account they ask you for a £45 deposit into your account. What they don't tell you is they take it for themselves straight away and call it "For your account details", so basically I've gave them £45 to open the account along with all my ID. Then I wanted to verify this account with another DD app and needed to send a 1p transaction from UK to UK account cost me 61p. Daylight robbery !!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. It sounds like you've registered a business account. We have a 45 GBP fee to set up your account with international bank details. We're transparent about our fees and you can always check them in our website and Help Center: https://wi.se/help. We'd be happy to take a closer look and advise. Please contact us using the Help Center. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great except for one huge issue: If you transfer money then come back a few days later to do another transfer (as I tried to today), it will not go through. Why? Because Wise is "Waiting for payments to settle". Yet my bank shows a completed Wise transaction three days ago, and the account I transfer from still has more than enough in it for the transfer I tried to do today. This has happened several times now. I guess I need to find an alternative to avoid this aggravation. 3.5
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John. If you verified your bank account with microdeposits, then it may take longer to process your payment. To try to speed this up, you can try reconnecting your bank account using instant account verification with your banking username/password. Contact us here: https://wi.se/help or DM us on Facebook or Instagram. We're here to help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Very negative experience. I tried to deposit multiple times US dollars in my new Wise account, using debit and credit cards. Many failed attempts. Now there is still $0 balance in my Wise account while still waiting for 3 "pending deposits" that have already been withdrawn from my Chase accounts. Very dissapointed. I do not know what to do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. We’re sorry to hear that you’re having some issues. In order for us to help, we’ll need some more details on what happened. Please get in touch at http://wi.se/help or on Facebook, or Instagram. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: I hate how the app wants to verify every time you want to send large amounts. so just use a debit or cc it will be quicker than having to jump through a bunch of hoops to verify. verify once and be done with it. I don't want to have to pause my transfer because you want to make sure it's me. I might start using another service instead. update: when you ask for a bank statement that's where I draw the line. My expenses are none of your business. and I have a federally approved ID should be good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We understand it might not be ideal to have to verify every time. However, as a regulated financial institution we take security very seriously. And with procedures to make sure it's really you, we keep Wise and our customers' safe. Reach out at: https://wi.se/help, or on social media if you have any questions. We're here to help! - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Consistent bad experience from a few months to date. it used to be fast and reliable. a mere 100 dollars transfer is taking 4 days, they have an excuse that the previous transfer that happened over a week ago needs to clear first, or that I have to have enough money in the bank which I do.. Called for support 2 times to long hold times and no answer. Too bad, it used to love wise a lot, they lost another customer here, not using it again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this, J. We know how disappointing it is when things that used to work smoothly start causing delays. Some transfers may be held due to cool-down periods or extra checks, but we understand that doesn’t make it any less frustrating. If you’re open to giving us another chance, reach out at https://wi.se/help - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: I like wise very much, simple, clean and customer support for me has been great. I think my only complaint is that on a business account we are limited to just 3 virtual cards. I think they need to rethink this, especially with the number of services/SaaS on the market which most businesses need to at least try. Virtual debit cards let you control spending for things you may not want to continue beyond a trial period from one single place. This is something revolut offer and it's a huge help.

It was a very useful app with no problem.After an update, the app became useless. When i press my profile or send money button it says we are having technical issues,try again later. Website is working but the app is dead for weeks now. Only thing shows about my account is the messages about my previous transactions. Please fix it. I have to use my computer to use my account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We're sorry to hear that you're having some issues with the app. Please try troubleshooting the app: log out and log back in, quit it, update it to latest version, uninstall and re-install it. If you continue to have issues, just get in touch at https://wi.se/contactus or on X, Facebook, or Instagram - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Fees are great. App is ok. a bit confusing and buggy when managing jars and multiple currencies and sending from the middle east. What is utterly terrible, is their Customer Service. Absolutely useless and definitely frustrating. My money is basically floating for more than a week (which is silly because it was a small test amount). My bank confirmed it was CREDITED the next day yet they gave me the 6 days Swift excuse, even after showing them proof. Time to escalate it I guess.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Marc. Thanks for leaving us a review. We believe our customers deserve the best, so we’re sorry to hear that you didn’t get the support you should have. Anything you have to share is important to us. Please get in touch at https://wi.se/help or via Facebook, Instagram, or X. We’d like to double check your case. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: The fees just dont add up on this app. you see 10 bucks here, 5 bucks here, and somehow the total is over a 100! ZERO explanations, and the breakdowns just don't add up on the app. the app is just hard to understand if you are converting between currency, and it is unintuitive for the UI to scam users into losing money with the app. worst experience I have had with an app overseas.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Jenniffer. We believe that sending money shouldn’t cost the earth, so we charge as little as possible, and are always looking for ways to make that number smaller. We’re upfront about our fees, and you’ll only ever pay for what you use. For more help, feel free to contact us here: http://wi.se/help. We'll be happy to assist. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, really never seen an app that is so well build. You can see that whoever is behind it, invested time, energy and thoughts in order to make it as simple as possible. At first I was quite skeptical, but after I transfered a small amount of money without problems, I started using it for my real intentions. I moved abroad and was able to transfer all my money for the lowest rate, thanks for everything!!

It was working real great at the beginning and was useful for international travel. Now all of a sudden they want documents to confirm income. I cannot recieve transferred money between bank accounts nor can I recieve money from anyone else. I uploaded and they still require more stating it doesn't cover the amount I had previously sent. what's it to do with them how I got it covered? Seems like invasion of privacy and no don't give me it's policy requirement BS. Will be looking elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Em. As a regulated financial institution, we only request documents that we need. All data, financial details, and documents you give us are stored securely in line with our privacy policy. We use the information to complete required routine checks — not for marketing purposes. Please reach out to us here for more help: https://wi.se/help - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Good service, good value transfers. Quick and for the most part straightforward to use for money transfers and currency conversion. My only slight frustration is finding some things like what interest has been received on accounts, interest rates for accounts. Jars, still not sure what they are? But apart from that solid company.

it was super confusing to set up and took ages. it kept looping for ages... and some of the terms in the app are confusing.. transfer, does that mean in / out etc.. I find the language isn't that clear. Once you get the hang of it though, its super easy to use and was great on my travels. im going to get a physical card now!

The whole point of having a digital wallet with non-physical credit or debit cards is the flexibility to lock or change cards easily and frequently for security purposes. Digital cards are meant to be disposable numbers so that customers can use or replace them as necessary. Yet Wise here penalises me and threatens to close my account when I use these cards as how they are meant to be used! Okay then, close my account!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We absolutely hear your frustration. You're right, the whole point of digital cards is flexibility and security. We don't want to close your account, especially when you are using the features for their intended purpose. For more help, feel free to contact us here: http://wi.se/help, or via our social media platforms. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: the app may say a direct transfer from your bank account will arrive "in seconds" but the reality is it can take 4 business days to be "posted". on a recent trip I wasn't able to add more funds because the system was waiting for my prior transfers to post. when I go to add funds it defaults to a direct transfer so **be sure to hit CHANGE and select DIRECT DEBIT** to avoid any holds /delays.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there. We always try to send money as quickly as possible. How long a transfer takes depends on a few things, like the payment method, the amount being sent, or if it was set up near a weekend or holiday. We’re always happy to review your case, just get in touch at http://wi.se/help, or on Facebook, or Instagram. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Super annoying to navigate. I think it works, though. I waited a month because I thought I'd transferred money to myself, but I transferred it to my wrong "self," which doesn't even make sense. I already put in my bank details, then I needed to e-transfer myself, which is a completely different setup up. Even though it's a pretty interface, overall, it's very frustrating to use. To navigate from the customer chatpage to try to solve my issue took about 6 clicks each time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Shayana, thanks for leaving us a review. We appreciate your feedback. Rest assured that we work every day to improve the experience with our app. Here at Wise, we’re big on feedback, and anything you have to share is important to us. Please get in touch at https://wi.se/help or via Facebook, Instagram, or X. - Wise.

scraped_reviews.content: The fact that it wants to check your identity only after you attempted to pay something, which may mean you are under time pressure to finish some task, and allows only to use the front camera for selfie, which in my case does not work enough for me to ever get verified, is a very unpleasant surprise. Summing up, I rate according to the volume of service I am able to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Verification is an important step to keep your money safe, and it's also a regulatory requirement. So we might need to ask you to verify yourself while opening an account or using our services. We'd be happy to take a closer look and help you with this process. Please contact us at https://wi.se/help or send a DM on Instagram or Facebook. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: An actual scam. Went through the whole process of setting up and uploading all the stuff. Was told needed to transfer $30 to finish setup, odd but sure that's the whole point. Get told it's "under review". For a week. Can't cancel because "checks" are being done. I contact support, get told they can submit a cancel request but will need more information and no timeline. Just skip this app and use literaly anything else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Verification is a very important step for us, and because of that we’re very diligent with this process. Speed is our priority, but so is keeping your money and our platform safe. We'd be happy to take a closer look, just get in touch at http://wi.se/help or on Facebook, or Instagram. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Worked fine for a week. Then account was put on hold and the reason was more verification info needed. Uploaded and emailed various documents as requested and still the account was locked preventing me from accessing my own money or receiving money. After a day of back and forth (and headache). They took the liberty of closing my account for me while I was waiting for additional payments to clear the in the account, which they put on hold. Avoid at all costs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Firstly, you can rest assured that your money is safe. When we close an account with money in it, we have to complete due diligence checks. Once they’re completed, we’ll get in touch about refunding your money. For more help, please contact us at http://wi.se/help, or on Facebook, or Instagram. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Pathetic interface with no hints for help options if you get stuck somewhere. It has been one almost a year since my account set up is pending because of some address format related error. Their customer support even more worse because they have no knowledge of the system and just waste your time placing you on hold for hours.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Bharat. Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. As a customer, you’re our top priority, and we want every experience you have with us and our support team to be 5-star. Please let us know how we can improve in the future at http://wi.se/help or on social media. We’d love to hear from you. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: I would like to rate the service, but I cannot use it. The starting face identification does not work: I tried 30 times but apparently the final result is always blurry. My phone (Nord CE 3 lite) has no problem with the camera and during the identification process the image preview is always nice and on focus, light is fine and also the position of my face is fine. Just can't get through it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there. We're sorry to hear you've been having some troubles with setting up your account. We'd like to take a closer look into this for you. For that, please reach out to us at: https://wi.se/help, or via social media on Facebook or Instagram. We'll be happy to help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: The worst since you replied, here's the problems. I tried to make an account and I didn't receive the OTP number on my phone for the first try. I waited until the time was up and pressed send OTP again but this message showed up (Too many attempts) even though it was one time. Second, there's an option to choose a Refuge ID card and the next page to take a photo of the card front & back. but after that I got an email saying this card isn't acceptable!! then why is it an option?!! there's more...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Verification is a very important step for us, and because of that we’re very diligent with this process. Speed is our priority, but so is keeping your money and our platform safe. We'd be happy to take a closer look, just get in touch at http://wi.se/help or on X, Facebook, or Instagram. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: the service is good but the app is very co fusing and does not offer simple and clear path to receive money and transfer it to your regular bank account. The app used to be easier and much simpler. sometimes less is more. in regards to your answer below, I am talking about the user experience, and the navigation within the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We appreciate your feedback and our aim is to always make our app user-friendly. To receive money into your Wise account, you'd just need to share your Wise account details with the sender. Once you receive it, you can send it to your bank account. For more help, please reach us at http://wi.se/help, or via social media. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Wise canceled my legitimate €2,987.72 payment without giving me a fair chance to submit the documents they requested. The upload link didn’t work, and before I could respond, they labeled the transaction as “too risky.” I’ve verified my account and run a real business, so this was frustrating and unprofessional. Wise needs to review cases properly before canceling payments.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Neya. We're a financial institution, so we need to know who’s using our service, why, and that their money comes from a legitimate place. It helps us combat money laundering, and keep everyone’s money safe. For more help, please contact us at http://wi.se/help, or on Facebook and Instagram. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: they blocked my receiving money transfer saying that they need an extra address verification. I don't know why, if I had the account running already and I have been using it. i've done the verification earlier. then they didn't accept the screenshot from the bank statement they even blocked my account straight away so I couldn't even get my money making impossible to close the account. as I wanted to do it at this point. I don't get how they have the rights to do that!??? very bad experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We know having your account closed is frustrating, but we never do so without reason. It's usually a result of a conflict with our Terms of Use. If you think we made a mistake, please submit an appeal. To contact us: http://wi.se/help then click "Trouble logging in?", select an issue, click "I still need help", and then "Contact us”- Wise

scraped_reviews.content: It's a convenient, until something goes wrong and then...silence. Took two payments for the same amount, for the same transaction at the same time. Any other bank would sort this the same day, its now exacly two weeks and they have ignored my last 5 emails. sadly, time to cut up the card and deal with a proper bank. I have of course reached out, otherwise I wouldn't have said you have ignored my emails. My experience and review are genuine whereas your response is ROBOTIC and DISINGENUOUS
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Sometimes merchants might authorise multiple charges in error, or because of a technical problem. In most cases, the money for the duplicate transaction should be sent back to your account. We'd like to take a closer look into this. For that, please reach out to us at: https://wi.se/help, or via social media. We're here to help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: The number of hoops I have to jump through to make a payment is ridiculous. So many options but each one feels like an invasion of privacy. I'd rather use my bank's international money transfer if only there wasn't a minimum amount limit. In the end I used the credit card option because it was the most straightforward. I know big banks hate the competition from Wise but if my bank lowers minimum amount to send I'm not looking back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Andrzej. We might need to ask different questions, depending on where you are moving money, or where you live. We know this is personal information, so we try to ask you the least we can to still complete all our checks. We always store your information securely, in line with our privacy policy. For more help: http://wi.se/help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Typically, banks first block transactions that require additional information, request the necessary documents, and then clear the funds to the account. ​Wise does the opposite. They first credit the money to the account, then they block the entire account, and only after that do they request documents regarding the transaction. ​Due to this critical and flawed process by Wise, I was left stranded without access to my money while on vacation in a foreign country.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there. As a regulated financial institution we do need to make checks from time to time — this is how we keep Wise safe for everyone. However, we always want them to go as smoothly as possible and it's never our intent to cause any distress for our customers. Reach out at: https://wi.se/help, or on social media if you have any questions. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: Can't view conversion rates without money in account, for example: You are travelling in Singapore from Australia, and you want to see the rate from AUD to SGD, but all your money is in SGD and you want to add and convert more, you can't see the AUD to SGD rate. Very frustrating and inconvenient, do not recommend until this is rectified.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aran. Thank you for your feedback. We're always working to expand our platforms usability. You can always check out our website's home page. There you any input any desired currencies into our rate calculator. For assistance, contact us here: https://wi.se/help or DM us on Facebook or Instagram. -Wise

scraped_reviews.content: first few transaction went fast . So it was a test to see , then tried to send a bigger amount and after 3 days it still not in my wife's account . When you open the app it says it will send it in seconds . once you send it you get the notice it will take 2 days . Now showing its sent but with the notification my wife her bank could take 2 days. So pretty useless in case of emergency !
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey. We want to move your money as quickly as possible. While we do that, you can always see an estimate of how long it’ll take to complete your transfer. Keep in mind this estimate can change depending on a few factors, such as the currencies you’re sending and your payment method. For more help, please contact us here: http://wi.se/help. - Wise

scraped_reviews.content: This is GREAT for traveling, it was so easy to send and convert money, it was awesome having a physical and digital cars. The ONLY downside is that my Wise account was disconnected from my bank account, and in order to verify they can only call or send you an SMS. I had access to neither while traveling internationally, adding email as a verification option would be a huge improvement.

1. Unlocking the app only by pin or biometric. No option to use pin when biometric fails let's say 3 times. Sometimes can be handy. 2. Fees, fees, fees. Even with fees, rates are better or similar as Revolut, but it would be way better if it would be included and "for free". 3. Free if transferring money in, or paying by card. Unfortunately not free for simple sepa transfer out. 4. Not popular because of those fees all around, not easy to understand when you pay them, when not.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! When the biometric recognition method fail, you can use the PIN in our app. We’re upfront about our fees, and you’ll only ever pay for what you use. We’ve also introduced a tool that calculates the fees for your transfer, so you can see the cost before you set it up. If you need any assistance, contact us at http://wi.se/help

scraped_reviews.content: loved how useful this app is but have had problems with bank transfers going to the wrong currency account in Wyse and then being hit a second time for extra fees to move the money from one currency to another. I have been careful to transfer the money into the account details given by Wyse. complained but no response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. If you have different currencies in your account, you can convert money between them. However, if you're expecting money into your Wise account, be sure to use the account details for the currency in which you'd like to receive in so it's automatically converted. For more help, feel free to reach to us on social media or email. - Wise

title: Quizlet: More than Flashcards
description:
Quizlet gives you study tools that teach you — not just tell you the answer — so you can walk into every test with confidence.

Your personalized feed recommends exactly what to study next, powered by your courses, your school and what students like you are studying now. Jump in faster with Study Bites: bite‑sized suggestions, progress updates and content tailored to your learning goals.

Turn your notes into study materials
* Turn class notes into practice tests, study guides and flashcards so you can review your material in the way that works best for you
 * Create flashcards from scratch or let AI generate a deck from your study materials

Flashcards that fit your routine
* Discover millions of flashcard sets created by students and teachers
* Sort cards into Know and Still learning to track progress
* Save decks for offline access and study anywhere

Practice that adapts to you
* Turn any flashcard set into practice questions to reinforce knowledge
* Study with multiple choice, true/false and written questions
* Quizlet adapts based on what you know and what needs more work
* Seamlessly pick up where you left off across all your devices

Exam‑ready tests
* Simulate test day with a personalized practice test generated from any flashcard set
* Customize the number of questions and formats to challenge yourself in different ways
* Get instant scoring and feedback to spot gaps and build confidence

Homework help when you need it
* Expert‑authored, step‑by‑step solutions to tough homework problems
* Check your work in challenging subjects like Calculus, Chemistry and Electrical Engineering
* Use AI‑powered support to unpack each step or explore alternative approaches

Study together
* Collaborate with classmates by matching strengths and weaknesses
* Share decks, get help on tough topics and master material faster

Quizlet is the all-in-one study tool for language learning, vocabulary and test prep.

Quizlet Plus subscriptions will be charged to your Google account. Your monthly or annual subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your Account Settings after purchase. Some features may not be available in your country or region.

Terms of Service: https://quizlet.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://quizlet.com/privacy
