summary: A little connection can go a long way

scraped_reviews.content: Video watching is broken as hell, and it's been like this for years. Multiple videos play at the same time, ads are way way louder than the rest of the video, and ads get stuck and keep you from watching the video (after you watch the ad, of course). It claims that you have a new message at the top corner all of the time, even if you already read the message. The algorithm is also intentionally showing you content that it knows you don't want to see.

It was fine while I had access. Someone hacked in and changed my email address. I reported it, and I never got a response. Update: the account was "recovered". All my friends were deleted and all that was left was my one profile picture. Now everytime I open the app, I get an error message and the app doesn't work. UNINSTALLED. It's not like they provide any useful services.

For an app that's supposed to keep you in the loop with friends and family, it does a really bad job at it. 90% of my feed is ad and suggested content. If I scroll through 20 posts, only a handful are from my friends. I don't even see half the content they post. Not to mention the notifications are useless. Why am I getting a notification about a post made 3-4 DAYS ago?? I have a few dozen friends that I'd like to keep up to date with, but this app makes that almost impossible. Waste of time.

The notifications tab rarely loads. Notifications are also usually out of order and will switch order before your eyes with no apparent organizing logic. The top bar isn't visible unless I scroll down and back up. The "Most Relevant" feature for comments makes it near impossible to see a long conversation on a busy thread because there's no way to switch to "All comments" without losing your place. Help features are a joke. I could write pages on how this app has become over the past 5 years.

At the bare minimum, it's a site that lets you have people on your friends list. Beyond that, it's largely unusable. 8 out of every 10 posts is an ad or a group you don't follow and didn't ask to see. The app's UI is wonky and sometimes doesn't let you see notifications. The site is flooded with AI posts by bot accounts that exist only to make money for the account farm makers. The site (and all meta apps) seemingly killed of TikTok in the US to turn their platforms into it. Hard pass.

only some videos can be muted, and that is never an option if you're playing music from an app that you pay for. I have some other issues as far as how complicated the navigation of the mobile app is. two stars for variety of content. I left a bad review and suddenly nothing wants to load even though my signal strength, both wifi and mobile data, are perfectly adequate. Suspicious.

I literally just had to force close the app because it got stuck playing nothing but ads on reels. It wouldn't scroll past them. It just got to a different ad, to a different ad, to a different ad. And I must have went through at least 20 different ads before I finally gave up. That is a rather annoying bug. I would appreciate you guys looking into it.

I like the app but don't like the ads, but I get why they are there. I really don't like the has to have access to all your systems and and can record what you are doing at any point in time either. screw the "ad customization for you" stuff. I don't by from any of it and skip along anyway. there is a lot of interesting stuff I have found just going through the reels but some of the stuff really need corrections and or is misleading or straight up wrong information. fix that first.

Love that I can message my friends, mad that I can no longer message groups, mad that there are a ridiculous amount of ads! Mostly mad because now, I watch 15 seconds of a reel to watch a 30 second ad! I scroll through the reels and every other slot is another ad! There are banners at the bottom of the reels for you guessed it more ADS! ENOUGH IS ENOUGH! GET RID OF ALL THE ADS!!!

Marketplace is virtually unusable. It doesn't matter how specific you are, it will show you listings only remotely related or unrelated. It doesn't matter what filters you set like price or distance, it will show you listings outside those, often hundreds of miles outside your max distance or several times your max price. It will list all of those before listings that meet your search criteria.

App hasn't worked right since I've updated it. Notifications are showing up as recent, however are 5 days old. can't save anything into the collections you have saved. in the dating part you can't get back to the messages. there's no way to go straight to the messages from that area. my feed is riddled with adds. People are being added that I know I didn't follow, and no one else has logged into my account. It's been a mess for a few days now. very frustrating.

Apparently I left this 1 star review awhile back and forgot about it. Came back today to leave another one. why does it feel like this app gets worse and worse every day? videos won't save properly, when I try to open them up it takes me to a completely random video. Ads glitch out all the time, sometimes covering the reels but not pausing or overriding the audio, so I get a warbled mix of ad and the reel I actually want. Running out of characters, but this is not the end of my grievances.

Would rate it 0 stars if possible. Facebook has been randomly locking people's account and threatening to delete them if you don't give in and "volunteer" a recording your face at multiple angels to be identified. Any and all help services have been dumbed down to near useless levels. Oftentimes it is entirely unaccessable. Addware is more pleasant to interact with than Facebook.

After the most recent update, whenever I click a type box to reply to a chat and the keyboard pops up, the chat box goes all the way to the top and doesn't show me what I am typing or what I am replying to. I constantly have to stop, pull down the keyboard, check for typos, type blindly, and rinse and repeat. Clicking notifications of replies to comments can sometimes take you to the page or the post you commented on, but not back to replies directly to your comment. Too many issues.

Awful. Every time when I open the app it show me "1" next to the messenger, as if there is at least one new message. But in fact there are no messages and "1" disappears after a second. It's easy to pen a reel instead of clicking three dots to hide it, cause it's inappropriate. There is no possibility to clear the "recommendations". I'm already tired of blocking the same reels every time I open the app. The algorithms are disgusting.

FB continues to suggest useless pages and groups, even when I don't interact with any of them. I can no longer open links in my preferred browser directly. Now, each link opens in FB browser, and then I have to click a menu bar and then select option to open in my preferred browser. Also, many functions in "Groups" such as Topic, Guides, Albums and such are messed up and impossible or very difficult to use. Someone at FB needs to wake up and improve this app.

My Facebook app has been behaving weirdly for the past week. I can't view replies to my comments, I can see the notification but when I open the notifications and head to the comment, I can see that there's a reply but when I try to expand it to view the comment, there's nothing there, but my partner can see the replies via his account. Also, I am unable to search for people in the search box, it all comes up as empty/no results found.

Some "genius" separated the messaging platform from the rest of the app. Makes it VERY hard to use marketplace. It also does not always link to Facebook the right way, I have friends sending me messages to things on Facebook and when you click on them, it just opens Facebook to its homepage. Not to what your friend was trying to send you. Will do it over and over again, you never get to open the link.

Memories have completely disappeared. Gone. Completely. Also please put the comment reaction button back. It's beyond annoying that it's to the right & so small. It's also frustrating that the feed automatically refreshes without even touching the screen. Scroll back to the top, oh here let's refresh it so you lose what you were looking at. Go to your groups? Can't even scroll before it automatically refreshes.

Even when the setting is turned off, this app stays active in the background. I do not receive notifications and it has no permissions, yet it doesn't close, even when I clear it in my tabs menu. As if that weren't enough, I don't even see any people or pages that I follow anymore. I opened the app and counted one day and I saw 21 ads and/or "suggested" pages before seeing someone I follow. This is a waste of time and they just mine your data to sell it.

I didn't think it was possible to make this app worse, but you managed. Alerts still only go to main pages, so you have to scroll forever to find the reply. Long press doesn't work at all, so no more saving pictures. If you want to zoom in on an image, forget it, that's gone completely. And, if you want to go full screen, you end up with a giant black screen with the image tiny & cut off in the bottom left corner.

Ok so this a new review: Things improved and were going ok right up until...yes...the recent update in September 2025. Now I can't even open the app. It crashes every time. It has reached the point where I've uninstalled and reinstalled more than once in the hopes of being able to open the app and if that works, the 'solution' doesn't work for very long. Guess I'll have to use the browser from now on?

Don't use the dating app. It's as broken as the rest of it. Matches from outside preferences (must have on) and wonky interface. can't update profile. Notification. Notification. Notification. none of these have a single thing to do with me. I can only turn every single notification off using my phone's ability to block app notifications, but the others either dont have options for in the notification settings or negate the fact it's supposed to be off in the first place.

whatever is going on, it's been almost unusable the last week or so. I've tried twice to uninstall and reinstall, but the app keeps freezing and then closing. I can't even make it thru my new feeds to read. this is on an Android tablet, and now my Android smartphone, and also a Fire tablet is doing the same, so it's not just my device.

i like being able to connect with people and i love marketplace for buying and selling. i only have 1 complaint with each. the feed and seller ratings. there is so much stuff in my feed from suggested pages that i cant even find stuff from my friends. its a bit much. and when buying an item if the seller leaves the chat you can't rate them or message them or anything even if they were a total jerk or you got screwed. just because i didnt buy from them doesnt mean i didnt interact.

Videos no longer fill the screen when playing in full screen mode, I have changed every settings on the app and my phone, nothing fixes it, it has been like this for months now. also still cannot zoom in on pictures like I used to,.again I've changed every settings of app and phone and nothing fixes it. Both issues are now loads of updates old and I see a lot of people with the same complaints and no way to fix them. It seems that as long as we are fed adverts and suggested pages all is good.

when I search something, like a flood update of diff. government fb page since it's raining cats and dogs in Cavite now, all I can see are videos. You can't no longer see the posts. Even when I clicked POST, videos still pop up and it's UNORGANIZED. In addition, the same reels will pop up. I have to restart the app just to refresh 'cause refreshing it while using the app won't do anything.

Heya! 😸 I've been experiencing a problem with this app lately; I'm unable to open the app no matter what I do 🥹. I've cleaned up my storage, cache, and even reinstalled the app. When I reinstalled it, I was able to access it and used it for a while. However! The next time I tried opening it, the same problem occurred again. It kept closing automatically every time I clicked the app icon. I hope this'll be fixed soon, I've seen multiple people's reviews with the same problem as me. 🫠

The amount of ads is insane (it didn't used to be), you don't see your friends much and their algorithm ensures you only see a few friends in your feed even if you have hundreds. The rest is ads. There are also a lot of disgusting ads showing nudity, which they claim goes against their standards, but I've reported them dozens of times and have yet for them to actually remove one. If it wasn't for the connections I have through the app, I wouldn't use it. I'll definitely ensure my kids never do.

pretty terrible anymore. it's ad after ad. in between ads are recommended pages. just a few of the things and people I follow show up in between. I spend more time selecting show less than enjoying any part of it. I will also randomly find that I'm following pages I've shown no interest in, not even the content on the page. Completely random slop. when watching a video and trying to look at the description it'll kick you out multiple times to show you the ads on the bottom.

it's Facebook in alls it's good and bad. however, it's becoming a overall negative experience. you see more tending Facebook posts than your friends, the algorithm puts random things that you may or may not care about and there are tons of ads. worst part is they put ads in the middle of videos on top of all the ads you scroll past. I get I'm not the customer but I no longer watch videos when they are interrupted by more ads. at least give me usable videos between the scroll ads.

Facebook is a great platform for staying connected with friends and family. It lets you share photos, updates, and memories easily. The app also has features like groups, marketplace, and events, which are useful for both personal and community use. However, the app can feel a bit cluttered at times with too many features and ads. Overall, it’s still a solid app for social networking and staying in touch.

What happened to the "X" in the right hand corner? Seems like the last update on my Android device, it has dissappeared Plus, really annoying that my feed has single photo posts from people, groups, and Pages, I follow, that had been part of a larger post earlier. Mo content with them. really useless Facebook. Another very annoying aspect of Facebook in general is the suggested items that pop into my feed almost endlessly that I click to never show again. Stop with the suggested feed items.

This app needs a huge update! Notifications are severly late! When you post you can't even see what you post. And then you cant even see the comments until an hour or so later! No one sees your group post because Facebook doesn't show it and for lack of delays! too many ads and videos in time line. It also doesn't load correctly at times. On the iPad the Facebook post are black. Ridiculous

the sheer volume of adverts is horrendous. In a 2 minute video there can be 6 ads. they last longer than what I'm watching. They are also often interstate/international ads that have no bearing on where I'm located. I've now noticed ads in my notifications!! don't use Facebook anywhere near as much as I used too. very poor form.

I've had to uninstall and re install this app multiple times today. It keeps showing old posts from days or even weeks ago and refuses to refresh. "you're all caught up for now" keeps popping up when that clearly is not true. When I try sharing/forwarding a fb post to messenger, it says "chats unavailable right now" (and no, I'm not blocked by the person I'm sending it to). FIX THIS! I also dont get notifications until days later the last few months. 90% of my newsfeed is ads or sponsored posts.
App runs smoother and has awesome features. Just WAAAAAAAAYYYY tooo many ads. Starting to get ridiculous.

ADS ADS ADS! the app has already been ad ridden for years, especially the "reels", heck you go to watch a 10 second reel and halfway through you get hit with a 2 min ad, this ain't YouTube, we're not watching full length videos here! They're barely even clips! Then, whatever they've done recently has made it even worse! Just scrolling through the main feed, LITERALLY every third post is an AD! It's sickening how incessant ADs are in everything we do. It's just one big AD with occasional posts

This most recent update is for THE BIRDS!! I have never encountered so many bugs with this app my entire time of using it! Trying to upload videos is a pain, but what's the complete WORST is not being notified of comments & then if you are magically notified - when you attempt to view the comment, guess what!?!? There's nothing there! I've tried refreshing the page, refreshing my listings, deleting the cache, restarting the app & my phone; I've even deleted & reinstalled the app, still nothing!

The refresh frequency on Android is way too frequent now. Literally every time I switch apps, even just for a split second to test this, the feed refreshes. This needs to be fixed ASAP, because it makes me not want to use the app, if I'm always losing my place.

constantly showing videos of people getting injured and breaking bones. videos of people probably dying although you can't really see anything but you know they're probably dead. iv reported. iv clicked not interested several dozen times on every single one I see and they keep popping up. absolute disgrace of an app in its current state. and now it appears to have hidden the option for me to report videos of people dying. disgusting.

Is this software even tested? Between this and messenger, you guys have the longest lasting bugs. How long are we going to deal with this one where If an ad comes on, and then you switch the video, and then you go back, you've got the video playing in back of the ad? I'm hoping this one lasts less than the year plus that it took to fix the image orientation issue in messenger... honestly, I understand this is a complex ecosystem. With the money that FB pulls in, obvious bugs shouldn't release.

It should integrate Messenger, no longer retain it as a separate app, but not Whatsapp. The app refreshes too often, to the point that one is afraid to accidentally close it because you can't find the last post anymore. The comment option "all", "most relevant" and "newest" is the most annoying thing ever. Just put all comments by default and then give the chance for the others.

Still the Best Social App! Facebook continues to be a great platform for staying in touch with friends, discovering events, joining groups, and sharing memories. I love how easy it is to post updates, browse photos, and interact with content. The Marketplace is super useful, and the ability to follow pages and interests keeps my feed engaging. It's a one-stop place for social connection. Highly recommended! 👍

I really enjoy seeing who views my stories—it's one of my favorite features. However, I've noticed that when I check my Story Archive, I can only see who reacted to the story, not everyone who viewed it. It would be a huge improvement if Facebook allowed users to see all viewers of a story, even after a few days, regardless of whether they left a reaction or not. Keeping that information available longer would make the experience much better.

Good app, but I have a suggestion for app and desktop versions. When listing an item on the market place, there should be a check box for "mark item as available". When the buyer sees the advert, a green box should appear stating "item is available" in a prominent location on the UI. The default text in the message box should no longer read "is this available", but maybe offer up the user a choice to schedule a viewing or confirm they would like to purchase the item.

Could fb please get a button or something so that when you minimise it to look at something else, it doesn't automatically reset your page. I would like to at least have the option of watching what I was busy with. Or what would be even better is seeing the last few things of what I interacted with. So many times I'm looking at something good and then bam, lose it and can't find it again. This is on the phone fb app for clarity. I hate using most apps on laptop

12/11/24 With the last update, it consistently fails. It won't go to pressed tabs. Can't see notifications, messages or the like. When able to get to messages, can't reply to messages. Tried uninstalling w/ no luck. _______ This used to be a decent app. In the last few months, most images on profiles (even mine) show up as a black screen. I had the issue on my original phone, cleared the memory cache, but still had the issue. I got a replacement phone, and still have that problem. Please help!

Constantly freezes and shuts down. They never seem to fix the issues. I'll have a decent run, then suddenly my phone starts freezing all because, surprise! FB has a bug again! Maybe it's just an android issue, but it shouldn't be an ongoing problem. I've asked other people who also have androids, and they have the same issues.

I liked it at first because it was a good way to keep in touch with friends and family, but now it's constantly suggested posts filling up my feed with a bunch of stuff I don't care about. Now all of the reels have SO many ads that you can't skip so it's not enjoyable to watch. Like a 6 minute video can have over 4 ads and when you scroll it's an ad every 2 videos. It's ridiculous, I only really keep my account for messenger, everything outside of that is just not enjoyable anymore

title: Mercado Libre: Compras online
description: Las mejores ofertas exclusivas con envío gratis en 24 horas. ¡Descarga la app Mercado Libre y aprovecha para ahorrar en tus compras online! Encuentra diversas categorías de productos: electrodomésticos, TV, heladera, cocina, ropas, calzados, electrónicos, celulares, PC Gamer y mucho más. Además de comprar, puedes vender tus productos. COMPRAR ONLINE ¡Comprá todo lo que usted necesita a través de la app Mercado Libre! Es muy fácil buscar precios y comprar online. ¡Conozca diferentes categorías de productos! Electrodomésticos, ropa, electrónicos, alimentos y bebidas para comprar en línea utilizando la aplicación oficial que reúne millones de productos de sus marcas favoritas. Encuentre la mayor variedad de productos para que usted pueda comparar precios, ver las opiniones de otros compradores y estar preparado para hacer sus compras por Internet. 🔍 En la mayor tienda online encontrará varias categorías y podrá comprar todo tipo de productos y regalos en una sola aplicación, como: - Supermercado: aperitivos, dulces, chocolates, vinos; - Moda: camisetas, camisas, pantalones, vaqueros, zapatillas, ropa deportiva; - Electrodomésticos: heladera, cocina, microondas, lavadora, aspiradora; - Electrónicos: Pc gamer, notebook, celulares. - Cuidado personal: perfumes, maquillaje, cremas; - Automóviles: accesorios para vehículos, neumáticos y muchos otros productos. 📌 Promociones, ofertas y precios bajos para ahorrar en su compra online. Además de disfrutar de las promociones, con nuestros envíos gratuitos en 24 horas* recibirá sus compras online súper rápido. En la tienda online puede encontrar descuentos exclusivos y miles de marcas: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), coches, motos, electrodomésticos (heladeras y microondas), protector solar, perfumes, productos de maquillaje y belleza, moda (zapatillas, vaqueros, pantalones cortos, vestidos) y ropa deportiva. Ventajas de comprar online en la aplicación: - Marque los productos que más le gusten para comprarlos en promoción. 📌 - Facilite sus compras en línea utilizando filtros de precio, ubicación y envío gratuito. 🔍 - Disponemos de una variedad de productos por categorías para comparar precios: electrodomésticos, muebles (cama, colchón, sofá), moda (ropa, vaqueros, shorts, vestidos, zapatos), maquillaje, productos de belleza (protector solar, bronceadores), muebles, alimentos y bebidas. - Ahorre dinero con descuentos en las tiendas online oficiales. 💸 - 12 cuotas con tarjeta de débito, tarjeta de crédito, efectivo, sin tarjeta de Mercado Crédito o con el dinero disponible en la cuenta de Mercado Pago 💳 - Reciba su pedido sin salir de casa con envío gratuito en 24 horas. 🚚 - Gestione sus compras online y comience a vender online. - Compre online con ofertas exclusivas y envío gratis: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), juegos, electrodomésticos (cocina, heladera), motos, coches, libros, protector solar, productos de belleza, muebles (sofá, colchón), ropa deportiva, vestidos, pantalones, zapatos, sombreros, productos de supermercado, refrescos, aperitivos y dulces. - Aproveche los descuentos para comprar sus productos online a bajo precio, con promociones especiales. PELÍCULAS Y SERIES GRATIS Disfruta gratis de películas, series y contenido infantil en Mercado Play. Puedes hacerlo desde tu computadora o celular. También puedes transmitir en tu televisor a través de chromecast. Accede desde el ícono en la página principal de Mercado Libre para ver películas y series cuando quieras. VENDER ONLINE ¡Con Mercado Libre usted puede vender más rápido! - Haga sus anuncios gratis en 4 sencillos pasos y empiece a vender online. 🔖 - Gestione sus compras y ventas online desde su cuenta. 📱 - Hable con su comprador o vendedor a través de nuestra herramienta de mensajes instantáneos. 📨 Venda electrodomésticos, perfumes, productos de belleza, maquillaje, ropa, deportes, electrónicos, coches, motos, accesorios para vehículos, neumáticos, alimentos y bebidas.
descriptionHTML:
Las mejores ofertas exclusivas con envío gratis en 24 horas. ¡Descarga la app Mercado Libre y aprovecha para ahorrar en tus compras online! Encuentra diversas categorías de productos: electrodomésticos, TV, heladera, cocina, ropas, calzados, electrónicos, celulares, PC Gamer y mucho más. Además de comprar, puedes vender tus productos.

COMPRAR ONLINE

¡Comprá todo lo que usted necesita a través de la app Mercado Libre! Es muy fácil buscar precios y comprar online.

¡Conozca diferentes categorías de productos! Electrodomésticos, ropa, electrónicos, alimentos y bebidas para comprar en línea utilizando la aplicación oficial que reúne millones de productos de sus marcas favoritas.

Encuentre la mayor variedad de productos para que usted pueda comparar precios, ver las opiniones de otros compradores y estar preparado para hacer sus compras por Internet.

🔍 En la mayor tienda online encontrará varias categorías y podrá comprar todo tipo de productos y regalos en una sola aplicación, como:
- Supermercado: aperitivos, dulces, chocolates, vinos;
- Moda: camisetas, camisas, pantalones, vaqueros, zapatillas, ropa deportiva;
- Electrodomésticos: heladera, cocina, microondas, lavadora, aspiradora;
- Electrónicos: Pc gamer, notebook, celulares.
- Cuidado personal: perfumes, maquillaje, cremas;
- Automóviles: accesorios para vehículos, neumáticos y muchos otros productos.

📌 Promociones, ofertas y precios bajos para ahorrar en su compra online. Además de disfrutar de las promociones, con nuestros envíos gratuitos en 24 horas* recibirá sus compras online súper rápido.

En la tienda online puede encontrar descuentos exclusivos y miles de marcas: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), coches, motos, electrodomésticos (heladeras y microondas), protector solar, perfumes, productos de maquillaje y belleza, moda (zapatillas, vaqueros, pantalones cortos, vestidos) y ropa deportiva.

Ventajas de comprar online en la aplicación:

- Marque los productos que más le gusten para comprarlos en promoción. 📌
- Facilite sus compras en línea utilizando filtros de precio, ubicación y envío gratuito. 🔍
- Disponemos de una variedad de productos por categorías para comparar precios: electrodomésticos, muebles (cama, colchón, sofá), moda (ropa, vaqueros, shorts, vestidos, zapatos), maquillaje, productos de belleza (protector solar, bronceadores), muebles, alimentos y bebidas.
- Ahorre dinero con descuentos en las tiendas online oficiales. 💸
- 12 cuotas con tarjeta de débito, tarjeta de crédito, efectivo, sin tarjeta de Mercado Crédito o con el dinero disponible en la cuenta de Mercado Pago 💳
- Reciba su pedido sin salir de casa con envío gratuito en 24 horas. 🚚
- Gestione sus compras online y comience a vender online.
- Compre online con ofertas exclusivas y envío gratis: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), juegos, electrodomésticos (cocina, heladera), motos, coches, libros, protector solar, productos de belleza, muebles (sofá, colchón), ropa deportiva, vestidos, pantalones, zapatos, sombreros, productos de supermercado, refrescos, aperitivos y dulces.
- Aproveche los descuentos para comprar sus productos online a bajo precio, con promociones especiales.

PELÍCULAS Y SERIES GRATIS

Disfruta gratis de películas, series y contenido infantil en Mercado Play. Puedes hacerlo desde tu computadora o celular. También puedes transmitir en tu televisor a través de chromecast. Accede desde el ícono en la página principal de Mercado Libre para ver películas y series cuando quieras.

VENDER ONLINE

¡Con Mercado Libre usted puede vender más rápido!

- Haga sus anuncios gratis en 4 sencillos pasos y empiece a vender online. 🔖
- Gestione sus compras y ventas online desde su cuenta. 📱
- Hable con su comprador o vendedor a través de nuestra herramienta de mensajes instantáneos. 📨

Venda electrodomésticos, perfumes, productos de belleza, maquillaje, ropa, deportes, electrónicos, coches, motos, accesorios para vehículos, neumáticos, alimentos y bebidas.
summary: Envío en 24h con las mejores oportunidades: electrodomésticos, electrónicos y +

scraped_reviews.content: Mercado libre is the most frustrating, most annoying dance and the bush, failure of a service I have ever tried to use. I've spent hours trying to get an account set up, getting local phone numbers and everything, and still can't get an account bc of it's failure to let me upload an ID, in addition to every other bit bad software involved. To say that I hate you would be a gross understatement.

I was ready to purchase a honey whale wolf scooter, 2 electric kettles, and a fossilbot cellular, and suddenly they disappeared from the shopping cart, and when I went to reopen the app sadly, I wasn't able to locate said items no longer. As of yet, I still can't find them to order em. Otherwise I would have loved the app 😔

Never buy more than one item from the same seller. If they try to trick you by sending only one item, the status of all items will appear as delivered, and Mercado Libre will not help you recover the money for the items not received.

Extremely buggy, I find it soo hard to login, like it insisting on facial recignition all the time, and it doesnt work! That its practically unusable. I have given up. Just use Amazon. Buggy and useless. Does not work

I wouldn't recommend the app at all. It asks for facial recognition in order to log you in and it doesn't give more options to log in. It's so much easier with other apps. Just download Amazon or any other that doesn't require you to use as much personal info.

It’s disappointing that Mercado Livre has turned into more of a Chinese shopping site. There’s no option to filter out imported items and view only Brazilian products. This makes it difficult to support local sellers and find national products. The platform should offer better tools for choosing where items come from.

It's worse .photos don't upload .products don't work .impossible to return. Terrible customer service ..Don't use. Warning this not like ebay or Amazon. Untrustworthy. Return Purchases from foreign countries (China) are a nightmare. The international countries want to negotiate a return.. 😡 Definitely would NOT recommend if you are an expat.. The return system is just awful. The communication with representatives untrustworthy. I got .. This service is NOT equal to PayPal or Amazon.
Easy and reliable app, never had an issue buying or even returning something if it didn't work as expected, I.e. a part that wasn't exactly for my car.
I ordered 4 organizers, they cancelled 1, the 2 more, and I felt a risk, Soni cancelled the last one. No response to my messages, no explanation.
first purchase and I've already be scammed! no wonder why Amazon and the likes are real trustable e-commerce platforms!!

The app is okay but it would be much better if you could log into it. The app is so secure on Android tablets that you can't log in through the only possible way offered: a face recognition software that doesn't recognize face, or even uses the right camera! And unlike every other version of the app, there's no other way to log in. Congrats! Edit: nothing has changed since my review.

unable to verify identity in Colombia due to only having cc, ce, and nit as options, no passport no new IDs for venezuelans in Colombia, I bought something from china, was scammed and now I don't have access to my account, I can not return the q tips they sent instead of my screen extensor, I guess they reported me as scam or something... DO BETTER!! I know I lost my money now, and the others accounts I had....I won't use you guys again, bye
Reliable, efficient and fast delivery.

The interface is practical, but the affiliate program is problematic: affiliate links create a barrier, redirecting users to a page that highlights third-party recommendations, which can generate distrust. This suggests the recommendation is profit-driven, not quality-based, undermining confidence in the purchase. I do not recommend using the affiliate program.
This app a little complicated for me only because the language, but otherwise it’s so great.

Used to be great. Now it is appalling. I have had so many experiences recently where they have made errors and I have had to pay, or of buying what turned out to be useless junk and them not allowing me to return it, my list goes on. Now they have frozen my account with no warning and won't allow me back in (I need to return items) unless I provide the most intrusive photos, selfies, personal documents... for SHOPPING! Unbelievable!
it doesn't have the option for unite States when first open I can't even pass that country selection

I've been using this app for more than a year now, and i noticed the general UI is a little too bright, would it be possible to get something like a Dark Mode setting? or make the app compatible with Samsung's Dark Mode.

this app is bugging out so badly like the screen goes to a blank state, once in favorites or search mode, everything disappears when I start scrolling. went here to check if there was an update , and no. what strikes me the most is how come the app is so broken now given the website works fine? it's kind of incompetent to be honest , an app this big shouldn't have such bugs

Mercadolibre has become the worst purchase app experience, I can not log into my account since I decided to shave my beard, so ridiculous, can someone please contact me to solve this or should I just keep on using other platforms???
twice the date of my arrival was modified, and when I tried to cancel, the button to confirm cancelation does not work. It does not take my cancelation
i dont have peruvian document am here as a tourist and they didnt let me return what i bought even after contacting support they said I couldnt do anything.

I have been shopping at ML for years and enjoyed it. It was easy to be reimbursed for an item returned. When I was given a credit, I used it to pay my next order and it was easy, the system automatically applied the credit. Now, the system requires me to take a photo of my passport then tells me it can't access my photo because of a permission issue. I was not able to correct this permission issue. I never managed to use the credit so it looks like I lost it. :(

Sold a product, the date for my payment is up and all I can get is error messages. When I try to contact them via app I get redirected to the home page. Now I don't have my product, didn't get my money and have no way to get in contact with anyone, because not only is their app completely useless, but their website is even worse. Don't download if you like your money.

Well, at install I am confronted with a number of south American countries to choose from. Sorry, but I am from Trinidad and Tobago , next door but my country is English speaking. Trinidad and Tobago is excluded at the start of installation as a result my choice would be to choose a country that I do not belong to or exit the app. My obvious choice, I exited the app and uninstall it. So my first experience was NOT GOOD. I am still hopeful though that things can improve with this feedback.

No way to contact anyone. Ordered a product more than a month ago. Got a message saying that the product was dispatched and an updated delivery date will be assigned in a few hours. It's been more than a month and I'm still waiting. Contacted the seller and they said they sent the product my way and I should talk to MercadoLibre, but there's no way to do that.
¡Thank you so much for offering Mercado Play free of charge!

Horrible customer service. There were two packages that I ordered but were never delivered. They were returned to the seller due to a problem Mercado Livre caused with my address. I called customer support multiple times, and they always passed my case to someone else. I could never log into the portal to view my case because I needed a form of Brazilian ID that I don't have yet. If you can't offer me a refund, you shouldn't have let me buy the products in the first place. I've lost over R$1000
too much pop up adds. The functionality is good but the ads are insane

The app's language is in a weird mix of spanish and portuguese, and I couldn't find a way to change its language to only portuguese. Besides that, it works fine but it's a not so good store to buy retro video games, considering the prices and the fact that they are unable to eliminate the selling of pirate software/copies, or at least give a good way to filter this kind of results. The bad pricing is on the sellers fault though, not the website or app.
easy to buy something and fast delivery's
no need for this app... checking your orders should be accessible from the web version
Excellent service and delivery service !!
good place to buy things. and always on time.
invades my privacy. i have the right to snoop around at products, this does not mean that the AI BOT has the right to harrass me.

When Mercado Libre owed me money from a purchase that went wrong they set up a ridiculous standard of proof of my identity before sending me the money. They required several selfies of me holding my passport in various positions around my face, confirmed that they were good pictures (by phone) and then sent a boilerplate email saying that the pictures weren't clear enough (never specifying what data or aspect wasn't clear). I did this 8 times!! I never needed selfies to make purchases.

Worst on refund options...They even want you to pay shipment (they're offering a refund for extra expenses)...Still not a best option specially when you already refunded twice because their mistake....Paying extra cash for a refund (besides gas and time), not a good customer service plus not even a apologizing solution...Now I'm keeping a product that I didn't wanted cause their mistake...Also a system failure that couldn't generate a tracking refund sticker in order to proceed & they can't fix

They're terrible, at least in my experience they never deliver on time, the packages are always delayed for whatever reason and the tracking information is never updated. They're always rescheduling the delivery last minute, rather than just setting realistic delivery dates in the first place. Shop elsewhere if you need things quickly and you aren't looking forward to waiting a week for your refund to even begin being processed because your purchases never arrived. Big let down!

Mercado libre is good and getting better. they are replicating what amazon does in the US. The creation of a marketplace is even more needed in Arg, where buyers and sellers struggle to find eachother, and do it with confidence. They need to make it even easier to buy by making the arrival clear, then deliver on time. The uncertainty alone I am sure prevents some sales. I had to return an item once, the refund was fast and easy. I was surprised, and it gave me the confidence to keep using ML.

If you don't have problems with the purchase everything goes well. There is some sellers that take advantage of mercado libre reputation to get the money of the users and needs to be more regulated. So as a user please, if u find people like this make the right complaint against they. The devolution of the money can take a really long time.

Horrible. I had to hire a translator to deal with them, I got over 20 messages in one day, its basically like signing up for spam. I ordered one thing and they denied my credit card after billing it successfully, then wanted a photo of me and my Id, and sent over a dozen messages, there is no language option... delivered it to the wrong address, opened it and then retrieved it and delivered after 9pm. It's just insanity.

Be careful when you make an international purchase because the package will most likely end up getting lost and from personal experience I can say that they will find a loophole to not give you back your money. And somehow they will find a way to blame you for it. In other words it's greatly unreliable so I would recommend AMAZON over Mercado libre.amazons customer service is way more helpful

***Por Favor lean estoy antes de ordenar!***Its ok unless they send you the wrong item. I'm disabled and live in a small town. the next town is about 25 minutes away and they want me to go to the next town for a return. why should I be the one to go out of my way for there mistake? no they should have someone pick up the item with a label printed for returns. do better mercado libre! be like Amazon even though your not. I miss Amazon but they don't have the items I need. Me voy con amazon Mejor!

The website is very buggy. When something goes wrong there is no number to call. If everything works then fine. I ordered something and placed the delivery address. The correct address was verified on the receipt only for the system to change it to an old address when it was actually shipped. I woll think twice before ysing this site again. Unreliable!

So many times the products that arrive are wrong or damaged and they only allow 3 returns per year. It is a handy service but most products have better prices in other places. If you have an issue they only have robot support which is terrible. They allow too many vendors to sell the same thing which makes it terrible to sort through. Great concept that could be a lot better.

The app could've been better. Everytime a customer or a possible buyer sends me a message and I try to get in touch with this person the app itself deletes my message and says that my message contains personal information that couldn't be sent. THAT IS PREPOSTEROUS! I'm the one who should sai IF I'm giving personal information. Not the app. I've been losing many proposals on account of that. Really bureaucratic. I strongly don't recommend it!

I can't say it works because it doesn't offer Canada or US to choose between the list of countries after opening the app. So, unfortunately, I can't use this app for my needs, but for local people on that list of countries, they may find the app useful. If they are open in modifying the app for a wider consumer market for those mentioned countries, I'll be glad to use it and re-review the app.

I made several purchases initially with no issues whatsoever but after that my account was suspended with no customer service available to resolve the issue. They keep asking for ID but the system does not recognize it. Hence, I can no longer use the service. I was using this as well as Amazon. Sometimes the prices are better here and sometimes on Amazon. It depends on the outrageous import fees. I found an alternate means to make my last purchase with the vendor.

I installed the app and it started acting up right away. I'm in the US and it kept asking for my country and US wasn't even an option. Then my phone started locking up and freezing right away. And since I couldn't get past the first page because my country wasn't an option, and with the way my phone started misbehaving I just uninstalled it immediately. I tried to reach their customer service to see if I had done something wrong but was unable to.

I love mercadolibre. One thing i don't like is that mercado envios is forced on vendors. Not everyone has a printer and it is better for some vendors and incredibly complicated for others, including a trip to the papelería to print off the label, and the cost of that, just to ship the product. Vendors should have the choice to select mercadoenvios for their products, or ship them by a traditional agency such as DAC, Turil, ect... Other than that, I love mercadolibre. Thanks and blessings.

title: Revolut: Spend, Save, Trade
description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

Make your spend, well-spent
Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay
Spend abroad with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
Access 55+ K in-network ATMs worldwide with no fees
Link your external bank accounts to stay on top of all your spending
Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply).

Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are
Request or send 25+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are almost instant between your Revolut friends with P2P payments
Split and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way
Grow your money with up to 4.25%* APY with Savings Vaults, Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash

Explore Stock Trading (capital at risk)
Start trading stocks from $1 (other fees may apply)
Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
Enjoy no-commission stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)

All investments involve risk, including possible loss of principal. Investment accounts and disclosures may be displayed together. Self-directed brokerage products are provided by Revolut Securities Inc., member FINRA/SIPC. Brokerage Products •  Not FDIC Insured • No Bank Guarantee • May Lose Value. Automated investing is provided by Revolut Wealth Inc, an SEC-registered investment adviser.

End the overspend
Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don't be — we'll notify you beforehand
Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, and even cooler perks. Pick the plan that's right for you: Premium or Metal (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control
Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
Use single-use cards with new details generated each time you use it, for an extra layer of protection
Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money
Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams, and nip 'em in the bud
Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
We're available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Funds in your Revolut Prepaid Card Account are held at or transferred to Lead Bank, Member FDIC, and are insured by the FDIC up to $250,000 applicable limits by the FDIC in the event Lead Bank fails if specific deposit insurance requirements are met. See FDIC-Prepaid Cards and Deposit Insurance Coverage.

California Privacy Notice:  https://www.revolut.com/en-US/legal/privacy

*The highest APY is available to users on a Premium or Metal plan. Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is a variable rate and subject to change. These APYs are accurate as of October, 20th, 2023. Monthly fees apply for Premium and Metal plans. Terms and Conditions Apply. No minimum amount required. Savings Vault services provided by Sutton Bank, Member FDIC

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorized by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference 900562). Registered address: 107 Greenwich Street, 20th Floor, New York, NY 10006
