summary: Change the way you money

scraped_reviews.content: App flow and layout is kind of labyrinthine and it's far too easy to make an accidental transfer of funds from bank or card because it does not ask you to review and confirm once you have the payment sources set up. You tap "continue" and it just starts processing. Incredibly easy to just press on accident when you're not ready to make the transfer
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thank you for your suggestion regarding the app flow and layout. Your input is valuable to us. We are continuously working to improve our products and features, and we have passed your feedback on to our team. If you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us through the in-app chat.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the Revolut app! It’s so easy to link all my bank accounts and transfer money between them. The card options are amazing—multiple physical cards, online-only cards, and even temporary ones for free trials. The widgets make tracking spending, net worth, and credit score simple, and the investing section is a nice bonus. Plus, the themes are pretty and help keep each account organized. Best banking app I’ve used!

Revolut used to be good and my go-to bank card when traveling. However, I recently decided to give their Premium subscription a try since they offered a free trial -- nowhere did they say that they would charge 20€ to cancel after the free trial!! The only way to avoid this fee would have been to continue the subscription for 10 months, which is just unreasonable!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we’re sorry to hear about your experience regarding the plan downgrade. We have a cooling-off period of 14 days. If you downgrade your plan after that timeframe, a break fee applies. More information on this can be found here: https://bit.ly/3J7Uho1. For further help, contact us via the in-app chat by going to Profile > Help > Chat with us.

scraped_reviews.content: The app looks very well designed, and being able to track your expenses in style is nice. It is easy to track who is charging your card with very well defined names. However, if you need to add money from another bank account, it has problems. The linked bank account is not updated well, so although you have money in your linked bank, it shows the balance from a day ago. When you add money from that account, you have to wait a few days. A similar app like Wise can do this instantly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We've made sure to pass it over to our team. If you’d like to share more about your experience with the app, feel free to contact our in-app chat support team by going to Profile > Help > How can we help > Chat with us. One of our agents will do their best to help you, and address your concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: In our experience, the referral campaign was a scam. The referral program is running basically non-stop, but restarts periodically and if your referral misses the deadline of making 3 purchases just by a day, no commission is paid out. It's just a tricky way of saving on rewards and hiding behind the conditions. This happened to two family members so far. I cannot condone this, reason why we've all decided to cancel our accounts. Some of our friends will probably follow.

This company is your nightmare waiting to happen. They froze my cards for no apparent reason other than security in general. Then closed my account for no apparent reason other than the rules (really ambiguous, could be one of four things, each of which is itself ambiguous). Then I have to pay two months of fees to cancel my subscription. But I have to wait for a mighty slow bank transfer and hope it gets there in time to cancel the plan without wasting more of my money. What next???
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello. It may happen that we will have to close or suspend your account immediately and end your access to our services. This page on our website might come in handy when trying to understand this process a bit better: https://bit.ly/3SHEyjD
Kindly reach out to our team via email, at help@revolut.com, to receive a detailed explanation.

scraped_reviews.content: downgrading from 5 stars to 1 star. Stock trading has glitched for me. Can't access my money, can't perform transactions. doesn't work on Android app, doesn't work on a Windows browser. Spent a ridiculous amount of time troubleshooting with a chat bot only for them to finally acknowledge that the problem is likely on their side. I'm left in "your problem has been escalated, somebody will look into it. Check back later" This should NEVER happen with a finance app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Sorry to see your experience with our support, related to the issue you're facing with our app for stock and transfer feature led to such a review. We always aim to help our customers with our best means, however certain processes take some time. Please email us at help@revolut.com, if you're not finding the desired help from our in-app chat.

scraped_reviews.content: I like that the app is feature rich and UI/UX is superior to any bank or Fintech I used. On the other hand, FX has a hidden fee. There is no official fee, yet selling and buying is at a different price. Overall, Wise is slightly cheaper (fraction of a percent) with their fees included. I prefer their transparency with fees clearly stated and not hidden behind different sell and buy prices.

Great app, easy accounting. Notifications of each payment with notes you can add plus upload receipts if needed. Multiple currencies available for travellers, etc. Tracks contactless payment limit and reset limit function. I was also able to report a scammer and claim a refund via the app, which they investigated, and I won in a timely and easy process.

As a traveler, this app/card is so handy and useful. Being able to create one use cards means i don't have to worry. The one time i had an issue with my card, Revolut were very fast at rectifying the situation, sending me a new physical card and cancelling the old. I was able to use the new app immediately with the new card. I trust this card.

Revolut is a great money app, especially for travellers. it's has no extra fees when you spend abroad. the app is easy to use and let you send money fast. you can also buy and sell crypo and stocks. it has strong security, with virtual cards for safe shopping. it helps you track spending and send money worldwide at low cost. the app is very useful

Perfect for organising payments separately for different things like subscriptions, travel expenses or general spending. Great for extra security of not having to give out your card number for your main account when using with retailers for either online or in person payments. Great way to budget and easy to link up to Google pay.

Tried out the Revolut app recently and was pleasantly surprised by how smooth everything felt. The interface is clean, and everything is laid out in a way that’s easy to understand. I didn’t have to dig around to find what I needed — from sending money to checking exchange rates, it all feels super straightforward. Definitely one of the more user-friendly finance apps I’ve tried.

The app is basically perfect for every type of financial transaction I can think of, from international transactions to shares and other things. The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because it has this random tendency to stop working. You have to reinstall it to get it to work again. This bug happens once in a blue moon though. I haven't been able to test what triggers it yet

The Revolut app is a game-changer for managing finances. Its user-friendly interface makes it easy to track spending and manage accounts. The ability to hold multiple currencies and exchange money at competitive rates is a huge plus, especially for travelers. Customer support is responsive, and the app offers a variety of features like budgeting tools and cryptocurrency trading. Overall, it's a solid choice for anyone looking to simplify their financial management.

Great bank, works well, and saves a lot of fees when travelling. It's easy and fast to transfer money and intuitive to use. Works with gpay, apple pay, and physical cards, and even in the free plan, there are not too many ads. Also, you get a lot of benefits when you decide on a paid plan. I would recommend it for everyone who's travelling frequently or handling payments in different currencies.

I’ve been on the Revolut waitlist in India for a long time, and the app keeps sending me daily notifications saying “Only a few steps left — your account is almost set up.” But when I tap it, the app just shows “Your account will be ready soon” with no option to complete the process. If the onboarding isn’t open yet, please avoid sending misleading notifications. It creates confusion and feels like the account is ready when it actually isn’t. I really like Revolut and want to use it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We’re sorry to see that you are facing issues with the signup process. In order to help you, please reach out to us at help@revolut.com. We will be able to help you as soon as we get your email. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: These push-notification campaigns are getting really annoying. There's no way to turn them off in-app, and they "can't" do anything about it even after multiple reports. You have to turn all notifications off by force (thus stopping you from using the app when events you are interested in come up).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We recommend our customers to keep their notifications on in the app, in order to be updated about their accounts. However, we do understand your concern. If you're not finding the desired help following the steps here: https://bit.ly/42MuTwP, please reach in-app chat: Profile > Help > Chat with us, so our agents can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit reply: The Help Chat section doesn't work. It's only blank page! I wouldn't come here if it's working. Nothing work in my app. All freeze! Note that it is the second time I have this problem in just less than 2 months. Second time my account freeze!! I followed the instruction but still I can't use the account! I just use it for few days, nothing to complain. The rate is good for the online purchase I did.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We're sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction. We take such concerns seriously and would like to check this further to address any issues you encountered. Please contact our support via in-app chat so we can assist you promptly. You can create a chat by going to Profile > Help > Chat with us.

scraped_reviews.content: So far very happy with this app. Can do all banking from it, manage cards and accounts, transfers, currency exchanges, etc. All in a breeze, clear to use, without waiting times, and with low fees. As a bonus investing is at your fingertips and doesn't require an extra app. Love the disposable card that just adds this extra security for online shopping. All in all lots of power and options, even within the free plan. This is great example of how your banking app should be done these days.

The new system 'spare change' was activated without me knowing. so every time i made a transaction it took some change to round up the final purchase for some point. Well, all my purchases are already round up, so it took everytime 1 euro to give me 50 point (0.035 euro towards a giftcard). Really nice of them. As an additional information, you can't see the transaction unless you press to see all of them. Nothing shady here guys.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi.
We’re sorry to hear about the trouble you’re having with RevPoints spare change.
Please get in touch with us via the in-app chat, so we can look into this. To do so, go to your profile, tap ‘Help’, scroll down and tap ‘Support’ to open a chat with us.
Our team will be more than happy to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Good app, terrible customer care. In theory it could be a nice app with several features. But you just have to hope you will never need support from the customer care, otherwise you will just waste time. I wanted my sister to also have Revolut, it's been 6 months now and she can't activate her account because the account verification procedure is totally NONSENSE. We have exchanged with several agents for weeks, they can't sort this out and don't understand the issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Truly sorry to hear about your sister's account experience. We aim to provide excellent service, and we apologize for falling short in your case. Please ask your sister to send us a DM at Facebook/Instagram/X or email us at help@revolut.com. Our team will get back to her as soon as possible. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I like it and once you know your way around the app, it gets easier. I like the option on accounts which pay way more interest than other banks and you can save, invest in stocks/shares, EFT's and commodities. You can also run through some tutorials about how to invest at a very basic level. I would recommend it.

promises all features but you cannot use them or you cannot pass their hidden terms and conditions. they constantly change the Information architecture and navigation . don't upgrade by any means as you never get what is promised. not enough lounges, travel insurance is a scam. you need to use revolut for all your trip costs ( or at least 70%). plus you cannot have multi stops journeys to your destination.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're sorry to hear that your experience with us has resulted in such a review. Could you please drop us a message via the in-app chat feature? To start a new chat, please go to profile -> help -> chat with us. Our agents will be more than happy to assist you. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I've signed up for a new account. After a few days a got a push notification stating that my account is ready. I receive this push every couple of days during more than a week. But every time I open the app it shows the message: "Awesome! You took the first step to open your account". And the only options are "Invite friends" and "Log out".
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello.
We're sorry to hear about the issue you've been facing while trying to open an account with us.
We would like to look into this for you.
Please reach out to us via X, Instagram, Facebook or help@revolut.com e-mail address, if you can't contact us through Social Media.

scraped_reviews.content: One of the worst customer support experiences I have ever interacted with. Revolut is unable to verify my account, & customer support is utterly useless. I have been in contact with them over the last few weeks, & each time I have to give them the same information, & they ask me to enter the same details over and over. No one seems competent enough to actually help. Edit after contacting support again: nope, still as useless as ever. Issue not resolved and Revolut team still cannot seem to help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to know that your experience with Revolut has made you feel this way. Please reach out to us on our social media platforms (X, Instagram, Facebook) where we can assist you further on the DM. Alternatively, you can also email us at help@revolut.com, and one of our agents will promptly respond to your inquiry.

scraped_reviews.content: edited to 3 star from 5! withdrawals from savings keeps breaking and it being stuck in pending. on top of this issue again happening, support chat is now down along with 90% of the app no way to contact. no access to money. very embarrassing when I was out and was just going to quickly transfer a payment and couldn't. 2nd time in a couple of weeks. not acceptable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear you’re dissatisfied with the support you received regarding your issue with your transfer. We're always striving to improve, and appreciate your feedback. In case you’re not able to get help via the chat, please get in touch with us via our social media (Facebook. Instagram, X) or e-mail us at help@revolut.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Epic fails with verification. Did it 3 times, no information if I passed it or not. no information if there were any issues. only the permanent notification to verify. The support is not able to help. They admitted there is an issue in the backend and I should keep checking. When I check they just say to do the verifying and find out if the problem is solved. they have no knowledge if it was solved or not.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Manoj, we're sorry to hear about the difficulty you're experiencing with the verification and your experience with our support. We would like to take a closer look at this. Please DM us on our official social media channels (Facebook/ X /Instagram) or email us at help@revolut.com. We’ll do our best to help you. Thanks in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: I accidentally sent money to Revolut instead of my PayPal and had a hell of a time trying to figure out how to simply withdraw the money to my bank. Why is there no clear option to show that I can send the money somewhere else? It was just frustrating for me to use and took way longer than it should've, and online it kept saying there were simple options and steps that were NOT even in the app. So confusing for no reason. I was looking for a simple "withdraw" or "send" option, not "payments."
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear about your bad experience with your transfer. We'd love to help. Please drop us a message on the in-app chat by heading to your profile section -> help -> choose the topic of your inquiry -> chat with us.

scraped_reviews.content: Incredibly unimpressed by the sketchy referral scheme, which is virtually impossible to complete. There's no mention of the specific deadline within the T&C's which conveniently finishes on the same day it takes for you to receive your physical card that you need to use multiple times before the deadline. Rubbish, I would not recommend these crooks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear about your bad experience with your referral. We'd love to help. Please drop us a message on the in-app chat by heading to your profile section -> help -> choose the topic of your inquiry -> chat with us.

scraped_reviews.content: if I could put a zero star I would!! Worst bank ever. No direct phone number for assistance. only app AI agent, giving generic answers. Temp lock on my account for no reason, apparently for verification purposes but it doesnt take 2 weeks. And they send me the same messages. Just want my money back!! The review process on your account is still ongoing. I assure you that we are doing our best to finish this for you as soon as possible. You'll be notified once any resolution is available.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear about your account and your experience with our support. We have procedures in place to maintain regulatory standards and account security. More info: https://bit.ly/3SHEyjD. For further help, DM us on our official social media channels (Facebook/ X /Instagram) or email at help@revolut.com. We’ll do our best to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: The app's functionality is adequate, but physical card delivery and customer service are major issues. My own card took more than two months to arrive, while my referral's card is still missing one month after ordering. The lack of tracking and unhelpful Bulgarian partner company made the experience frustrating and unresolved. It's difficult to recommend a service with such unreliable support, especially when it costs money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Sorry to see the disappointment you faced with our referral and card delivery services. We'd like to take a closer look at this, so please feel to reach out to us via in-app chat by going to Profile > Help > Get more help and chat with us. If that is not possible, please email us at help@revolut.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It sorely needs a full online version, having to use the phone app all the time is neither safe nor convenient. Also, why force customers to update? I prefer to choose the time to download an update when it fits me, it's a hassle. I hate having to add extra security features on my phone to open this app- it's safe anyway as I don't use the phone for paying, it already needs a password, an email and phone number-no need for more security, unnecessary & tedious - stop it, please. Thanks
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We understand your dissatisfaction. However, please know that updating your Revolut App timely allows you to have an enhanced experience with us, and password is an important step for the safety of your App. Further, contact us via our social media channels (Facebook, Instagram, X). And we'll do our best to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's been nearly a week since I reached out to Revolut to solve my problem of the app not working and again zilch. I've provided them with all the information required, so what's the problem? Revolut app stopped working on my Android phone. Went through hoops with their customer support all to no avail. Now in process of closing account through them as app not working. They don't seem to know or care that my small amount of money is stuck with them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,

We're sorry to hear about your experience with the app and the difficulties you've faced with customer support. If you need any help, please send us a private message on Facebook, X, or Instagram, or email us at help@revolut.com. We'll do our best to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm impressed with how simple it is to get an international bank account. I haven't used it overseas yet. I've been practicing at home before I head out. I love the single use and permanent virtual cards that you can use within minutes of opening the account. I love that the free version seems to meet my use for this account. I love that it protects you from what might be sus purchases, but simple and quick for me to fix if those "sus" purchases ARE mine. Great product!

Absolutely useless. doesn't recognize my passcode, changing is not possible as the app is not able to scan my documents (though it was working during registration through web). currently locked out with no options to restore access. so turns out there is business and personal app (why?!). The personal app of course cannot provide proper error message an FAQ also doesn't mention this as a possible issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello.
We're sorry to hear about the issue you've been facing trying to access your account.
Please reach out to us via X, Instagram, Facebook or help@revolut.com e-mail address.
We would like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: The worst bank I ever encountered. They made me go through the same verification process at least 10 times. Each time, a new agent would come up with new rules and new timelines. Wouldn't bother to see previous tickets. Extremely unprofessional. Very concerning to keep any significant amount of money with them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Beka. Sorry to hear about the issue you're facing with the verification process, and your negative experience with our support. We'd like to have a closer look into your case. Could you please contact us via private message on Facebook, Instagram or X? You can also email us at help@revolut.com. We'll do our best to address your concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: I just finally successfully verified my ID in the app! (= Gladly, the WebID call verification was fixed (hope my previous long feedback helped). But, unfortunately, it took too much time and efforts... I had to submit my residence ID two times. After all seems to be done, passport, ID, etc., it requested WebID call verification again... Also submitted my selfie several times (1 more time when account became verified)... What a mess... Unfortunately, can't give all 5 stars from my experience.. =\
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We're sorry to hear you're facing problems verifying your identity. If you require more help with the verification process, kindly send an email at help@revolut.com along with a short explanation of the issue. You can also DM us via social media channels - X, Instagram, Facebook. We will do our best to help get this sorted soon.

scraped_reviews.content: It is okay if your spouse is European and managing separate dual currency wallets. but the exchange rate is not good at all. I would use wise for exchange rate. Also, for the app notification settings, it does not notify people if there were deposit or withdrawal. They only give notification settings for promotion and ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We're sorry to hear you're having trouble with your notifications and experience with exchange. We'd love to help sort this out. Please don't hesitate to reach out via in-app chat (Profile > Help > Chat with us) or by emailing us at help@revolut.com. We're here to assist!

scraped_reviews.content: was very happy with the app until last few weeks when strange things starts. every time I'm trying to open the app and I scan my fingerprint nothing happen. just like app freeze. one thing helps. reinstalling the app and re-login. but only for one time use. then again and again and again same story. annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lorenzo, we're sorry to hear about the difficulty you're experiencing with the app. We would like to take a closer look at this. Please DM us on our official social media channels (Facebook/ X /Instagram) or email us at help@revolut.com. We’ll do our best to help you. Thanks in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: My wife is blind and really struggles to use this app. She has no problems with most other apps with Apple's Voice Over turned on, but this is far too cluttered.. It's now October 2025, and the usability is still rubbish. The EU's Digital Service Act has been implemented, and apps need to be accessible. 26/10. For a start, when you click Payments, then Send, the cursor is on the Amount field but the field isn't recognised by Voice Over, so she can't send any payments
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're sorry to hear about the difficulties your wife is experiencing. If she needs any support, she can get in touch with us at help@revolut.com. We'll do our best to assist.

scraped_reviews.content: The app has so far been pretty reliable. It does what I need, but I'm getting on a bit, and I do still miss the personal touch from back in the day. You used to build a relationship with your local branch manager, and there was no "computer says no". Ah well, I'll be dead soon enough so I'm not worth worrying about! Update Nov 2025; the addition of the option to pay cash into the account via PayPoints is really useful, and resolves one of the disadvantages of the internet only banking model.

usually a great app. but it can happen that the bank customer is LOCKED OUT ! for example when changing phone! When you cant log in you cannot talk to customer service! So your stuck. And maybe by some strange miracle after a few months(!) it suddenly works. Or when further details are requested by revolut and the customer submits them, but somehow these infos don't seem to meet the banks requirements. Eventually LOCKOUT occurs. Revolut + Yahoo mail app dont seem to interact.That's Problematic
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Sorry to see the disappointment you faced with our services. In this case, please feel to reach out to us via in-app chat by going to Profile > Help > Get more help and chat with us. If that is not possible, please email us at help@revolut.com. Rest assured, we'd do our best to help you via emails. Thank you for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: Disappointed after years of loyalty. Despite sending all necessary information, Revolut ignored and not keen to review all details they have and failed to review my claims properly. I’m owed several €60 rewards for referrals that were never honoured. On top of that, they did nothing to support me in two fraudulent purchase cases. The platform itself is great, but the customer support is extremely poor and unhelpful. Please don't ask me to get on touch again, that is a waste of time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew. Truly sorry to hear about your experience with the account and support. We aim to provide excellent service, and we apologize for falling short in your case. Kindly send us a DM at Facebook/Instagram/X or email us at help@revolut.com. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I am enjoying my Revolut account. It would be nice if I could pick the amount of money I wanted to spend on each card when I make a purchase in other words if I was making a purchase to Domino's Pizza and the order was $32 It would be nice to be able to only allow $32 to be charged to what ever card also it would be nice if more places accepted the Single Use card. I found that there is a way to set a spending limit on virtual cards so it's great. now if we can get the same on the permanent 👍🙂

More often than not when I try to open the app it crashes out. When the app works it's ideal for transferring money to friends and using the virtual card but I've been caught often waiting days to give people money or add money to my account as the app refuses to open! it doesn't even let me get to the fingerprint/passcode option before crashed. V frustrating. Has been like this for a year every update I'm expecting it to be fixed and I'm disappointed every time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We apologize for the inconvenience you are experiencing with the app. Please reach out to us through our social media channels (Facebook/X/Instagram) so that we can investigate your case. Alternatively, you can email us at help@revolut.com, where our support team will be able to assist you. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: May be a good app, but I wouldn't know because it won't even let me create an account. It keeps telling me the code is invalid. Doesn't matter if I manually type it or let the phone auto fill. half the time it, it wouldn't even register I had entered all 6 digits.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We’re sorry to see that you are facing issues with the signup process. In order to help you, please reach out to us at help@revolut.com. We will be able to help you as soon as we get your email. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: 1. App refuses to work if you have Magisk, KernelSU or KernelSU Next installed saying you're rooted even if you're not. 2. App refuses to work on rooted phones. 3. App refuses to work on custom ROMs. 4. If I try to login using my laptop's web browser, it doesn't give me full access to my account unless I verify using the Android app confirm using push notifications, which I can't it the app itself blocks me from accessing it thinking I'm rooted. For these reasons I'm deleting my account
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with the app not working as expected. If you require more help, you can email us at help@revolut.com along with a brief description of the problem. Feel free to DM us via social media channels - X, Instagram, Facebook. We will assist as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Account switching nightmare. Switched my account to revolut, it takes 3 weeks. After 1 week I lost access to my old account and therefore my money. Revolut cannot give me any updates or progress. It has now been 3 weeks and the switch is not complete and customer service cannot give me any updates or explain why they cant give me an update. Just empathising with how frustrating it must be. Not having a branch to visit means you are at the mercy of live chat. Cash out if you want to switch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear about your experience with our support team and with your account. Kindly email us at help@revolut.com, and we will do our best to assist you further. Thank you in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: Revolut has become increasingly complicated and unfair. RevPoints was activated without my consent and charged me money. They refunded it, but I never asked for it. Low free withdrawal limits, “free” offers that turn into paid traps, mandatory screen lock which I hate, and constant ID checks are frustrating. Revolut went from a useful app to a money-draining scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the plan offers, RevPoints, and identity verification. We’re working on improving our services all the time, so your input is very important to us.
Please contact us via the in-app chat, so we can look into this. To do so, go to your profile, tap ‘Help’, scroll down and tap ‘Support’ to start the chat.

title: PicPay: Conta, Cartão e Pix
description: Million Key Promotion 💵 To participate, simply register your Pix key. You'll be entered to win R$1 million in the final drawing and weekly cash prizes. The more PicPay you use, the more chances you have to win. Are you a CLT (CLT) employee? PicPay makes your life easier! Crédito do Trabalhador (Worker's Credit) has arrived, allowing you to access private payroll loans directly through PicPay, with reduced rates and payroll deductions. Take advantage of fast credit without compromising your budget. Simulate now through the app and enjoy the best conditions for you! 💚 Digital Account: Fast, Free, and Complete! 100% free and easy-to-use digital account. Manage all your banks in a single app, move, organize, and transfer Pix between different accounts. Pay for your purchases in up to 36 installments with any card and make secure transfers from any bank. Your money also automatically earns 102% of the CDI (Interbank Deposit Certificate), more than a savings account. 💳 Credit Card with No Annual Fee: Benefits You'll Love A personalized card for every lifestyle: 🥇 PicPay Card Gold: Card with no annual fee, installments up to 36 times, Mastercard Surpreenda benefits, and cashback at PicPay Shop. 🥈 PicPay Card Platinum: 0.5% cashback on all credit purchases, global emergency assistance, and auto insurance. 🖤 PicPay Card Black: 1.2% cashback, VIP lounge access, travel insurance, concierge, and exclusive Priceless Cities benefits. Get a credit card with no annual fee, with a limit of up to R$10,000! Receive cashback on all purchases, online and at partner stores. ⚡️ Instant Pix: Fee-Free, Real-Time Transfers Pix on PicPay allows instant payments anytime, with the option to pay in up to 36 installments. The recipient receives the payment immediately, and you pay only when the bill is due. You can also enjoy benefits such as higher yields than savings accounts, cashback, promotions from partner stores on PicPay Shop, and the ease of recharging services and splitting payments. 💰 PicPay Loan: Fast, Hassle-Free Credit Credit with fast, hassle-free approval, ideal for unexpected situations, paying off high-interest debt, or pursuing personal projects. Personal Loan: Simulate directly in the app, find pre-approved offers, and manage everything without leaving home. FGTS Advance: Receive your money in your account in up to 2 minutes! No monthly fees and easy approval, even for those with bad credit. 💡 More than a digital account: Complete Financial Solutions! In addition to transfers, Pix, and loans, PicPay also offers: Account That Rende: Your money grows automatically, with higher yields than savings accounts (102% of the CDI). Investments: Diversify your portfolio with safe and accessible options directly in the app. Bill Installments: Pay your bills in up to 36 installments on your credit card. Cashback: Earn cash back on various purchases, directly into your account. Account for Minors: Your children can also enjoy the benefits of PicPay safely and independently, starting their financial education early! 🎓 🔒 Digital Account with Secure Mode Your money and transactions are protected with an extra level of security. PicPay transforms the way you manage money. Need help? Visit our website https://picpay.com/ Capitalization Bond, incentive modality. ICATU CAPITALIZAÇÃO S/A. SUSEP Process No. 15414.652674/2025-66. Period: October 6, 2025, to November 21, 2025. For more information about the raffle, see the rules at www.picpay.com/chavedomilhao. PicPay Customer Service: 0800 025 8000. PicPay Ombudsman: 0800 025 2000. ICATU Customer Service: 0800 286 0109. Icatu Ombudsman – 0800 286 0047. PicPay Payment Institution S.A., registered with the CNPJ/ME under No. 22.896.431/0001-10, headquartered at Avenida Manuel Bandeira, 291, Atlas Office Park Condominium, Block A, 1st floor - offices 22 and 23, 2nd floor and 3rd floor, and Block B, 3rd floor - offices 43 and 44, Vila Leopoldina, Municipality of São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Zip Code 05317-020
descriptionHTML:
Million Key Promotion 💵
To participate, simply register your Pix key. You'll be entered to win R$1 million in the final drawing and weekly cash prizes. The more PicPay you use, the more chances you have to win.

Are you a CLT (CLT) employee? PicPay makes your life easier! Crédito do Trabalhador (Worker's Credit) has arrived, allowing you to access private payroll loans directly through PicPay, with reduced rates and payroll deductions. Take advantage of fast credit without compromising your budget. Simulate now through the app and enjoy the best conditions for you!

💚 Digital Account: Fast, Free, and Complete!
100% free and easy-to-use digital account. Manage all your banks in a single app, move, organize, and transfer Pix between different accounts. Pay for your purchases in up to 36 installments with any card and make secure transfers from any bank. Your money also automatically earns 102% of the CDI (Interbank Deposit Certificate), more than a savings account.

💳 Credit Card with No Annual Fee: Benefits You'll Love
A personalized card for every lifestyle:
🥇 PicPay Card Gold: Card with no annual fee, installments up to 36 times, Mastercard Surpreenda benefits, and cashback at PicPay Shop.
🥈 PicPay Card Platinum: 0.5% cashback on all credit purchases, global emergency assistance, and auto insurance.
🖤 PicPay Card Black: 1.2% cashback, VIP lounge access, travel insurance, concierge, and exclusive Priceless Cities benefits.

Get a credit card with no annual fee, with a limit of up to R$10,000! Receive cashback on all purchases, online and at partner stores.

⚡️ Instant Pix: Fee-Free, Real-Time Transfers
Pix on PicPay allows instant payments anytime, with the option to pay in up to 36 installments. The recipient receives the payment immediately, and you pay only when the bill is due. You can also enjoy benefits such as higher yields than savings accounts, cashback, promotions from partner stores on PicPay Shop, and the ease of recharging services and splitting payments.

💰 PicPay Loan: Fast, Hassle-Free Credit
Credit with fast, hassle-free approval, ideal for unexpected situations, paying off high-interest debt, or pursuing personal projects.

Personal Loan: Simulate directly in the app, find pre-approved offers, and manage everything without leaving home.
FGTS Advance: Receive your money in your account in up to 2 minutes! No monthly fees and easy approval, even for those with bad credit.

💡 More than a digital account: Complete Financial Solutions!
In addition to transfers, Pix, and loans, PicPay also offers:
Account That Rende: Your money grows automatically, with higher yields than savings accounts (102% of the CDI).
Investments: Diversify your portfolio with safe and accessible options directly in the app. Bill Installments: Pay your bills in up to 36 installments on your credit card.
Cashback: Earn cash back on various purchases, directly into your account.
Account for Minors: Your children can also enjoy the benefits of PicPay safely and independently, starting their financial education early! 🎓
🔒 Digital Account with Secure Mode
Your money and transactions are protected with an extra level of security.

PicPay transforms the way you manage money.

title: DoorDash - Dasher
description:
Enjoy the freedom to be your own boss and earn money on your schedule. Plus, get 100% of your tips, always.

*   CASH AFTER EVERY DASH   *
Get paid right after every dash, automatically, with no deposit fees — ever.

*    EARN WITH NUMBER ONE   *
Make money delivering with the #1 Food & Drink Delivery app, available in 7,000+ cities in the US.

 *   START RIGHT NOW   *
Sign up to deliver in minutes. You only need your smartphone and transportation (bike, car, scooter, or motorcycle) to start.

*   BE SUPPORTED   *
Your app will show you where you’re going and when to get there. Plus 24/7 help is available if you need it.

*   SET YOUR OWN SCHEDULE   *
Choose your own hours and enjoy flexibility over hourly, seasonal, or full-time work. Start and stop whenever you want.

*   FIND WORK NEAR YOU   *
Work wherever you want. DoorDash is available in 7,000+ cities across the U.S., Australia, Canada, Japan and Germany. In select markets, you’ll be able to accept orders from Caviar, too!

*   RESTAURANTS AND MORE   *
Make money by completing deliveries from restaurants, convenience stores, grocery stores, and pet stores, too. 


DoorDash is available in over 7,000 cities in all 50 U.S. states, including Washington, D.C. and Puerto Rico; over 80 cities in Canada; and Melbourne, Australia, with more coming soon. 

Find out if we’re in your area and learn more here: doordash.com/dasher/signup

Caviar Couriers can sign up using the DoorDash - Driver app

summary: Make money as a delivery driver with DoorDash and work when you want as a Dasher

scraped_reviews.content: Latest update is junk. Instead of multiple shopping orders being in one list, you now have to jump between orders in order to see the items. Not very efficient. I also had no choice but to add my red card to my Google Wallet account before allowing me to shop the order. I don't like that because it's very easy to mistakenly use a personal card. Also, the new scheduling screen is horrible. Not user friendly at all.

Lately, I've been having problems with not getting notifications for new orders (my acceptance rate just goes down), and the app doesn't end my dash when time runs out, it just keeps the dash going, but doesn't give me offers. Also, it's very slow to recognize when I enter the area sometimes taking 10 min+ to do so. Much better a year ago. Whether or not I even get a notification (or a text), or get it late, is 50/50

Making this 1 star until the new ratings system is replaced with something better. There is no buffer for red lights, detours, roadwork, accidents, app glitches or hard to find shopping items. I've been platinum for 2 years, but lost it in the new system. My on time ratings went from 85 to 60. The only thing that changed was the new rating system. I stopped shop and deliver because of it too. As a top dasher, I make more money dashing than I do as a full-time residential manager.

Stop this crazy new point system. No one I've talked to likes it. We're bouncing around all the levels. Why in the #(%÷ do we get dinged for late pick ups when it's the restaurant that doesn't have the order ready? I mark order still being prepared or not started every time and I still get late pick ups! We have no control over the restaurants. App glitches so much its hard to complete orders.

Every time they update the app they make it worse. I used to be able to dash whenever I want, as long as I wanted. On my first dash I made over 50 dollars in just two hours. Now you can't dash whenever you want. 9 times out of 10 you HAVE to schedule, and even when you do the options are extremely limited now. Only let me dash for 30 minutes today, I have been sitting in my car for 15 minutes and have gotten zero deliveries despite my area being busy. They have completely ruined this app.

UI is better, but have faced more problems in recent update. A recent order wouldn't allow me to enter an item weight over 0, but also wouldn't accept 0. I had two orders on this delivery, both of which were cancelled unexpectingly. I had been in contact with both customers so it seems unlikely they both cancelled at the very same. The virtual assistant also Unassigned the wrong order, forcing me to return the items I had just finished shopping for. The support agents are very helpful though.

I honestly do enjoy dashing and it has come in clutch as an additional income for me. There are pros and cons. The cons is why I gave it 4 stars. The cons are that the voice for the dasher GPS only works 15 percent of the time for me, which sucks. Also, when you are late by the pick up time due to then still prepping the order, still docs your percentages. When you try to pick up an order when somewhere is closed, dont get comp pay even tho it says they do.

In app navigation issue. For several weeks, If I have the directions pulled up when I arrive to the delivery address it will not let me leave the screen to complete the delivery. I have to completely force stop the app and reopen it to make the directions close so I can get to the delivery screen. all black screen when an offer comes through. this happens often. Now there's an issue with the screen ratio. I can't click on options at the very bottom of the screen. infuriating 😡

New update constantly crashes and freezes. I'll get an order but it doesn't alert me nor send a text, and it isn't a signal problem. so I miss offers because I never know I have them. we should also have the option to retrieve missed orders for Platinum users, essentially giving us an extra 30 seconds after the first missed window. update: The newest update doesn't allow you to check your card balance while you're on a dash, this wasn't a problem before because the account was in another app

Crashes, glitches, etc. Calling support doesn't seem to help anymore, as they tell me the same thing I already know and/or have done. "Make sure the app is up-to-date. If so, then just uninstall the app and reinstall it. Should be good to go then." As I already don't know that. On top of that, earned pay now takes forever to go into my account. Doordash is messing with some people's livelihoods and that is NOT cool!! All support says is "wait til the end and call support." Seriously??!!

This is the worst app ever. It crashes constantly, ends dashes when the driver is still driving, and driver support is terrible. ETA: I originally wrote this review in 2022 and nothing has changed. I just lost a dash because I changed my start time to 30 minutes later than originally scheduled so I could have a shower and some food and I hit save and it appeared to save but didn't actually save. This has happened to me and my partner multiple times. If I could give 0 stars, I would.

7/20/25 constant problems. so ended up being deactivated due to what was unsafe driving/late deliveries. (I have a clean driving record and high ratings to prove otherwise), but due to app issues, it's constantly messing up, and I have a feeling it's a computer bug error. I'd give Zero stars if I could. had to constantly uninstall and reinstall to get the app working due to all the app bugs lately.

Great way to make money. Better to use a 2nd app for navigation, the navigation interface on the app sometimes have you going the long way to a dropoff, trying to turn down invisible roads, and my favorite, almost driving into a lake! Expect to miss opportunities due to a constantly crashing app and slow loading time. Also enjoy being penalized and your percentages taking a hit due to things out of your personal control, like stores bring out of stock on things. It's a good extra income though.

I have tried EVERYTHING to get the issues I'm having fixed. first I can't schedule anything for the area I currently live in, it shows me everything from my old area. second I try to delete a car and it tells me that it can't because it's scheduled for a dash! I haven't dashed in a while (like 2 years) so HOW could it be scheduled?? I am really disappointed in how support will give you the same answers as the chatbot and then disconnect you without helping solve any of your problems!

I've had to uninstall and reinstall this app more than 5 times this month because it's so incredibly unstable. Sometimes it just forgets to run in the background so you HAVE to have it open and be doing nothing else. Other times it will just keep running even though your time has ran out, which tells me that those times where I'm driving around for an hour without getting any offers even though the market is deep red and they're begging people to get on, might actually just be a glitch.

Good way to make side money but can be tough depending on where you live. Support usually isn't good either. To make any money you'll need at least 100 deliveries every 30 days to get to their platinum level. The higher levels say you get more priority to higher pay deliveries, but I constantly see $4 as a "high paying offer." Also, the base pay makes no sense and when you call support to ask about it, they never seem to know how it works. Don't do this as a full time job.

The app is constantly buggy, the pay rate is horrible, and Dasher support is an absolute joke. If you actually need help with the app, they will often disconnect before your issue is actually resolved, and are rude to you while you do help. The only good side is that it's a good way to make extra money if you really need to, but when things like gas, car maintenance, and taxes are considered you can likely make better doing other things. Lately I haven't even been able to confirm orders.

I've been a doordash driver for more than 5 years and I almost never give apps a bad review. I just uninstall them and move on. The problem here is that I have brought bugs and other issues to doordash's attention, and they just don't listen. The app rarely gets updated and when it does it is usually some "feature" that finds creative ways to rip us off, but usually isn't an update that would fix frustrating issues or downright malfunctions. How can I work for a company that won't listen to me?

First of all, I see no difference in the offers to be a top dasher. I still go low offers constantly. Most are under the amount of milage. Nobody will take an offer that is 4 miles over the amount offered. Base pay should cover at least the miles and the tip should be for good service. Second, the navigation app sucks!! Third, the app will stop working while trying to leave navigation and go back to order screen then I have no choice but to restart my phone. That's not ok. Fix this!

Too many times the app freezes or doesn't work properly. The most often time it freezes is when I'm trying to complete a delivery. I have gotten so many notifications from the app saying stop staying so long at delivery location after you have delivered. The reason I have to stay there is because I have to completely uninstall then reinstall the app. this also happened with an alcohol delivery right as I arrived so me and the customer had to stand there, awkwardly I might add, while I fixed it

App glitches often at the most inconvenient times. After the latest update I have noticed an increase in orders being canceled without pay only to be quickly replaced by a similar order. After completing a delivery often there is no time to text the customer or end the dash before another offer comes in, they need to give drivers at least a few seconds to breathe. Support is terrible and sometimes doesn't even answer the phone. Items in stores are often missing and driver's ratings go down. etc.

1. My photo rating keeps falling as a result of the app freezing up; and I'm not able to complete the order (and take a photo). And so I call cust support and they complete it for me. But my photo rating them falls?? 2. My "Original Items Found" rating keeps falling when Im shopping and an item is out of stock and after I enter the substitute that the customer requested... This rating should not fall if an item is not available??

The app is honestly trash and doesn't work. When I get a notification that I have an offer I click on it and nothing happens. I literally will get a red screen or a black screen and I've uninstalled it, cleared out the cookies and cache, reinstalled it , updated it and still doesn't work. I shouldn't have to clear the cookies and cache 10 times a day to get it to work. The constant notification ring is annoying, should only ding once instead of going off until you dismiss it. ugh

It will freeze when you "ok" a photo you took after giving the order to the customer. You will then get demoted for not taking the picture but also for taking too long to complete the task. You have no recourse, even if you speak with support to resolve the issue. This happens on a weekly basis. The company will also tell you you didn't take pictures as a confirmation, but the app will prompt you to or not. So you will loose points for not taking pictures that the app didn't prompt you for.

The GPS is very glitchy. Constantly freezing and just not working in general. Definitely love door dashing but this needs to be fixed!!! update: I thought this might be an issue with the phone Im using, and I tried to download, and dash on a different phone. same issues. glitching, freezing, and not working. Had to exit the app several times for one order, and use another phone for GPS.

Constantly requires a restart for every offer that pops up. Each offer interrupts music, completely stopping any music playing from any app. Shopping orders are full of unnecessary instructions and pages, items are poorly programmed, and can cause one to cancel the order if one item cannot be scanned into the app. There's constantly changing rules that affect how fast one can finish a shop. Support is slow, but helpful, this needs to be improved a bit more.

I like dashing for a little extra income. Only reason I'm giving it more than one star. Otherwise, App issues are ridiculous. Freezes up almost ever order requiring a closure and reopen, will just lose the order your working on. Tell you you have an order but never shows up, tells you your heading the wrong way and threatening to reassign the order. There is no real support. The people you call for suppor,t can't speaking English, don't understand English, and have never used the app.

The app is glitchy. sometimes it doesn't even show me I have an order until after the timer to accept it has run out. you shouldn't be penalizing dashers for things out of their control like the restaurants not having orders ready and heavy traffic. if you remember back to the days of pizza deliveries being guaranteed within 30 minutes they stopped that bc a delivery driver died in an accident trying to to deliver within 30. add the option to submit more than one pic for long shopping receipts

The new rating system is horrible. Now they're slipping in grocery delivery orders in even when you opt out of shop and pay. Nothing like thinking you're picking up one thing and suddenly you're carrying 20 bags of groceries up 3 flights of stairs for almost no tip. One of the reasons I opt out of shop and pay orders. An hour+ in store and get no or very little tip. At least the restaurant orders you see the full offer up front generally so you know if you want to accept it or not.

orders not processing. Being made to do more than deliver items. This is a delivery service, we shouldn't be expected to open bags or be penalized for stores not having items. we shouldn't be penalized for orders not processing. we shouldn't have to wait longer than 5 minutes for someone's order and in turn l, missbout on more money because we've waited 45 minutes. Platinum status members should have to deliver anything under $12

Would rate with no stars if it was possible. Soon I'll probably give up on the app if it keeps wasting my time and gas. Map doesn't display any red. GPS sends you to the wrong business address...again! Update 10/6/23: Map will continue to run hours after completing a delivery. The app ended my delivery as soon as a put the address in my GPS, luckily I still had the address so I was able to complete the delivery. 11/07/25 App has froze during a delivery had to reopen it for it to work.

The app freezes mid delivery often (switching from navigation to order delivery). I've been using it 3 weeks now and have had to completely uninstall and reinstall the app 3 times in order to complete the delivery... not only does it make delivering the order to the proper place following the customer's instructions difficult, but it dings me as a late delivery, making it difficult to maintain a high ranking to gain the higher quality orders.

1. Alcohol deliveries glitch after confirming delivery. It's annoying having to call support every time to confirm. 2. STOP sending "are you lost" and "what's taking so long" messages through the customer's chat box! You're making it seem like Drivers are lost. You're not giving enough time to park and get out. I am more than capable of contacting the customer if I am having an issue finding them and they can do the same! We don't need your messages!

Absolutely horrible. My on time page has been frozen with the same info for the last multiple 100 deliveries. The first 30 minutes to an hour of my dash I get no orders at all but I see the hot zones changing. the app also tries to give me offers 😔 ve already declined. I have tried reinstalling and it didn't help. infuriating. I've been making less than minimum wage for months. 60% of the offers ordered to me don't pay minimum wage. By the time I've worked a 9-hour shift I've barely made $100.

I'm exhausted. Like someone else said, there's absolutely no pick up/drop off buffer time for accidents, traffic, road work, road closures or anything. You get penalized if the store doesn't have an item in stock. You also get penalized if your customer wants it handed to them but takes forever and a day to meet you. That has severely impacted my on time rate. Also, pins are wrong, directions are wrong, and sometimes people put in the wrong address. The app also crashes multiple times a day.

constant glitches cause losses in orders, location updates terribly, deposits not getting added until a week later, new delivery system is ridiculous, not to mention the ranking system. if you're gonna have an app for dashers to work for your company at least have it work like it should. it's quite ridiculous having to troubleshoot a faulty app EACH time you open it. This isn't just android either as I switch from IPhone and I have the exact same issues. I can't emphasize this enough. FIX IT NOW

I originally left a 3star rating here, but I am changing it now due to one of my main issues being changed and addressed. I am happy that doordash is now changing the "Pro Shopper" rating system. With the new changes, it is no longer impossible for me to obtain pro shopper status. Now that they are setting it to where if you prove an item is out of stock, it won't go against your "original items found" rating. Before now, it was impossible to get a pro shopper. Most orders had 1 missing item.

I don't like how this service make us dashers feel. A customer can say they're missing an item, & you'll get marked down for it without the company notifying or allowing you to defend yourself. Then, you get marked down if the original item requested was not in stock. It's giving they don't care about the workers sanity or hard work. The % rates are similar to credit scores. Easy to go down but hard to come up. Get it together Doordash. $3 for a 10+ mile drive is insane.

app issues. keep getting notifications about missing drop photos. I take the pictures and then as soon as I hit complete delivery it was something went wrong. how is it my fault the photo isn't there when I clearly took it but the app didn't accept. also app glitches multiple times and I have to force close as soon as I get to the drop. won't let me out of the map screen to make the drop.

This app really sucks! it recently said that I spent more than 10 minutes at a drop-off location, and that's only because that app froze on me and wouldn't let me complete the order. That's happened more than once. and it constantly leads me to the wrong location when dropping off a delivery. That's the only reason that I've had some bad reviews. DOOR DASH FIX THE PROBLEM!!!

I've been a dasher for at least 3 years now. I've never gotten any contract violations until here recently and they're for being late but there are trains and the restaurants take forever. Also, the map is constantly going haywire and never works right. Also, app freezes when I try to complete an order and I have to clear data and then log back in to finish. FIX YOUR APP! so we can do our jobs more efficiently!

As a former QA web & mobile app tester, I don't normally review apps, but since there's no place in the app to submit bug reports. 1st, there's a couple of bugs with the double dash orders, I find that when I drop off the first order, take the picture to verify the app glitches and says the famous android line "something went wrong". This then puts the app in a weird state where I can't navigate away from the map and complete the 2nd delivery. I got 5 more bugs to report w/ pics, but no more roo

I've been updating the app after frequent freezes. Be aware, The algorithm of the map from the dashboard is not always on point. It's good to know the area because following all the directions from the dashboard map may cause you extra time in delivery. Also, I received a contract violation following the map directly, traffic volume too. I should have left the order and allowed dasher support to cancel it, I received a case request by email. And put in a dispute.

Their GPS is terrible, sending me to the wrong location for a pick-up or not showing me the route for a drop-off at all. It freezes during dashing, and you're left messing with the app while the people wait for their food. They also have "batch orders" where there are two different pick-ups and two different customers to deliver to, but it only shows one, the small one. It's like the second never existed. Their support service is outsourced, need i say more. It's ok if you just wanna make a few$

Dashing is fine as long as nothing goes wrong...and it will go wrong. If you can muddle through great but if you need "Dasher Support" just turn off your phone and go home. What goes wrong? I was going to list the thing that went wrong just this weekend but I don't have enough characters. Navigation issues are common; stores get behind and can't or won't adjust their estimated times, customers put in wrong information or leave out important details, the app itself glitchs and so much more.

doordash is a scam. What happened to this app? Not only is it impossible to make anything decent, but they make it impossible for you to succeed at all. You only get a 3-5 minute window time to deliver, which does not take into consideration the construction zones, rush hour traffic, and any other traffic issues that may arise. If you are late, you will lose your rating for it. Also, you cant decline an order without dropping your score while you get sent out over 20 miles somewhere for min pay.

Runs pretty well for the most part... That being said, the app has a glitch that causes it to freeze on the GPS. Usually happens just as I am about to complete a drop-off. Only way for me to fix it is to restart my phone completely. Happens at least two or three times per dash, I'm really getting sick and tired of this. Had to restart my phone three times tonight, all because of this stupid glitch that causes the app to freeze on the GPS just as I'm about to complete a drop-off (9-5-2025).

Whenever I used navigation, it would be stuck in the map screen when I pressed the exit button, so I can't complete the delivery and have to restart my phone to make the app work which take up time. Another issue is the "give customer" option when completing order. The app said to take a photo of the door instead, but it doesn't register. I have to select the first option to finish the delivery, but I have a warning that I'm not taking a photo of the order. These issues need to be fixed.

You would think a company whose sole profit is from the app that their contractors use to accept and fulfill deliveries would have a good working app. But no, the app is terrible. Constantly crashing and freezing, new orders come in but they won't load and you end up missing out and having your dash paused, you get to a drop off location and you cant exit navigation; the only way to do so is restarting your phone. It's always something, crashing, freezing, or just straight up not working.

As far as delivery apps go, this one is likely to earn you the most. However, the app itself is a bit buggy, and can cause issues for you. The main problem I've noticed is when you have multiple deliveries active. The app doesn't know how to balance the priority of all of your deliveries, for insurance; if you're at a destination and accept another delivery, the app will then move the newest delivery to the front of the que, and trying to tell it to swap to another delivery doesn't work right.

title: AI Photo Editor - Lumii
description: Lumii, as a powerful photo editor pro, provides all the features you need for photo editing. As one of the best pic editing apps, offer 100+ stylish preset photo filters and effects to edit photos. No ads while editing. Create artistic, high-quality photos effortlessly—no professional skills required. Whether you’re a newbie or a pro, Lumii will be your best choice as photo filters editing apps among plenty of similar photo maker and presets photography apps. Apply photo filters for pictures and fill your aesthetic needs. What you can do with Lumii (FREE and All-in-one Photo Editor Pro): 👓 Customize Photo Filters ✦ Exquisitely designed filters for pictures, presets for Instagram, make your photos stand out. ✦ Add custom exclusive photo filters and effects, such as Film, LOMO , Retro, etc. ✨ 100+ Photo Effects ✦ Exquisitely designed effects for picture, make your photos stand out. Top photo effects pro. ✦ Add popular photo effects, such as Glitch, Light Leak & Double Exposure 🖼 Auto Background Eraser ✦ Easy to repair or erase unwanted part with background eraser ✦ Mix your cutout photo with exquisite preset background ✦ Best bg remover app, just one tap to change background 😊 Useful & Fun AI Edits ✦ AI Photo Enhancer: Unblur/enhance image quality, turn your portrait or group photos into HD ✦ AI Avatar: Explore Anime Avatars ✦ Quick Erase: Remove unwanted objects with offline convenience ✦ AI Remove: Automatically detect and remove unwanted objects ✦ Auto Retouch: Smooth skin, whiten teeth, no pimples — all in one tap 👾BG Blur & Photo Mosaic ✦ AI background blur app — perfect for portrait editing and focus ✦ Mosaic blur photo editor, easily apply mosaic to blur faces or protect privacy 🎨 Free HSL Color ✦ Easily control Hue, Saturation, Luminance (HSL), support 8 colors channels, intuitive lightroom effect photo editor pro ✦Totally FREE and advanced HSL adjustments 🍭 Curves for Photos ✦Powerful curves tools, pro level photo editor for Instagram ✦Free picture editor with advanced adjustment with 4 color options ✍️ Add text to photos ✦Add text on photo, with lots of Fonts and Stylish Text Presets for selecting ✦Add text on photo, and apply different styles ✦Best pic editor and photo lab with text ☀️ Double Exposure - Professional Blend Editor ✦Best blend editor tool, create trendy double exposure effects for pictures, easy & powerful photo editor app for Instagram and rednote ✦Lots of blend photo editor templates to choose from 🪄 Basic Photo Editing Tools ✦Adjust brightness, contrast, highlights, warmth, shadows, sharpness, exposure, etc. ✦Selective options for image enhancement, best picture editor and filters for pictures app ✦Rotate and crop photo freely (in multi aspect ratios) to adapt for social media ratios. ✦User-friendly pic editing apps for Android. Photo filters and effects app 📺 Glitch Photo Editor ✦ Amazing glitch photo effects to enhance your photos, such as VHS, vaporwave, etc. ✦ Easily adjust photo effects value to fit for different scenes. Fast, free and fun glitch photo editor 🖼 Trendy Templates ✦ Stylish templates for various themes. Retro film, aesthetic, urban, journal and so on ✦ Exclusive artistic photo templates, easily enhance your photo work for IG sharing and rednote 📖 Photo Editing History & Draft ✦Photography editor with history support ✦Photo editor for Instagram with multi-draft workspaces With all the powerful and distinctive features above, Lumii helps you become an expert in photo editing (enhance, photo filters and effects), and discover endless fun during the time.

summary: AI Photo Editor with 100+ Filters, Effects! Remove BG, Retouch & Photo Enhancer.

scraped_reviews.content: I have gone through a lot of these damn things trying to find one that is any good and this one is by far the best. One thing that is frustrating with many of them is they shrink the picture and greatly reduce the quality. This does just the opposite. It makes the pictures sharper! It is worth having just for that. The ad free version is very reasonable and well worth it. Even the ad version is less obtrusive than others out there and doesn't leave a watermark.

So far, I'm loving it! So many options, millions of ways to edit!! Almost too many... Especially since I'm using the free option and it still displays the paid options... I wish I could move those to a separate folder or something. I just can't afford to purchase apps right now. There are choices within each options. You can change the background, foreground, merge photos, crop, filter, add borders or frames, the options are practically endless! And it's fairly simple to use. I recommend!

This app is amazing. Love it. Wouldn't want anything else. The the way it allows you to have so many settings yet still be easy enough for a 3 year old is awesome. Was able to find some photos on Instagram and was amazed by the outcome of the edit. Will use alot. It has exposure grain filters temp skin tone u can even make your own filter. And that's just the stuff I can remember. For an app on a phone and a website on a computer, I would pick this app very easy to use. Will use every day.

I have been playing with a lot of phone editors on my phone trying to find one that can clean up cat photos that are often not taken under the best conditions. When the cats are being cute, I have to grab my phone and start snapping pictures but that often results in dark and sometimes blurry photos. This app has features that are letting me turn some of those photos into something I am much happier with. I don't mind having to watch a short ad video to get access to some extra features.

A 5 star app. I definitely recommend paying for the pro version if you plan on using an editing app as much as I do. I use them to edit my poems, originally screenshots from Samsung Notes, into pictures that are colorful and aesthetic. I didn't rate 5 stars because I'm not sure if it is my own incompetence or the app having an undeveloped feature, but I when I try to add a second effect at the same time it deletes the other. I tried adding 1 effect, saving, editing, but the picture lost quality!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, you can superimpose different types of effects at the same time, but the same type of effects can only be superimposed once. If the picture is of poor quality, please click settings, send a feedback email, attach the original picture and the saved picture to us, thank you for your help, and we will try to solve it.

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love this editor. As far as needing professional editing results from your phone, it's top of the line, tho I'm sure those less technically inclined might need a much lengthier and detailed tutorial. I had purchased a account years ago now but due to being hacked I can't seem to retrieve it again. Any help with this would be greatly appreciated, otherwise I would most definitely give 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, if you have successfully subscribed, you can refer to "How to restore my purchase" in Settings>Q&A.Of course, Lumii does not require membership to use many free features. If you have any specific suggestions, we'd love to hear them! 🥰🥳 You can update your suggestions here or email us: lumii@inshot.com. Thank you for your support!

scraped_reviews.content: I got this based on really positive reviews. But once I tried it, there was no way to access all my photos, including, of course, the ones I want to edit. There are no menu options, no FAQ, no tutorials, nothing, nada, zip, zero hints as to how to navigate to the photos I want to edit, even after signing up for the pro version. Two thumbs down.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, sorry for this problem, can you try restarting the phone or reinstalling to see if it displays normally?
If it still doesn't work, wait a few more minutes on that page, it might load slowly. If it still doesn't work, could you please click "Set Feedback" in the upper left corner and send us an email (with the error log file).We will solve 🙏

scraped_reviews.content: Over half of what they tell you is "free" you need to watch a 30 second ad to use... every time you use it. Which I know is to incentivise you to buy pro, except it's over double what most photo editors apps charge (at the time $12.99 to unlock forever compared to most apps that charge only about $5.99 to unlock pro forever) and you get maybe 1/3 of the editing options. I wouldn't say this app is bad since the features work as intended, but it's just not the best option when comparing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry, payment makes you uncomfortable. We will continue to add more free effects, filters and other materials. You can unlock some free effects and filters by watching ads, all of which are for the support of the team, so please keep updating. Thank you for your support.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best one I've found. It has a lot of good options & features. I was able to make a printable version of a picture I thought I was going to have to delete. Now I don't have to!! I Love this app!! It saved a beautiful picture from having to be trashed, into becoming an Amazing part of our memories 😃 Thank you for making it so easy to understand and use!!

I love taking photos and running them through different apps to see what I find and this is definately a keeper. I try alot of apps and buy the ones I think are worth it. This one merits a buy. Lots of filters and effects and it has a few things from the lens distortions app, which I own as well, maybe they're the same people behind it. Only 1 prob, laggy on certain effects, probably my phone. I got the lg stylo 6, but its full so... I could go on, but cool app, worth a buy! I like it alot!

Lumii has made significant improvements and added a number of features that set it apart from its competitors since I first tried it out ages ago. It was once just a "backup" photo editor for me, one that had a few cool filters that none of my other comparable apps had, but relegated to the list of programs that would "lose permissions" after long disuse. Now (03/2024) Lumii sits prominently among my most frequently used apps, even earning from me a quick access shortcut.

I purchased Pro, which is a good value for the extra features. However, even the free version is well worth trying. I dated and dumped a lot of photo editors until I landed on Lumii. It's light, fast, easy to use, intuitive, and has enough options to be flexible without overwhelming. Its output looks a lot better than basic Insta. I'm not a pro, not a noob, but in that mushy middle area. This perfectly suits my needs and I'm happy. Give the Free version a spin and see what you think.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Lisa, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are so glad to know that you like our products! We are always looking for ways to improve our products and provide you with the best experience possible. If you have any suggestions or feedback, we would love to hear from you. Have a good day :)

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for editing pictures. The fact that it's free and includes so many features already is great when compared to other apps, in which you expect the free version to have so little to work with, prompting you to buy the full version. With this app, it's easy to make great edited photos for whatever purpose, without even having to buy the full version. There are so many great tools for adding whatever detail you want to your photos. Well done on this one and congrats on a great mobile app.

Finally, every tool you need in one app. The automatic background eraser is incredibly accurate and doesn't need any manual help. There are hundreds of templates and designs for collages, cool photo effects, FB/Insta styling, website content, flyers, dinner menus, etc. The free version barely touches the best functions you get with Premium, which I feel is really inexpensive for what you're getting. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

This photo editor is exciting. I have been using Lumii for a couple of months now. One picture can be changed in numerous ways. My husband & I travel & have to allot time for photo taking. Then we edit to our hearts content. The vibrant colors, the overlays, the different lighting choices, etc. are my bread & butter. Needless to say this app is very pleasing to us. Thanks to those who make it possible to indulge our passion for photography using imaginative perspectives.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your support. we are so glad that you create photography with Lumii. we will continue to make Lumii better, more features will coming soon. Let's continue to discover your creative side with Lumii. Cherrs ! :)

scraped_reviews.content: I had been using the free version of this app for about 2 or 3 months, but I definitely wanted the additional color fonts, tons of extra features like AI. I had hiccup, but it turned out to be the device it was installed on. We have it working perfect now. It was definitely our error. We are going to replace this device with a new one. Can we delete the subscription on this device and add it to the new one?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, if you need to change your device, you can refer to "How to restore purchase" in settings>Q&A to perform the operation. If it fails, please send the order number and subscription screenshot to our email: lumii@inshot.com, and we will help you solve it.

scraped_reviews.content: Granted, I've only been playing around with this app for about 10 minutes, but I do really like what I'm seeing so far. Very easy to jump right in and begin tinkering with photos. Im sure ive only scraped the surface. 4 stars out of 5 because im a bit disappointed in how many filters are behind either a pay wall or ad wall but at least you're given the option to avoid ads altogether.

It offers more options than most when adjusting your photos and the keep it simple. The app is easy to navigate through. The only option I wish they would offer is while you are editing your photo is to be able to view the original photo when needed.
