scraped_reviews.content: That "create filter" button blocks my view, there's certain pictures I struggle to make HSL adjustments on because the button is centered on some my pictures' focal points. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. The “+Create Filter” button appears because its previous position was recently adjusted with the undo function. If you have more questions, please contact us at lumii@inshot.com.

title: Local Weather：Weather Forecast
description: Local weather forecast, your personal weather assistant. With Local Weather Forecast, you can travel with confidence. It provides weather info and weather data browsing, accurate weather forecast information in 24 hours, accurate forecast for many days in the future. ################ Main Features ############### # Real-time Local Weather Forecast Hourly Temperature, wind speed and direction, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, humidity, UV Index, visibility distance unites, dew point, elevation and cloud cover condition. Also it contains Radar Map that offering you to check the local weather condition information easily. Thoughtful data like Air Quality, Out Door Sports Index sunrise time, sunset time are also offered for you. # Local real-time weather and natural disaster Alert Early warning affected area, start time, end time, Alert summary, original warning and data source. Prompt protection in advance # Weather forecast for the next 24 hours Hourly temperature, Feels like, weather phase, humidity, UV index, visibility, dew point, rain snow ice probability, wind direction speed gust, Cloud Cover. 24-hour Weather Forecast ,View anytime, anywhere . Hourly weather, know as soon as you slip. # Weather forecast for the next 10 days Provide daily temperature, weather phase, humidity, UV index, rain snow icing probability, lightning probability, wind direction/speed/gust, sunrise sunset time. Plan food, clothing, housing and transportation in advance . Forecast long-term weather, happy plan, happy play. # Rain probability in the next 10 days The bar graph displays the trend of rain probability. Watch the dynamic map of rainfall radar # Wind direction information for the next 10 days The line graph shows the level of the direction and the direction change trend. # Air Quality Index PM10, PM2.5, CO, NO2, SO2, O3, quality level. # Other weather information Dew point, Visibility, UV Index. # Weather radar chart Various cloud images can be displayed, making it easy to browse weather forecast information. # Sunrise and sunset Beautiful sunrise and sunset animation effects and moon phase information. # City Management The weather in the city you care about is clear at a glance. You can manually add and remove cities, adjust the order of cities, set the city and weather forecast for notifications and widgets. # Weather information unit and format setting Temperature: C, F Precipitation: mm, in, cm Visibility: mile, m, km Wind speed: mp/h, km/h, mi/h, m/s Pressure: bar, hPa, atm, mmHg Hour format: 12 hour, 24 hour Date format: yyyy/mm/dd(2021/01/29), mm/dd/yyyy(29/01/2021), dd/mm/yyyy(01/29/2021) # Support multiple languages Download and experience the accurate local weather forecast. Enjoy your daily life and stay safe! If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us. We will do our best to provide a better experience for you. Email: linlifemx2020@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Local weather forecast, your personal weather assistant. With Local Weather Forecast, you can travel with confidence. It provides weather info and weather data browsing, accurate weather forecast information in 24 hours, accurate forecast for many days in the future.

################ Main Features ###############

# Real-time Local Weather Forecast
Hourly Temperature, wind speed and direction, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, humidity, UV Index, visibility distance unites, dew point, elevation and cloud cover condition. Also it contains Radar Map that offering you to check the local weather condition information easily. Thoughtful data like Air Quality, Out Door Sports Index sunrise time, sunset time are also offered for you.

# Local real-time weather and natural disaster Alert
Early warning affected area, start time, end time, Alert summary, original warning and data source. Prompt protection in advance

# Weather forecast for the next 24 hours
Hourly temperature, Feels like, weather phase, humidity, UV index, visibility, dew point, rain snow ice probability, wind direction speed gust, Cloud Cover. 24-hour Weather Forecast ,View anytime, anywhere . Hourly weather, know as soon as you slip.

# Weather forecast for the next 10 days
Provide daily temperature, weather phase, humidity, UV index, rain snow icing probability, lightning probability, wind direction/speed/gust, sunrise sunset time. Plan food, clothing, housing and transportation in advance . Forecast long-term weather, happy plan, happy play.

# Rain probability in the next 10 days
The bar graph displays the trend of rain probability. Watch the dynamic map of rainfall radar

# Wind direction information for the next 10 days
The line graph shows the level of the direction and the direction change trend.

# Air Quality Index
PM10, PM2.5, CO, NO2, SO2, O3, quality level.

# Other weather information
Dew point, Visibility, UV Index.

# Weather radar chart
Various cloud images can be displayed, making it easy to browse weather forecast information.

# Sunrise and sunset
Beautiful sunrise and sunset animation effects and moon phase information.

# City Management
The weather in the city you care about is clear at a glance. You can manually add and remove cities, adjust the order of cities, set the city and weather forecast for notifications and widgets.

# Weather information unit and format setting
Temperature: C, F
Precipitation: mm, in, cm
Visibility: mile, m, km
Wind speed: mp/h, km/h, mi/h, m/s
Pressure: bar, hPa, atm, mmHg
Hour format: 12 hour, 24 hour
Date format: yyyy/mm/dd(2021/01/29), mm/dd/yyyy(29/01/2021), dd/mm/yyyy(01/29/2021)

# Support multiple languages

Download and experience the accurate local weather forecast.

Enjoy your daily life and stay safe!

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us. We will do our best to provide a better experience for you.
Email:
linlifemx2020@gmail.com
summary: Local weather forecast app, your personal 7*24 local weather forecast assistant.

scraped_reviews.content: I have a number of weather apps on my phone, yet the Local Weather Forecast is the one I open most consistently. Its accurate and easily allows me to track multiple cities and towns. Today I decided to upgrade to the pro version without ads for $4.99. That's a lifetime subscription and it seems really reasonable. Thanks for a great, useful app!

Been using free version and just bought paid one so that I could access the radar and also support the company. Very nice uncluttered layout, nice graphics, easy to use interface. They did a good job designing this. Radar isn't as good as I hoped it would be. Thinking I should have stuck with free version, but hopefully it will get better. Also, paying $5 for paid version should get rid of the repeated "rate us on Google" pop-ups. Hopefully it will stop now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Payment is not required to use the basic features, which remain fully functional. Upgrading to the premium version (via payment) unlocks advanced features and removes ads. The payment pop-up is simply a reminder and is not mandatory.

scraped_reviews.content: Great so far! Other weather apps I've had went to paid subscriptions for location specific weather....sorry, but im not paying for them to be wrong about an uncertain thing, such as weather. The interface is nice and user-friendly with great graphics and pertinent information. I will upgrade to 5 stars if the developers keep it this way.

I used 1weather for 10 years, had the paid version even. they recently removed the temperature icon from the status bar. So I tried many other apps to find one that had what I wanted and I think this is it. One time payment to go ad free, widgets, and status bar icon. If the widgets get more stylish, I'd give this 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! The new versions will continuously undergo iterative optimizations for UI design and user experience, along with enriched widgets. Stay tuned!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is excellent and accurate for the weather, far more than a couple other apps I've tried. Tons of details. Perhaps even more importantly, the adverts are significantly less intrusive and obnoxious. The only thing I wish I could change is the widget options-- I'd like a larger clock and a more transparent background. But those are negligible gripes for an app that otherwise works great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful five-star review! Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing and providing you with weather services of greater precision and care. 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: Limited Widgets — I need a smaller widget, like 1-2 spaces wide. Their smallest is 4. And their app icon is busy noise, so I had to hide that. I really like that you can turn off the animated backgrounds, but the reality is I won't really be using the app because of the widget and app icon problem. I wanted a solution for animated backgrounds that still provides the value I want (absolutely minimal noise while still providing accurate weather information). I hope they update.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. It has been forwarded to the technical team, and smaller-sized widgets will be launched in subsequent versions as soon as possible. We appreciate your attention and support!

scraped_reviews.content: Great weather app! I finally got fed up with TWC app. The ads were annoying and they wanted a lot for a monthly subscription. So, I tried about 5-6 before finding this one. At first, I was a bit annoyed by the ads here as well, when I found out I could pay a one-time, less than a cup of coffee subscription and never see ads again, I was hooked! Thank you!

200+ vendors and partners want it use your data for "legitimate interest" and no option to deny all. Just going to uninstall. *edit for developer. I didn't mention ads. Was talking about cookies and data access request. I know I could spend the 20mins or so going through each option for each vendor /partner and turning them off but thats not something I am willing to do. I doesn't say what info it is wanting access to so it will not have any.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Normal ads can be closed directly. For some ads, a skip button will appear after viewing for a while, allowing you to close them. If there is no skip button, you can record a short video and send the specific issue to the developer's email. We will follow up on this. 📧🎥

scraped_reviews.content: I have been trying to find the perfect weather app over the last week or so and decided to try this one. Everything was looking good and thought I found the right one. That is until we had some bad storms coming and I wanted seer which direction the storms are going(at us or away from us). tried putting the radar into motion and nothing. only way you put radar in motion, you have to upgrade to premium. is $4.99 a lot- NO, but when others have it for free, why pay for it. went back WeatherBug

Forecast seems to be pretty accurate, however the non paid version has an ad the moment you try to access, which is inconvenient...I just want the weather, I don't want to wait 15 sec to 1 full min to see it. (There is a one time fee for no ads forever supposedly.) It also runs in the background even tho I have that setting turned off if you select exact location when using app. ETA: I have since clicked on no location access and it stopped running in background.

This is the first weather app I found worth paying for and I've tried many of the highest rated. The free version is great, but I wanted added features. I love the way the data is presented. For example, it gives you the best times for photography on any given day. The hourly forecast gives the usual info, but also shows the exact times of sunrise and sunset with an integrated and very clever display. No space is wasted and all graphics are clean and clear. I HIGHLY recommend this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful 5-star review! 🌟 Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing our service, providing you with more accurate and caring weather forecasts! 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: I rarely rate apps, but if you are staying with "1weather" because it came with your phone. Delete it and get this one. Far more accurate, intuitive, with real rime weather updated as you watch. As far as free apps go, this is the best one to get and hardly a smudge of ads. Well done to the developer on this one. If it came without ads, it would be 5 star all the way.

it's been difficult finding a decent, free weather app for Android. Weather Underground is gone. Accuweather used to work, now it doesn't. I thought this would work, but it only took a quick minute to realize it's terrible. The 'free' version is unusable with obnoxious ads that downloaded a ton of unwanted game apps on my phone. I don't like being strong armed into a purchase. Horrible app in the 'free' version.

Unless you pay, ads pop up and you can't bypass that. I love the app except for that reason. I know you need to make some compensation, but those ads are way too long. I'm a little leery of paying $4.99 for an app when I can't find that much information about the developers. I dealt with ads on Weather Channel app because it didn't take forever to go the the weather page. I left them after the new update because it was horrible, so I'm shopping for another choice.

So far, great! I prefer a lively weather app that is dynamic, colorful and interactive. The real beauty of this app? it's not produced by some huge corporate store! it's a small development team that are doing what their corporate counterparts struggle so hard with, making and a simple, cool, colorful weather app! that's all I wanted! thanks!

App started out great...nice graphics and easy to navigate. But the ads are incredibly annoying. Everytime I navigate to a new screen, one comes up that says "Final Step". I can close out easily enough, but it's a hassle. But worse was another one came up when I went back to Themes...it was a bible app that took a long time to finish, but then got me stuck in an endless loop to download it. No way to get out. Had to close app and reopen. That's a deal breaker!

I just installed the app so can't speak to accuracy yet but I love the simple, uncluttered design. It reports pollen count which is important to me & not all weather apps do. I purchased premium for the ability to customize my screen. It was a modest one-time fee and also removed ads. I appreciate that it was a one-time fee and not a subscription! Dev's - I probably wouldn't have purchased a subscription so pls don't change.

I downloaded a few apps at once to go along with one I pay for and this is the only free one I kept. This app seems to be right on with my weather, the notifications for rain, really signal if it's going to rain, which most that I downloaded did not. I'm hoping it is just as accurate for tornado season. I love the interface and all the options are easy to find and understand. I also love the seven day outlook and decided to add it to the widget.

Really pleased with this app. It's user-friendly and allows me to expect what's coming up in the weather. I get to see the general idea and I can also drill down for more detail. I got the affordable premium edition after using the free version. It is worth it. Even when used for free, it got the needed info without effort. Also less annoying ads than other apps. Gave it 4 stars only because I generally don't give 5 stars to any app. Definitely recommend.

Installed yesterday. I'm impressed enough that I purchased the app to get rid of the ads. Very nice app. Good info. I have been looking for one that showed the dew point prediction. Dew point is the real indication of how muggy it feels. Something I'd like is a smaller widget option. A small circle showing the temp and a icon for current conditions would be perfect. I don't need to see the time.

Nice level of information and layout but you use this type of app for accuracy and that's where it gets fuzzy. It appears you can select very specific locations but the data is not necessarily specific and potentialy regional so temps can be wildly off in rural areas where the data may be coming from the largest nearby city. It would be nice to know which weather station's data is being used for the selected location. Also the widgits don't seem to stay put once installed. Disappears next day.

The app provides good information. The ads are severely intrusive. So severe that when I clicked on a weather alert that had been issued, a full screen ad video popped up. Had to wait before the close X appeared. When I closed it, it took me out of the app to the play store download area of the app that was just advertised! I had to force close the app to go back in and read the alert. I was trying to test run this weather app before paying for it, but forget it. I'll find something else.

So far best weather app! Colorful, useful, and choices! I wud like 2 see more widget choices esp size, make it customizable in everything be great! Putting temp nums up in notifications bar to run along w/ the screen being closed was awesome! I would love to see is no ads. There's overlap and its hard to read. If weather is raging I need to find the info quickly. I love how the backgrounds change as well as the widget according to weather and time of day. Best of all accurate weather reports

All the glowing reviews must be using the paid version. I clicked on the icon to play the radar loop and it prompted me to upgrade to premium. Living in Florida, I need to know where the thunderstorms are coming from and how fast they're moving. Both Weatherbug and my local TV station's weather app have this feature in the free version. Unacceptable and uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, we will continue to optimize to provide a better experience.

scraped_reviews.content: My favorite weather app. A little difficult at first to find info like "cloud cover %", also, I would like to have the previous day's hi & lo temperatures shown. Very nice daily visual charts of ranges in temperature, rainfall, & wind. Graphs of daily barometric pressures would be nice. Worth the one time fee, but I don't like other apps that want paid "subscriptions" every year.

Easy to use. Free for basic use and inexpensive to get rid of ads. I appreciate the fact that I can monitor the UV index hourly, and I use this every morning to plan my walks. Only downside is they don't give the potential severe weather warnings that some of the weather websites give directly on the main page. you have to go digging through the details to find them and even then I'm not sure they give as much as some of the weather websites and that would be very helpful to have.

I choose to install a different weather app because of the inaccuracies of the app I had been using (for 4 years) and the poor response from their tech support people. This local weather app is so much better! Easy to use, accurate and pleasing to the eye. My only negative would be that I went to pay the $4.99 and the app won't accept my payment, it is the same Mastercard I use for all online shopping, food delivery etc. It is saved on Google Pay and I've never had it rejected before.

Great app! Especially the version without adds, only $4.99, great price, besides the adds were about as bad as the weather channel. I will be honest 5 star in the paid version the free version gets a 2.5 star; but even then it...Beats the weather channel, fairly accurate and easy to use, good features those weather gurus, and you can customize the layout unlike any other weather app I've used Plus radar!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful five-star review! Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing and providing you with more accurate and caring weather services~ 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: Every time you open this app you have to sit through a full screen 30 second to 1 minute ad that you cannot close and even when you think you can close it instead of it closing it brings you to the Play store to try to download something else. It is very annoying and you cannot even close this app until after you watch the ad. I understand it's a free app and the developer has to make money the distance too much. I will be uninstalling after this review

So far, Sooo good!! It's FREE and it's USEFUL, and ADLESS! (as far as I know, because I haven't noticed one ad...) Lots of selections, such as adding as many different locations around the world that you're nosy about their weather!! Thank you devs, even though you're a small company, your just as good, in fact better than many big ones!

Installed this one when my other one went rogue and started getting everything wrong. It also had so many ads that came up that you could not close without closing the app, as well. I am happy to say that I am more than pleased with this one. It is extremely accurate, easy to use and the ads don't interfere in any way with the app doing it's job. I will keep it forever. Everyone should download this one. AAA+++ :):):)

I've tried several weather apps, and this one meets my needs the best. We have power outages and I need to be prepared. This app shows me when a storm is coming, wind velocity and gusts throughout the day. I receive 'weather alerts' that also keep me prepared. Because I have family throughout this world, I can also easily check the same information where they live. It's another way to be connected. Easy to use & very few ads. A great free app. I'm purchasing the upgrade to support the app.

BEST weather app! I've tried so many, even multiple times (forgetting why I uninstalled them, or giving them another chance). Never again. I LOVE Local Weather! Given permission, it delivers the weather information where I am. (In Weather Channel, set to "follow me" you still have to tap the menu and tap current location to see local weather, instead of your "favorited" location.) THIS app's information is complete, easy to reach, sometimes unique. Best photo lighting? Yes, and thanks!

Ok, this isn't worth taking a star off but the widgets are WAYYY too big. I'd love to see a customizable 5x1 or 3x1 where you could set transparency and maybe change font color. Past that, the app itself is a 5 star app on initial impressions. I had no problem buying the ad free and custom layout experience. If the overall forecast accuracy is on par, I'll be very happy using this app in years to come.

I'm kind of a weather-holic and I just started using this app, and find it the most accurate among 4 or 5 weather apps I have. We have horses, and daily and nighttime Temps and other weather factors are key in how we handle the critters. This app seems to be most accurate and therefore most trusted for our purposes. Thank you folks for accurate weather forecasts!!

Used to be a good app. I didn't even mind the ads, they weren't improperly placed. Now, I wouldn't advise anyone to use this app. The ads now pop up when you try to click on a watch or warning and you cant skip the ads to see the watch or warning. You have to wait out the ad. Several times i couldnt even shut the ad when it finished and had to forget about reading the weather watch for my area.

I've tried several weather apps, but never got what I thought was really up to date and accurate weather predictions. This app is concise and gives me just what I want. Hourly and daily forecasts are easy to read and spot on. My only knock is the radar. A little hard to tell sometimes in the precipitation filter. I actually downloaded another app for the radar. No weather app does it all for me, but this one is the best I've found.

I was looking for a weather app and this one does what I want. The best if all is FREE OF CHARGE with ads. (Which they do not bombard you) but if you want to remove ads then just pay the 4.99 for a LIFETIME Ownership. The app have a lot information and features. I LOVE IT so much that I did pay the 4.99 To the developers, keep it like that guys.

Tried changing settings,&got trapped in an ad WITH NO. X, BACK BUTTON DISABLED & no way to stop the demo. In fact, the only button that worked was the button to install the game. If the play store is doing it or allowing it to be done. I guess it'll take an act of congress to stop them taking over my phone & disabling buttons. How many people have to die because they can't use their phone in an emergency, till you get your ad seen & your app clicked on!!!

Good weather app except for one really big glitch. The weather radar sucks. The readout on the map is spotty. The radar return starts and then disappears. It comes back after sweeping but drops out again. Cannot depend on this radar for accuracy. If fixed this would be a 5 star app. I paid for the premium version only to have unacceptable radar and a waste of money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! It has been forwarded to our technical team and will be optimized in future updates. We appreciate your support and will continue providing more professional and well-prepared local weather forecasts! 📧📱

scraped_reviews.content: I live on a rural property in NSW Australia, so an accurate weather app is important. I'm tired of the other weather apps I've been using over the years and them not being accurate by up to 5 - 10⁰C at times. I have a home weather station that I regularly check and compare it to my weather apps & devices and so far, this app is the most accurate. After reading all of the reviews, here I am now as a paid member! Keep up with the good work!👍
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful 5-star review! 🌟 Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing our service, providing you with more accurate and caring weather forecasts! 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: did not know the ads were going to pop up and fill almost the whole screen while I was trying to look for the weather I don't want to click on it and see an ad I want to see the weather if they were just in there someplace that's okay but they take up the whole screen right when you click on it to look for the weather that's ridiculous I might have to get rid of that app and find another one
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Normal ads can be closed directly. For some ads, a skip button will appear after watching for a while, allowing you to close the ad directly. If there is no skip button, you can record the issue and send the details to the developer's email. We look forward to your continued use.

scraped_reviews.content: Way better than my old weather app that would just show if it was raining or sunny on my notification bar. This actually provides the temperature which is so nice to have at a quick glance. It's also good about updating my location as I move through the city.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful 5-star review! 🌟 Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing our service, providing you with more accurate and caring weather forecasts! 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: This is a very thorough look at the weather. It's not only the daily view of the temperature, but allergies and radar. The ads stubbornly stay on and hard to decline. I have to turn the ap off and start again to get rid of the ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Normal ads can be closed directly. For some ads, a skip button will appear after viewing for a while, allowing you to close them. If there is no skip button, you can record a short video and send the specific issue to the developer's email. We will follow up on this. 📧🎥

scraped_reviews.content: As someone who always wants to be updated about the weather system/conditions, this application is by far the best weather forecasting application I've ever had. I love how it gives you detailed information about any weather advisory, clear radar, and other important updates. This is amazing!👏

Just started using this app. However, I have deleted a few just because their layout and setup had much to be desired. I can tell the people that put this app together wanted to do a top shelf job. If in the upcoming days I find this app to be lacking I will change and update my review. Hopefully this app will live up to the appearance it's designers gave it. We'll see; I get all my weather from my phone, none from TV.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful 5-star review! 🌟 Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing our service, providing you with more accurate and caring weather forecasts! 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: I have tested many weather apps and have settled on three top choices: My radar (best for radar views), Local weather (this app-- most accurate realtime rain forecast and a refreshingly pleasant presentation), and Today Weather (only because I really like one of their widgets for my home screen).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful 5-star review! 🌟 Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing our service, providing you with more accurate and caring weather forecasts! 🌞☔️

scraped_reviews.content: FOUR UNSKIPPABLE LOUD ADS for every thing I'm doing in the app? You must be crazy. Also WARNING: This app shares your location with unspecified third parties. Edit to address dev's "The app does not retrieve location information in the background. It periodically fetches the latest weather data using previously obtained location details" - your app (1) requests to have location access ALL THE TIME - check the manifest, (2) SHARES that with unspecified third parties (yes,I read privacy policy).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The app does not retrieve location information in the background. It periodically fetches the latest weather data using previously obtained location details. Future versions will reduce the frequency of location requests and weather updates. We will also optimize the ad experience by filtering out intrusive ad content.

scraped_reviews.content: was at 5 stars. but now I can't use the basic radar at all. it just tells me to buy the app at $4.99. I was thinking of buying it next week when I get paided but idk now ill give it a another day. I'll just Uninstall and find a different app if it doesnt. (edited:Uninstalled I'll try it later if they fix the basic radar.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The radar includes advanced features that require payment to upgrade to the premium version. This has been forwarded to the technical team for adjustments and optimization in future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: excellent app highly recommend. every hour of every day I can be confident of the weather status before and during my time away from home, no matter where I am or where I'm going. Top app ... a "must have" for the disabled like me. Thanks for your reply Dev's.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thoughtful five-star review! Your recognition motivates us to keep optimizing and providing you with weather services of greater precision and care. 🌞☔️

title: Huntington Mobile Banking
description:
Whether it’s a checking or savings account, credit card, loan, or investment account, the Huntington Mobile Banking app helps make managing your money simple and secure. At home or on the go, check balances, pay bills, deposit checks, or transfer funds. Plus, you can enjoy features designed to look out for you and your financial well-being. 

New to Huntington? Download our mobile banking app to open your account today. 

Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version. 

Manage Your Accounts:
• Check account balances with a tap—no need to log in to see your Huntington Quick Balance.
• Activate real-time account alert messages†† with Huntington Heads Up®.
• View up-to-date information about your Huntington accounts, including pending transactions.
• Search for transactions within your account history.
• Manage overdraft options.

Send Money with Zelle®†
• Send and receive money with Zelle® directly from your Huntington account.
• Zelle® works with trusted friends and family with U.S. bank accounts.

Pay Bills:
• Pay a person or company.
• Receive a summary that describes the amount and payment date, and get a receipt when the transaction is complete.
• Manage your payees by adding, editing, or deleting a payee.

Transfer Money:
• Move money between your Huntington accounts or accounts at other banks. 
• Choose your preferred transfer date and get a transaction receipt. 

Manage Your Debit Card:
• Activate your personal ATM or debit card.
• Change your PIN with the app.

Manage Checks:
• Take photos of checks and securely deposit funds into your accounts.
• Order checks through the app.

Savings and Budgeting Tools:
• Set up and track savings goals.
• See how much you’re spending and where you’re spending it, with categories like groceries and entertainment.
• Set up monthly budgets and we’ll let you know if you’re on or off track.
• View upcoming transactions—including income and payment patterns—before they happen.
• We’ll help identify money in your checking account you aren’t using that could be moved to your savings account.

Security:
• Log into the app securely with your username and password, Face ID, or Fingerprint Login.
• Instantly lock your debit or credit card.
• The Huntington Personal Online Guarantee helps protect you from unauthorized transactions through Online Banking or Bill Pay  , when reported in a timely manner.

Connect with Us Anytime:
• Find ATMs and branches near you or by street address.
• Call and speak with a representative by phone.
• Get quick answers with our virtual assistant.

Download the Huntington Mobile Banking app today.

Disclosures:

Some features are only available to customers who have registered for online banking at huntington.com. The Huntington Mobile Banking app is free, but message and data rates from your mobile carrier may apply. System availability and response time are subject to market conditions.

†For your protection, you should only send money to those you know and trust, such as family, friends and others such as your personal trainer, babysitter or neighbor. If you don’t know the person or aren’t sure you will get what you paid for, you should not use Zelle® for these types of transactions.

††   Message and data rates may apply.

Zelle® and the Zelle® related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license.

The Huntington National Bank is Member FDIC.

summary: Securely manage your bank accounts, right from your mobile device.

scraped_reviews.content: On the rare occasion it works it's nice, but this app barely works most of the time anyway, and now it's been saying "something went wrong" and hasn't loaded at all for almost a week. I've done all the app "maintenance" and it just keeps saying it's because of "my connection" even though my connection is great and it's the only app on my phone that isn't working. 🙄 It was being weird before it stopped working too and was screwing up transfers, makes no sense.

The app worked great for me for at least a year. Now, since their last update that supposedly was fixing bugs and crashing, I can't even open it. I get the green Huntington logo and then the app immediately crashes and closes on me. It doesn't even give the option for a crash report. I don't know what changes have been made, but they need to go back to what it was. I wouldn't even bother with this app until they fix it. It's insanely frustrating!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are constantly working to improve our system and encountered some unexpected issues recently. We have identified the fix, and we're working with Google to process the update. In the meantime, please visit huntington.com to perform your online banking.

scraped_reviews.content: Do not believe the notice that bugs have been fixed when in fact there are now bugs making the app useless. It used to be great. Now, like the other recent posts indicate, mobile deposits are not possible. No longer automatically takes photo and freezes in process of taking photo. Been trying for 2 days. No point in even having an app if not able to make deposits. And if can't make mobile deposits, will need to find another bank.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced. To help us troubleshoot, we’d like to learn more. Please send us an email at HuntingtonMobileDeveloper@huntington.com and include any additional information you have such as a screenshot of the issue or error message, as well as what device you are using.

scraped_reviews.content: Unable to unlock my debit card on app and online all day. I've never had an issue with this the whole time I've had my account for over 5 years. This is very disappointing. I called customer service and the hold is over 45 mins. I'm not going to wait that long for a feature that was available through the app within seconds. I'm going to close my accounts too many issues. Plus the atm's don't work!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on Huntington’s Mobile app. We’re sorry that you’ve experienced some issues, and for the inconvenience this has caused you. Please contact our Customer Solution Center at (800) 480-2265 account specific questions. We value your feedback as we work to improve digital banking for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: The app used to work great, but I haven't been able to log in for the past couple of updates. I contacted dev support, provided them all the details they requested, went through their troubleshooting steps and in the end their response was, "This is due to the format and font of the check." Which obviously has nothing to do with the problem of not being able to log in. I haven't received any further response after multiple follow-ups.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced. To help us troubleshoot, we’d like to learn more. Please send us an email at HuntingtonMobileDeveloper@huntington.com and include any additional information you have such as a screenshot of the issue or error message, as well as what device you are using.

scraped_reviews.content: This app works great 50% of the time. The other 50% I can't ever seem to access my information and it happens to be when I need it most, go figure. They maintenance the app frequently and you can't use it all while they're doing it. Sometimes it takes hours before you can access it again. Sometimes I try to log in and get a "something went wrong" message and can't access my account. For all the maintenance they do you'd think things like that would be fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced. To help us troubleshoot, we’d like to learn more. Please send us an email at HuntingtonMobileDeveloper@huntington.com and include any additional information you have such as a screenshot of the issue or error message, as well as what device you are using.

scraped_reviews.content: They've taken away the ability to view history and pause/manage cards. This app isn't any good for anything other than viewing your balance. Used to be handy. Not anymore. Feels like they're trying to force you to cone in to the branch location and listen to their sales pitch about their credit card. Not sure how much longer we will be banking here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on Huntington’s Mobile app. We’re sorry that you’ve experienced some issues. For account specific questions, contact a customer service representative at (800) 480-2265, Monday through Friday, 7:00 a.m. – 8:00 p.m. ET. We value your feedback as we work to improve online banking for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: Spend analysis tool does not work. I physically added up all actual posted and pending monthly transactions, and the numbers did not match the tool. After looking through the transactions from the spend analysis tool, some were listed multiple times, including a pending one I currently have. This resulted in the tool showing I've spent several hundred dollars more than I actually have this month. I have not used other features. Based on this one, I don't want to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback and for using the Huntington Mobile app. We're always looking for ways to improve, and your feedback is appreciated as we plan updates for the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Initially, I gave this bank a horrible review. I was convinced that they were scamming people and stealing money from my account or at least messing up and causing duplicate charges or something. After my review, i was contacted by the bank, and everything was explained to me, and they even refunded one of the fees. Im still upset they took my overdraft coverage away, though I always paid it back within their 24-hour grace period. I do love the mobile app, a main reason i have decided to stay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on Huntington’s Mobile app. We’re sorry that you’ve experienced some issues, and for the inconvenience this has caused you. Please contact our Customer Solution Center at (800) 480-2265 account specific questions. We value your feedback as we work to improve digital banking for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: It's been 2 years since I wrote a review and voiced my concerns. Obviously they were never addressed. The security systems will strong arm you from your own account. They don't make it easy even to simply login, and the system will be slow, never send you the required verification email, or simply lock your account just because. Unacceptable, especially if you are traveling abroad and need to use your card, just for it to be locked. Be warned:you CANNOT unlock your card without visiting a branch
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on Huntington’s Mobile app. We’re sorry that you’ve experienced some issues. For account specific questions, contact a customer service representative at (800) 480-2265, Monday through Friday, 7:00 a.m. – 8:00 p.m. ET. We value your feedback as we work to improve online banking for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: Mobile app really sucks if you have any type of issues. You can't speak to anybody in real time unless you want to wait on hold for up to two hours. They know they have an issue with sending verification codes but no idea when that problem will be resolved. So if you plan on getting a new phone, good luck with getting that new device verification code. I'm about to change banks if this problem isn't resolved quickly. The automated response to every bad review is annoying as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced. To help us troubleshoot, we’d like to learn more about the issue. Please send us an email at mobile.developer@huntington.com. Please include any additional information you have, as well as what device you are using. Thanks for your feedback and thanks for using the Huntington Mobile app.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst mobile/online banking experience I've ever had. I can't make principal only payments on loans, there's a bug that's been going on for more than 2 months after you click "make a payment", it says "One or more fees must be selected and have an amount greater than 0" and there's nowhere for you to specify the amount. I have to call into the PCL department or visit the bank to apply payments. All future mortgages and loans I will take to a bank that has competent online banking
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and for using the Huntington Mobile app. We apologize for the inconvenience. In order to troubleshoot the issue, we’d like to collect some more information from you. Please email us at mobile.developer@huntington.com and include any additional information regarding the error as well as what device you are using.

scraped_reviews.content: What happened??? It keeps giving me an error message about not connected to the internet, when I am. Finally get logged in says it doesn't recognize my device and phone is unregistered. Even though it is registered according to the website. I need the app to work, so I can make deposits, I no longer live near a banking location. Worked fine until latest update!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are constantly working to improve our system and encountered some unexpected issues recently. We have identified the fix, and we're working with Google to process the update. In the meantime, please visit huntington.com to perform your online banking.

scraped_reviews.content: Huntington has really let me down. I was able to set it up to samsung pay, I was able to link it to my Doordash account, but it when it comes time to automatically deposit into my account, it bounces back. I can't sign in. I even did forget username. I called the 1800 number and the system looked up my phone number and it's as if I don't even exist! I've signed in on my app just a couple days ago! And now I can't! If your system is experiencing problems, then let your customers know asap!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I am sorry for your experience. You are always welcome to visit a branch office and for convenience you can email us at HuntingtonMobileDeveloper@huntington.com so we can begin to troubleshoot right away! Thank you for banking with Huntington!

scraped_reviews.content: Cannot deposit more than 1 check at a time. If you have more than 1 account - after depositing 1 check, selecting accounts no longer works after the 1st check. You have to log out and log in again to be able to select the account for deposit. The developer apparently has no QA/ software verification process in place, and asks users to submit details of problems. I can only imagine how secure the data and passwords are with the Huntingon bank. For Shame!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced. To help us troubleshoot, we’d like to learn more about the issue. Please send us an email at mobile.developer@huntington.com. Please include any additional information you have, as well as what device you are using. Thanks for your feedback and thanks for using the Huntington Mobile app.

scraped_reviews.content: Force closes immediately. I JUST opened a huntington account to make paying my bills less confusing. It worked great for a whole week. Now that I've actually got money in it, the app force closes before it even fully opens. I have to go to the website in order to do anything which completely defeats the purpose of having a banking app. I expect it to be fixed soon or I will be forced to find a bank with a working app....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are constantly working to improve our system and encountered some unexpected issues recently. We have identified the fix, and we're working with Google to process the update. In the meantime, please visit huntington.com to perform your online banking.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't put many reviews up but this app is the worst. It does not update your purchases or pending amount until days after you've spent money. It also will not allow you to transfer money between accounts (i.e. savings to checking). I have to goto a bank any time I want to get something done. I've been with tcf for a long time, time to take my business elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced, and we’re here to help. Please visit one of the following links for more information regarding TCF joining Huntington, and for further answers to your questions:
https://www.huntington.com/tcf-bank
https://www.huntington.com/customer-service

scraped_reviews.content: Decent bank, but the app is otherwise unfunctional. Every time I get a paycheck or a general large amount of money, my account force logs out and will not let me log back in, ending up in me having to uninstall the app for about a week before it resets. The issue is something regarding "my device not being recognized," despite me always having my device remembered and a code always on hand. I see I'm not the only one with this problem. Please fix!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry for the inconvenience you’ve experienced. To help us troubleshoot, we’d like to learn more about the issue. Please send us an email at mobile.developer@huntington.com. Please include any additional information you have, as well as what device you are using. Thanks for your feedback and thanks for using the Huntington Mobile app.

scraped_reviews.content: App is full of great tools and resources. Love the bank and concept of their app. However, 85% time i can't even load into the app, I know it isn't a phone issue, the app has been buggy like this for years now. If you could fix the servers or whatever is bugging out the load/boot up of the app, 5 stars would be given all day! You guys were small time, then went and bought TCF, time step up the mobile game here..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Due to widespread power outages, you may be experiencing issues with certain account information and the Huntington Mobile app. You can log in at Huntington.com through your web browser. Visit huntington.com for more updates. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We're working to restore service as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: The app has been so spotty lately whenever I ABSOLUTELY need it. I tried to transfer money and it just would NOT load. Then when it did load it didn't or couldn't transfer money between my accounts. I got locked out for trying to get the app to work. Maybe I should have been better prepared, but you wouldn't expect it to break when you're at a restaurant. 😐

I really like the convenience of this app. I use it most days and rarely have issues. Once in a while, there may be a slight amount of buffering and an occasional error, but that's rare. I do wish the menu was at the top, instead of the bottom (like the desktop website) and I would like the capability to schedule, edit and cancel recurring bill payments and transfers, without using the website.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and for using the Huntington Mobile app. We're always looking for ways to improve, and your feedback is appreciated as we plan updates for the app.

scraped_reviews.content: There is often some sort of issue when it comes to this particular banking app. It's frustrating. I'm frustrated. I can only hope the makers of this app take note of how well other financial apps run, such as Chase and Bank of America, for example. Those run smoothly, with no issues regarding transfers or passwords or having to relog a few dozen times.

scraped_reviews.content: Would be a solid 4 stars at least. It works most of the time. I should not be barred from access to seeing how much money I have in my account at any time. This is unsettling. title: Buffer: Social Media Scheduler
description:
Buffer helps you grow your following – and save time – with planning, scheduling, and analytics tools. Whether you’re just getting started on your creator journey or scaling your audience to new heights, Buffer will get your content in front of more people. Manage your posts, engage with your audience, analyze your results, and save ideas for future content all with the help of Buffer. 

With Buffer, you can plan, preview, and schedule your social media posts ahead of time to Instagram, Facebook, Threads, TikTok, Pinterest, LinkedIn, YouTube, Bluesky, and more  — without the need to manually publish when the time comes. Save and organize all your brilliant content ideas in Buffer’s Create space when inspiration strikes. Measure analytics to track what works, get valuable insights, and improve your social media growth strategy. Use our calendar and planner to get a bird’s eye view of your content for the next week or month.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE BUFFER:

SIMPLIFIED SOCIAL MEDIA SCHEDULER

- Plan, preview, and schedule your social media posts ahead of time — without the need to manually publish when the time comes.
- Schedule and publish posts on Facebook, Instagram, Threads, TikTok, Twitter, Google Business Profiles, Pinterest, LinkedIn, YouTube, Mastodon, and Bluesky
- Cross-post your content across platforms to maximize your reach and engagement
- Plan and schedule YouTube Shorts, TikTok videos, Instagram Reels, and Instagram Stories
- With engagement options right in-app, Buffer can be your trusted social media manager

PLAN, SAVE, AND ORGANIZE ALL YOUR IDEAS

- Centralize all your content ideas in one hub
- Add colorful tags to organize your ideas in campaigns or 
- Easily move your ideas to your schedule when they’re ready

PREVIEW DETAILED SOCIAL MEDIA ANALYTICS

- Get easy-to-read social media analytics and insights for all the posts you share
- See social media post analytics to uncover what type of content performs best with your audience
- Gain insight into how your posts perform through a simple dashboard

VISUAL SOCIAL MEDIA CALENDAR

- Get an at-a-glance view of all the social media content you have lined up with our social media content calendar
- Schedule posts at specific days and times for a consistent presence across your accounts with calendar view
- Plan social media content across all your social media platforms weeks and months ahead of time

__
NEED HELP? GET 24/7 SUPPORT
Get world-class support from your friends at Buffer via email and social media.

BROWSER EXTENSIONS
You can also add to Buffer from your favorite browser using our Browser Extensions for Safari, Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

Privacy Policy: https://buffer.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://buffer.com/legal/terms-of-use/year/2023

Do you have any questions for us?
Email: hello@buffer.com
Twitter: @buffer
Facebook: http://facebook.com/bufferapp
Instagram: @buffer
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/bufferapp/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bufferapp
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@Bufferapp

very easy to use and intuitive. loved it!

title: Signal Private Messenger
description:
Signal is a messaging app with privacy at its core. It is free and easy to use, with strong end-to-end encryption that keeps your communication completely private.


• Send texts, voice messages, photos, videos, GIFs, and files for free. Signal uses your phone’s data connection, so you avoid SMS and MMS fees.


• Call your friends with crystal-clear encrypted voice and video calls. Group calls supported for up to 50 people.


• Stay connected with group chats up to 1,000 people. Control who can post and manage group members with admin permission settings.


• Share image, text, and video Stories that disappear after 24 hours. Privacy settings keep you in charge of exactly who can see each Story.


• Signal is built for your privacy. We know nothing about you or who you’re talking to. Our open source Signal Protocol means that we can’t read your messages or listen to your calls. Neither can anyone else. No back doors, no data collection, no compromises.


• Signal is independent and not for profit; a different kind of tech from a different kind of organization. As a 501c3 nonprofit we are supported by your donations, not by advertisers or investors.


• For support, questions, or more information please visit https://support.signal.org/


To check out our source code, visit https://github.com/signalapp


Follow us on Twitter @signalapp and Instagram @signal_app
descriptionHTML:
Signal is a messaging app with privacy at its core. It is free and easy to use, with strong end-to-end encryption that keeps your communication completely private.


• Send texts, voice messages, photos, videos, GIFs, and files for free. Signal uses your phone’s data connection, so you avoid SMS and MMS fees.


• Call your friends with crystal-clear encrypted voice and video calls. Group calls supported for up to 50 people.


• Stay connected with group chats up to 1,000 people. Control who can post and manage group members with admin permission settings.


• Share image, text, and video Stories that disappear after 24 hours. Privacy settings keep you in charge of exactly who can see each Story.


• Signal is built for your privacy. We know nothing about you or who you’re talking to. Our open source Signal Protocol means that we can’t read your messages or listen to your calls. Neither can anyone else. No back doors, no data collection, no compromises.


• Signal is independent and not for profit; a different kind of tech from a different kind of organization. As a 501c3 nonprofit we are supported by your donations, not by advertisers or investors.


• For support, questions, or more information please visit https://support.signal.org/


To check out our source code, visit https://github.com/signalapp


Follow us on Twitter @signalapp and Instagram @signal_app
summary: Say “hello” to privacy.

scraped_reviews.content: good app, but asked for a rating. I'll let it pass the first time but it's minus 1 star each time after that. things to know: -it requires a phone number to make an account. -signal is a not-for-profit entity or some kind, they will remind you repeatedly. -you can't find groups, only be invited to them via a link. I have not found a site with public groups. -it is secure enough for most normal people -changing or adding a device will cause some extra steps or confusion for your friends.

Love signal! however I've noticed a bug to PLEASE FIX♥️: the calls do NOT ring, even with notifications on in the app, and in settings, and the phone in full ring mode. it's very frustrating because I keep missing calls. DEVELOPERS, PLEASE FIX AND I'LL BE VERY VERY GRATEFUL. i use it for a lot of my messaging and it's easy to back up messages.

Military preferred. Not great, but standardized. It seems like the encryption slows down it's performance. There are times when we have a message sent to us and the next day we say "No Sergeant, we didn't receive anything." Then 20 minutes later we all hear our phones chime at the same time for the late message. Then phone calls will not work properly. Usually we hang up and try via our non-encrypted apps which work just fine. This app also doesn't like hands free driving. (Still the same.)

It's encrypted end-to-end by default. It's free (made by a nonprofit). It's not owned by FB, G, or any other big ad pusher. And it does text, voice, and video. (Missing feature: "Mark as Unread"; I find I often take a quick peek at a message and find that it requires a lengthy reply that I didn't have time to write at the moment, but then forget to come back to it until much later.)

Great connecting app. Working well for what I need. We use this as the primary messaging app for church. It works great for forming and managing groups. You can easily make new groups, have someone leave the group, change several people if you want. Theie safety privacy concerns are great, but it does make backups a little bit more complicated. I just changed phones recently & I will say that the process of moving over to a new phone has gotten easier. M conversations moved over with me

a new feature has been added that should be reconsidered. when typing a text, suggested emojis appear at the top of the dialogue box. but if you click on one of them (I assumed to add it to my message), it sends the emoji immediately AND deletes the text I have drafted. this has happened to me 3 times so I don't feel it's user error. why would I want to do this? can I disable the suggestions?

Works great, only reason I gave 4 stars is because I cannot block a sender like I can on the default messaging app. If that can be fixed or if it's there make it easier to find it would be 5 stars. **update I can block spam numbers now so that makes this a 5 star app! Not only are the conversations encrypted but the available options to customize texts is amazing. Signal just keeps getting better and better.

This app is awesome. Excellent end-to-end encrypted messager, plenty of features and very secure. No records (no one but you and the person you are messaging have the encryption key) and a desktop client to boot. Free, but servers and development are donation-supported. More than likely, if you aren't paying for a service with money, you are paying with your personal data. Signal doesn't do that.

Used the app for years, never had an issue, until I tried to migrate it to my new phone, paid for backup, completed the backup as instructed, and then during restore on the new phone none of the photos got back. (they said it may take some time but it's been 2 weeks and still nothing...) So beware... probably would be a good idea to download and save all important attachments before migration... too late for me now.

GARBAGE! While it seems okay, you can't post videos longer than 5 minutes. I do a lot of screen recordings and most are upwards of 10 minutes or more. While it does give you the chance to cut the video into segments, I would much rather be able to post longer videos like I can on some other platforms. Haven't had a chance to try my Bluetooth on it yet, so can't give a better or worse rating yet. Oh, also, sending links DOESN'T give an attached pic.

6/2023: I've had a few months of a weird glitch where no notifications come through unless I manually open the app. It's happening on all three separate accounts. Very frustrating. There doesn't seem to be an update to fix the issue? Prior review: So far this has been great. The things I text about don't pop up as advertisements on my phone later! 😍

A nice alternative to other messaging apps. However, I frequently experience issues with missed notifications, calls don't always ring, call quality can be poor/average, and on occasion, messages don't appear for a period of time (up to 30 minutes). The message then suddenly appears dated/timed 30 minutes prior.

I am a long time user of Signal and I generally like it, but the transfer process to move it to a new Android phone is counterintuitive and buggy. If the transfer process fails, it locks you out of your old phone... even if you know your passphrase. The only reliable method is to move over a backup file, but even in that case there are two different pass phrases, one numeric with 30 digits and the other alphanumeric with 64 chars and it isn't always clear which one you need to enter.

I love the app but I have tried the call and video feature with no luck. It will connect but will start showing that it is trying to reconnect amd then drops. a couple times the phone call connected but they said they couldn't hear me. Any suggestions? Also, for the past few months have been experiencing lengthy delays in text messages going through. we have looked at our settings and they are set right. I use and android phone and they have a iPhone. Again and suggestions?

This app is extremely easy to use and to add photos to your text messages. A keyboard integrates with it easily making it quick and efficient typing out your messages (bluetooth). I was hesitatnt to use it at first, but did resarch on this application. After research, I did not hesitate to start using it. I have not been disappointed.

This would be a good app if its programmers actually knew anything about how to make an app act correctly *on a phone*, but they don't. The app still rings in Do Not Disturb, but then there's no indication what is ringing. An call incoming, when the screen is locked, comes up, but then it's difficult or impossible to get to anything else on the phone.

Excellent messaging app. While I'd like for it to do all messaging (i.e. SMS), there's no better encrypted messaging app available. The only way to make it better would be if it still allowed messaging to/from those who do not use Signal. Also, there are frequent delays in receiving messages between users. Still worthy of a 3☆ rating, although I want it to be a 5☆ app. Gotta be honest, though, and the issues are too significant to ignore.

Signal is your #1 choice for privacy! This is the best free app for fully encrypted end-to-end messaging. They don't store any data on you, and they have coded the app specifically to keep data out of their hands. The interface is sleek, responsive and user friendly. Any quibble I have with the app is the natural result of using an app that ensures privacy over convenience. I'd love message recovery, but the app would have to surrender end-to-end encryption to deliver a solution.

Signal is great, but Google and Apple made it so you cannot use it as a primary messaging app. Now I have to confirm whether my friends have Signal before I message them. Signal has added some unnecessary features, like stories, and I don't think they should try to compete with the less secure messaging systems. Just be you, Signal. You are great as you are.

Since the May update this app has had high idle drain of about 1.5-2% per hour while the phone is "sleeping". Not sure what broke but it is annoying. No more putting my phone down for the night and expecting it to still be ready for the next day. Instead it needs to be plugged in otherwise I'll wake up to find 10-15% more of the battery gone while the phone did nothing.

Chat bubbles that one cannot turn off in the app? Half the time they don't work properly as the screen to input text is dysfunctional and disappears so one cannot see what ones writing. Option to turn off Chat Bubbles has completely disappeared from app settings. Signal, settings, apps, special access, appear on top... Signal isn't there yet, it obviously gave itself permission to appear on top of other apps. Signal seems suspicious at this point.

Random delays delivering messages. I have many friends on Signal, and will get messages with a four hour delay sometimes despite both of us sending and receiving signal messages with other people during the same time frame. Updated versions, we have both reinstalled, and it is not an internet connection issue on our end. Again, we both send and receive messages with other signal users during the same time frame, and suddenly I get messages with hours delayed time stamps asking where I am.

You'd think the emphasis on security, encryption and privacy would hinder the normal chat app parts. But no. This is actually much better than your typical chatting function, in say, text messages, social media, etc, where messaging is subpar from emphasis on algorithmic posts and so on. And you don't have to pay a cent for it if you don't want to, and you're not the product. Sounds crazy, but it's true.

Great app for messaging. I would have given 5* but for some reason, in the last two days, the time stamp on my messaging has been WAY out. The time stamp is over 3 hours behind my correct time, and 5 hours behind the correct time of the person I am chatting with. Updates have been done, so dont know the problem. Tried to contact for help, but between bug log and other info required, it wouldnt go through. Good app, with one little glitch at the moment.

Signal provides a very similar look and feel to WhatsApp but is architected with privacy in mind, rather than big tech data harvesting (Signal stores everything locally so no corporation ever touches your data). It is without question the messaging app we should all be using, and I have encouraged many of my contacts to switch. No business spam on here either. Signal allows a temp userid as well as phone number, meaning user can also connect without sharing phone number, so great for children.

good app to replace whatsapp, but please please PLEASE add markdown to the text input... i know there have been considerations in the past to not implement it, but it's such a widespread feature now and it's one thing I really miss from other apps in signal. the text selection approach where you tap your modification from the popup menu is all nice and good (when it works, which isn't a given on my xiaomi 12t device), but it's so much slower than just typing the modifier characters

Great if you don't care about the past. Ghastly if you do. Signal can automatically save an encrypted log of your chats locally—Android only! You need something else to move it off-site & find somewhere "safe" (!?) to save its long random encryption key. Worse: it's impossible to transfer your history between Android and iOS! Worse: the backup file grows forever—incremental backup is impossible. The developers arrogantly regard these problems as irrelevant? Not suitable for long-term use :(

i used signal for a few weeks on a Samsung galaxy s10e mostly without issue, but switched to a new galaxy A25 recently as my old s10e was dying. i now mostly don't receive messages when my phone is locked, or sometimes even until i open the app. seemingly at random, i may also receive messages normally, with a short delay, or a very long delay. spent hours running through the official troubleshooting faqs with no luck. at this point I've had to give up on continuing to use it.

Was told to install by work (military) because it was a safe/secure app. Same day received a text under one of my contact's name, but was from some completely unknown person...this happened both times that I downloaded the app. Then, when it searches my contacts, the app doesnt recognize any of my contacts that are using the same app.

Good FB Messenger alternative. Like a slightly pared down Mssngr, but still maintains most functionality. Full-time end-to-end encryption. It's open source, so there's no data or profile harvesting/sharing. Simpler UI than Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp. Group chats are an option, too. As w/ Mssngr, you can mute individual chats. My only complaint is there's no way to turn off notifs when folks react to your comment w/ thumbs up, laugh emoji, etc. Either all types of notifs are on or all are off.

Ignoring known severe security issues: (1). If screen lock is fingerprint, your fingerprint opens Signal and cannot be changed to pin. Or vice versa. Fingerprint is convenient for device but unsafe for Signal. Pin is the opposite. Most jurisdictions allowed to force fingerprint by force. Bad guys borrow finger. Ignored. (2). Notifications contain message content by default. These are stored on device outside of application, non-encrypted. Accessible even if Signal is uninstalled. Ignored.

Safe and secure messaging that EVERYONE should have installed. There is a reason it is the gold standard for encrypted E2E messaging. You may not get full fledge features and novelty things that you get from the open and less secure services (like telegram). But you do get a solid and usable messaging system that is 100% fully encrypted and able to keep your conversations and interactions private from outside snoopers, beat it government or data stealing corporations or other nefarious people.

When doing a call without headset, the touch rejection does not work on my Pixel 8 Pro phone. I often find myself changing quick settings with my ear. This can be fatal depending on the quick setting. E. g. putting the phone into Do Not Disturb mode while expecting an important call. This needs to be fixed. If it's a security thing I'd like to be able to disable it by myself.

It's extremely secure and very easy to use. But setting up the backups takes some thought and some work because Signal will not just send backups to your Cloud of choice. The backups are also encrypted and you will need to note and save the key. Transferring to a new phone can work by direct transfer but it often does not - don't spend too much time on that method: just make a final backup on the old phone, note the key, copy the file over, and import it.

Overall I'm very happy with the app for a long time now. Have an issue recently, though: When I attach a file to a message in 'Note to self', it looses the original name of the file. Instead, the filename is always 'Unnamed file'. Can you please have a look into this? Thx. Otherwise, keep up the good work! Edit 2025-10-23: Seems to be fixed by now! Thanks a ton, guys! 👌🏻👍🏻😀

Every once in a while it refuses to send the message immediately, it sometimes takes a couple minutes to receive the message. On top of that, Repeat alert option usually doesn't work at all. All this above makes Signal an unreliable communicator. Tried to change options of the app and the phone, but nothing fixed the issue

Good alternative for more peace of mind. Notifications don't seem to push through properly, as many have mentioned, some messages you will see when you open the app versus you being notified. For my partner and I, this is fine for now since we know each other's schedules (and can intuit when messages will come) and if something's "burning" there's also just regular voice calling so no real personal issue there.

I've used Signal for years now, and it's been a reliable messaging workhorse for most of that time - simple to use and secure. I've even donated from time-to-time. Recently there have been several issues, eg not being able to send messages, receiving notification of incoming, but then the message itself not arriving for 24 hours. Appears to have settled in the last few weeks, and now more reliable. Pixel Android 16

This app was great in the beginning for calls, video calls, and sending pics and videos; but it's functionality has been steadily worsening the last year or so. Calls never ring now and instead we get notifications a few minutes later of a missed call. Messages take minutes to go through sometimes, even when in the same room on the same Wi-Fi. I hope that these issues get resolved soon.

Nice and private app, but I don't always receive the messages when they're sent to me (single or group conversations). There isn't a pattern: sometimes message exchanges are instantaneous; other times days go by and only when I open the app for some reason, I suddenly receive messages dated 2 weeks before. This has happened both using mobile data and on wifi. So... nice and private app, but not very reliable. ~:\

its started deleting voice recordings before they are sent if phone is tilted 😭 ive just lost 5 messages in a row. spent ages recording a message and it just deleted it because i turned my phone landscape.. 2nd Day after this review. it now wont let me press send. it just keeps recording. i had to leave the message. and when i went bk in . it was all deleted. EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING!!!!! .. can you please add a pause function that it is able to pause the voice note while recording.

So far it's a good app, just minor issues with the notifications. But at least I won't have to deal with strangers messaging randomly or sending unsolicited pictures, or the app telling me I have new messages while there is none, like other apps do. If they listen to the issues the customers have, they won't run out of customers.

There are some smaller bugs, such as when you accept an invitation, the message doesn't go away, leading you to believe that you weren't added to the group. Also, ive recently tried to transfer my account and data to a new phone and the QR just didn't work. Luckily, the alternative solution of backing up and restoring the data was seamless and quick. Otherwise simple-to-use, intuitive app.

1) freezes accessing photo albums. 2) it refuses to update attachments that have been edited and updated. i. e. you can fully close the app and open it and it'll reload deleted unedited files you don't want to share. 3) it doesn't tell your friend your nickname so in security chats it'll out names. 4) as of the latest update, you can't even use/access your channel description anymore.

Easy to use, and it's end-to-end encrypted. Recommended by all those fighting for privacy worldwide. Too bad for the cryptocurrency investment scams that I regularly receive, and that would easily be prevented if the app had the option to automatically silence numbers that aren't in our contacts. A star less because the backup & restore option doesn't work, neither by phone proximity, nor by backup file, so after a phone change I lost all my previous conversations.

leaving a one star review to try and get it noticed so something can be done. I don't get notifications when receiving messages anymore. for example, I message my partner and wait for her reply. After a while I go back to message again, and get a notification as I open the app and find she'd actually messaged back within a minute. A messaging app isn't much good if it's not giving notifications to tell you you've received a message. I'd love to stick with Signal, but I need it fully functional.

I use it all the time for messaging, video calls, and for sending pics and videos and I've never had any complaints. Linking with pc is fast and easy, as well. You have to relink if you haven't used the pc version in a while, but it's barely half a minute's work. Oh, and unlike Telegram, I have never been contacted by any bots or phishing chat groups. Just don't forget your pincode if you plan on losing your phone, because you will loose your backup. I guess that's the price of privacy.

Very good other than recent delays. Signal app has been delayed in notifying me of incoming messages. This happens in both a pixel 8 pro and a S25+. All things up to date. After some time has gone by, I'll get a notification for a message sent many minutes ago, or if it's a group chat, there will have been many messages in between me even receiving the conversation.

Signal is my favorite messenger app. The number of people around me using it is growing every day, and everyone is satisfied. There is just one bug: when I make a call, if the other person doesn’t have the app open, they only see the missed call after they log in. If this issue gets fixed, it would be perfect. Overall, in terms of security and simplicity, it’s an ideal app

UPDATE: Issues below fixed, great app! The new update which disables picture cropping in favour of a skew option is awful, this has to be fixed. Edit: I'd also like to add that searching for multiple keywords in a GIF search session breaks the session, and no results are returned. It's very slow to load. Also when selecting a photo to send from my gallery, I only see it in full screen when I select it. If I decide its not the one I want I hit "x" and I'm taken right out.
